original: @197b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @197b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra y'a na m'u la patti t'i k'a /
analyzed: badzra y'a na m'u la patti t'i k'a /
translated: Vajrayānamūlapattidīpikā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher bshad pa /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher bshad pa /
translated: The Extensive Explanation of the Root Downfalls of the Vajra Vehicle

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: rtag gnas dus gsum bde gshegs mnyam nyid sku //
analyzed: rtag gnas dus gsum bde gshegs mnyam nyid sku //
translated: The eternal, abiding, equanimous body of the sugatas of the three times,

original: kha sbyar bde chen longs spyod yongs @198a * //
analyzed: kha sbyar bde chen longs spyod yongs @198a * //
translated: The glorious perfection of the enjoyment of the great bliss of union,

original: rdzogs dpal // bdud bzhi las rgyal 'gro kun re 'dod skong //
analyzed: rdzogs dpal // bdud bzhi las rgyal 'gro kun re 'dod skong //
translated: The conqueror of the four māras, the fulfiller of the hopes of all beings,

original: thugs rje bdag nyid 'jam mgon phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: thugs rje bdag nyid 'jam mgon phyag 'tshal te //
translated: I pay homage to the protector Mañjuśrī, the embodiment of compassion.

original: 'dir ni mi mkhas gsang sngags don la mngon rmongs pa'i //
analyzed: 'dir ni mi mkhas gsang sngags don la mngon rmongs pa'i //
translated: Here, the unwise, ignorant of the meaning of secret mantra,

original: dbang bskur dam tshig med de zhal gyi bdud rtsi bral //
analyzed: dbang bskur dam tshig med de zhal gyi bdud rtsi bral //
translated: Lack empowerment and samaya, and are devoid of the nectar of the guru's speech.

original: bdud kyis mngon bslus rang nyid phung ba kho nar zad //
analyzed: bdud kyis mngon bslus rang nyid phung ba kho nar zad //
translated: Clearly deceived by māras, they only bring about their own downfall.

original: snying rje gso thabs bdud rtsi 'di ni bshad par bya //
analyzed: snying rje gso thabs bdud rtsi 'di ni bshad par bya //
translated: This nectar of the method of compassion should be explained.

original: lam mchog rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur dam tshig 'di //
analyzed: lam mchog rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur dam tshig 'di //
translated: This samaya, the basis of the supreme paths,

original: theg mchog rgyud kun las ni rab bstan pa //
analyzed: theg mchog rgyud kun las ni rab bstan pa //
translated: Is taught in all the tantras of the supreme vehicle.

original: slob dpon gzhan dag gzhan du 'chad de 'di yi don //
analyzed: slob dpon gzhan dag gzhan du 'chad de 'di yi don //
translated: Other masters explain it differently.

original: bdag gis bla ma las rnyed theg mchog spyod pa nyon //
analyzed: bdag gis bla ma las rnyed theg mchog spyod pa nyon //
translated: Listen to the conduct of the supreme vehicle that I have obtained from my guru.

original: de la gsang sngags kyi tshul spyod pa rnams kyis skye ba med pa'i rgyud khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: de la gsang sngags kyi tshul spyod pa rnams kyis skye ba med pa'i rgyud khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: In that regard, those who practice the way of secret mantra should comprehend the tantra of non-arising.

original: 'gro ba thams cad snying rjes bsgral ba'i sems sngon du btang ba thig le chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor mngon sum du snang pa'am /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad snying rjes bsgral ba'i sems sngon du btang ba thig le chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob dpon ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor mngon sum du snang pa'am /
translated: With compassion for all beings, having generated the mind of liberation, desiring to perfect the great drop, a qualified master, either in the direct perception of the samadhi mandala,

original: gzhon nu ma la phab ste dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'am /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma la phab ste dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'am /
translated: or having descended upon a young maiden, draws the mandala.

original: yang na de nyid bcu dang ldan pas mngon du bris pas bum pa'i dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga dang ldan pa'i slob ma la slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i dam tshig pham pa dang /
analyzed: yang na de nyid bcu dang ldan pas mngon du bris pas bum pa'i dbang dang / gsang ba'i dbang dang / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga dang ldan pa'i slob ma la slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i dam tshig pham pa dang /
translated: Or, by one endowed with the ten qualities, having drawn it in the direct perception, the master, with a disciple endowed with the complete ritual of the vase empowerment, the secret empowerment, the wisdom-knowledge empowerment, and the complete empowerment, should explain the root samayas of defeat and the branch samayas.

original: ltung ba dang / lci ba dang / sbom po dang / yan lag dang / nyes byas dang / phra mo dang / nyes pa med pa dang / dam tshig gi tshogs rnams dpog par bya'o //
analyzed: ltung ba dang / lci ba dang / sbom po dang / yan lag dang / nyes byas dang / phra mo dang / nyes pa med pa dang / dam tshig gi tshogs rnams dpog par bya'o //
translated: The downfalls, the heavy, the grave, the branches, the minor infractions, the subtle, the non-infractions, and the collection of pledges are to be measured.

original: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs na cho gcig la sogs pas mchog gi dngos grub dang / thun mong gi dngos grub rnams zhar la rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgrubs na cho gcig la sogs pas mchog gi dngos grub dang / thun mong gi dngos grub rnams zhar la rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, if one practices by way of the creation stage and the perfection stage, the supreme attainment and the common attainments will be expanded as a matter of course by means of a single rite, and so forth.

original: de nas lhun gyis grub pa'i don thob nas dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen pos rtog pa med par sems can gyi don byed pa ni gsang sngags kyi tshul lo /
analyzed: de nas lhun gyis grub pa'i don thob nas dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen pos rtog pa med par sems can gyi don byed pa ni gsang sngags kyi tshul lo /
translated: Then, having attained the spontaneously accomplished goal, one acts for the sake of sentient beings without conceptualization by means of non-objectifying great compassion. This is the way of Secret Mantra.

original: // / gzhan dag rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud la sogs pa bya ba spyod pa gtso bor gyur pa las kyang /
analyzed: // / gzhan dag rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud la sogs pa bya ba spyod pa gtso bor gyur pa las kyang /
translated: Others, in the Vajraśekhara Tantra and so forth, which are primarily for the performance tantra, explain that the three vows are not the same in nature but are distinct.

original: gnyis su med pa'i don khong du chud cing dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags pa'i lha dang ye shes kyi lha dang dbang po'i sgo mnyam par sbyar nas /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i don khong du chud cing dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags pa'i lha dang ye shes kyi lha dang dbang po'i sgo mnyam par sbyar nas /
translated: The one who has realized the meaning of nonduality, who is a person with samaya, and who has united the deity of examination and the wisdom deity with the sense organs,

original: dka' thub dang / dka' sbyang dang @198b khrus la sogs pa'i las dang bya ba gtsor mi 'dzin par 'grub par gsungs te /
analyzed: dka' thub dang / dka' sbyang dang @198b khrus la sogs pa'i las dang bya ba gtsor mi 'dzin par 'grub par gsungs te /
translated: will accomplish [the deity] without emphasizing the activities and actions of austerities, hardships, and ablutions.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: It also says:

original: khrus dang gtsang spra 'dir mi dgos //
analyzed: khrus dang gtsang spra 'dir mi dgos //
translated: Here, ablutions and cleanliness are not necessary.

original: dka' thub dka' spyad 'dir mi dgos //
analyzed: dka' thub dka' spyad 'dir mi dgos //
translated: Here, austerities and hardships are not necessary.

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang sems dpa' che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang sems dpa' che //
translated: Always united with the buddhas and mahasattvas,

original: rtag tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: accomplishment will be attained.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang thig le mnyam gnas kyi rgyud las /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang thig le mnyam gnas kyi rgyud las /
translated: Also, the Tantra of the Equal Union of the Bindus states:

original: bde ba chen po'i ngang gnas na //🔽dam tshig med cing sdom pa 'ang med //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i ngang gnas na // dam tshig med cing sdom pa 'ang med //
translated: Abiding in the state of great bliss,🔽there is no samaya and no vows.

original: bya dang byed ba rtsol ba med //
analyzed: bya dang byed ba rtsol ba med //
translated: There is no striving with something to do or something to achieve.

original: nam mkha' lta bur 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Accomplishment will be attained like space.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyud las /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyud las /
translated: Also, the Tantra of the Arising of Bodhicitta states:

original: byang chub sems la mnyam gnas na //
analyzed: byang chub sems la mnyam gnas na //
translated: If one abides in the equality of awakened mind,

original: dam tshig sdom pa nyams ma yin //
analyzed: dam tshig sdom pa nyams ma yin //
translated: there is no transgression of the sacred pledge or the vows.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: The Secret Mind Tantra states:

original: spros med thig le'i dang gnas na //
analyzed: spros med thig le'i dang gnas na //
translated: In the abode of the unelaborate bindu,

original: bya ba ma yin spyad kyang 'grub //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin spyad kyang 'grub //
translated: one is successful even in engaging in what is not to be done.

original: ces 'byung ba dang / rtog pa yongs su zad pa'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: ces 'byung ba dang / rtog pa yongs su zad pa'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: The Tantra of the Total Extinction of Concepts states:

original: dam tshig la sogs brtags pas 'ching //
analyzed: dam tshig la sogs brtags pas 'ching //
translated: One is bound by analyzing the sacred pledges and so forth.

original: sgyu ma'i sbyor shes stong pas 'grub //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i sbyor shes stong pas 'grub //
translated: One is successful through emptiness, which is the knowledge of the union of illusion.

original: ces 'byung ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba mdzod las kyang /
analyzed: ces 'byung ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba mdzod las kyang /
translated: The Secret Treasury of Dakas states:

original: 'di ltar snang ba'i dngos po rnams //
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ba'i dngos po rnams //
translated: All these things that appear

original: sgyu ma lha dang lha mor gnas //
analyzed: sgyu ma lha dang lha mor gnas //
translated: are the gods and goddesses of illusion.

original: bsdam bya med cing sdom byed med //
analyzed: bsdam bya med cing sdom byed med //
translated: There is nothing to be bound, nor is there a binder.

original: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le med //
analyzed: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le med //
translated: There are no channels, energies, or essences.

original: stong pa nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: One is successful through emptiness.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad las kyang /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad las kyang /
translated: Moreover, all the yogin and yoginī tantras state:

original: bde ba chen po'i don rtogs na //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i don rtogs na //
translated: When the meaning of great bliss is realized,

original: smyung bar gnas pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: smyung bar gnas pa la sogs pa //
translated: The conduct of fasting and so forth🔽is explained as inferior conduct.

original: dman pa'i spyod pa bshad pas na zab mo'i don rdo rje theg pa rnams kyis ni rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i lha'i sbyor bas rtag par thig le chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas na /
analyzed: dman pa'i spyod pa bshad pas na zab mo'i don rdo rje theg pa rnams kyis ni rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i lha'i sbyor bas rtag par thig le chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas na /
translated: If those of the profound meaning, the Vajra Vehicle, always abide in the great, uniform drop through the union with the naturally abiding deity,

original: dngos grub kyi mchog sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi mchog sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will attain the supreme attainment, the three bodies, the five pristine awarenesses, and so forth.

original: gzhan dag bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud rdo rje theg pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzhan dag bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud rdo rje theg pa ma yin nam /
translated: Others say, “Are the Action and Conduct tantras of the Vajra Vehicle not tantras?

original: de dag las ni las dang bya bas 'grub par bshad na /
analyzed: de dag las ni las dang bya bas 'grub par bshad na /
translated: They explain that accomplishment is achieved through action and conduct.

original: gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams las kyang sbyin pa la sogs pa bsod nams kyi chogs kyis thams cad mkhyen pa rgyu'i gtso bo zhes gsungs pa dang 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams las kyang sbyin pa la sogs pa bsod nams kyi chogs kyis thams cad mkhyen pa rgyu'i gtso bo zhes gsungs pa dang 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: Moreover, the Mahāyāna sūtras also state that omniscience is the principal cause through the accumulation of merit, such as generosity.

original: de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te bshad pa yin no //
translated: Those are the intentional statements of the Transcendent Conqueror.

original: bus pa blo dman @199a * //
analyzed: bus pa blo dman @199a * //
translated: The childish of inferior intellect

original: pa dang / spros bcas la dga' ba dang / shin tu zab mo'i don la 'jigs pa rnams nye bar gzung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: pa dang / spros bcas la dga' ba dang / shin tu zab mo'i don la 'jigs pa rnams nye bar gzung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
translated: and for the sake of those who delight in elaboration and are afraid of the extremely profound meaning.

original: de skad ru yang /
analyzed: de skad ru yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: gsang sngags kyi don la de kho na nyid la 'jug pa las /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi don la de kho na nyid la 'jug pa las /
translated: In the Introduction to the Meaning of the Tantra of Secret Mantra,🔽it is stated:

original: stong nyid lta bas grol 'gyur te //
analyzed: stong nyid lta bas grol 'gyur te //
translated: By the view of emptiness one is liberated,

original: sgom pa lhag ma de don yin //
analyzed: sgom pa lhag ma de don yin //
translated: and the remaining meditations are for the sake of that.

original: lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa kun //
analyzed: lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa kun //
translated: All conduct of body, speech, and mind

original: theg pa dman la bstan pa yin //
analyzed: theg pa dman la bstan pa yin //
translated: is taught for those of the lesser vehicle.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang /🔽de nyid tshol la thog mar ni //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang / de nyid tshol la thog mar ni //
translated: And the master Nagarjuna also explains:🔽For those who seek reality,

original: thams cad yod ces smra bar bya //
analyzed: thams cad yod ces smra bar bya //
translated: at first all should be said to exist.

original: don rnams rtogs shing chags med la //🔽phyis ni rnam par dben don nyid //
analyzed: don rnams rtogs shing chags med la // phyis ni rnam par dben don nyid //
translated: When the meaning is realized and one is free from attachment,

original: ces bshad pas so //
analyzed: ces bshad pas so //
translated: later the meaning of emptiness is taught.

original: gzhan du 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las kyang /
analyzed: gzhan du 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las kyang /
translated: And elsewhere, in the Magical Net of Manjushri,🔽it is stated:

original: lag na rdo rje ngas sems can rnams kyi blo'i khyad par dang / rigs kyi bye brag gis theg pa'i khyad par rnams bstan te /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje ngas sems can rnams kyi blo'i khyad par dang / rigs kyi bye brag gis theg pa'i khyad par rnams bstan te /
translated: I, Vajrapāṇi, have taught the distinctions of vehicles according to the distinctions of the minds and the types of sentient beings.

original: la la la phyi rol pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: la la la phyi rol pa'i tshul lo //
translated: Some are taught the non-Buddhist way.

original: la la la nyan thos kyi theg pa'o //
analyzed: la la la nyan thos kyi theg pa'o //
translated: Some are taught the Śrāvakayāna.

original: la la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyud dpag tu med pa bstan kyang /
analyzed: la la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyud dpag tu med pa bstan kyang /
translated: Some are taught the Pratyekabuddhayāna and the Pāramitāyāna and the countless tantras of the knowledge holders.

original: theg le chen po yi ge med pa brda dang bral bas gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pas gsal bar byas pas rig par bya'o //
analyzed: theg le chen po yi ge med pa brda dang bral bas gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pas gsal bar byas pas rig par bya'o //
translated: However, it should be understood that they are awakened by the Great Vehicle, which is without syllables, free from symbols, and nondual.

original: gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i khungs dang / rdo rje gtsug tor las kyang /
analyzed: gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i khungs dang / rdo rje gtsug tor las kyang /
translated: Moreover, it is clearly stated in the Vajraśekhara and other sources, and in the Vajroṣṇīṣa:

original: de kho na la mnyam gnas na //
analyzed: de kho na la mnyam gnas na //
translated: Abiding in reality,

original: dam tshig med cing sngar spyad med //
analyzed: dam tshig med cing sngar spyad med //
translated: there is no samaya, no previous practice,

original: rdo rje dril bu gzung mi dgos //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu gzung mi dgos //
translated: no need to hold vajra and bell,

original: de nyid bcu bral 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid bcu bral 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: and one will be accomplished free from the ten realities.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang /
translated: And the Perfection of Wisdom says:

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams ni spros ba dang bcas pa ste mtshan mar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams ni spros ba dang bcas pa ste mtshan mar rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, the giving and so forth of the bodhisattvas are with conceptual elaborations, and should be known as having signs.

original: don dam pa ni chos kyi dbyings rgyal ba rnams kyi yum mo zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
analyzed: don dam pa ni chos kyi dbyings rgyal ba rnams kyi yum mo zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan to //
translated: The ultimate is the realm of reality, the mother of the victors.

original: gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni dam tshig dang spyod pas thob pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni dam tshig dang spyod pas thob pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, the vajra holder is not attained through commitments and conduct,

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral bas rig byed gsang tshig gi cho ga bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral bas rig byed gsang tshig gi cho ga bzhin no //
translated: because of being devoid of the right view, like the ritual of secret mantras.

original: de'i phyir na stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs na lus ngag gi spyod pa dang dam tshig la sogs pa theg pa 'og ma'i tshul yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir na stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs na lus ngag gi spyod pa dang dam tshig la sogs pa theg pa 'og ma'i tshul yin te /
translated: Therefore, if one realizes the meaning of emptiness, the conduct of body and speech and the commitments and so forth are the methods of the lower vehicles.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las @199b ni dam tshig dang bya spyod la sogs pa mi dgos te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las @199b ni dam tshig dang bya spyod la sogs pa mi dgos te /
translated: In the Mahāyoga tantras, commitments, conduct, and so forth are not necessary.

original: de ltar rtogs pa ni zab mo'i don khong du chud pa yin no zhes slob dpon gzhan dag zer ro //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa ni zab mo'i don khong du chud pa yin no zhes slob dpon gzhan dag zer ro //
translated: Thus, the realization of this is the comprehension of the profound meaning, say other masters.

original: de yan chod nges don no /
analyzed: de yan chod nges don no /
translated: Up to this point, the definitive meaning.

original: // / phyogs gzhan dag la yang dbang bskur pa'i cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / dam tshig gi sbyor ba la gnas na lta ba gtso bor gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: // / phyogs gzhan dag la yang dbang bskur pa'i cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / dam tshig gi sbyor ba la gnas na lta ba gtso bor gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: In other cases, even if one is not primarily intent on the view, but is engaged in the rite of consecration, the rite of the mandala, and the practice of the commitments,

original: thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub rten cing 'brel pa'i dngos pos kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub rten cing 'brel pa'i dngos pos kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will still attain the common and supreme feats by the power of dependent origination.

original: de dag kyang ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: lung dang rig pa dag ste /
analyzed: lung dang rig pa dag ste /
translated: Because of scripture and logic.

original: rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
analyzed: rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
translated: The Vajra-adhipati-adhipati-tantra states:

analyzed: sbyin sreg las kyi de nyid shes //

original: dam tshig sdom pa'i rgyud ldan na //
analyzed: dam tshig sdom pa'i rgyud ldan na //
translated: and who possesses the tantra of the commitments and vows,

original: mtshan mar bltas kyang grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mtshan mar bltas kyang grol bar 'gyur //
translated: will be liberated even if he views signs.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang / gzhan yang sku khros pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang / gzhan yang sku khros pa'i rgyud las /

analyzed: las kyi sbyor ba rab shes shing //

analyzed: gsang sngags sbyor ba'i tshul bdun ldan /

analyzed: spros bcas spyod pa rab ba mkhas na //

original: spros pa nyid kyis grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: spros pa nyid kyis grol bar 'gyur //
translated: one will be liberated by elaborations.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang / gzhan yang gcig tu spros pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir dang / gzhan yang gcig tu spros pa'i rgyud las /

original: mnyam ldan de nyid bcu shes na //
analyzed: mnyam ldan de nyid bcu shes na //

analyzed: dngos por zhen pas bgegs mi 'gyur //

analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang dam tshig rtogs pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud las /
translated: Moreover, the Tantra of the King of Realization of Sacred Commitments states:🔽Abiding in union is the supreme rite;

analyzed: sbyor la gnas pa cho ga'i mchog / gsang sngags cho ga sbyor bas 'grub //

analyzed: ces 'byung ba dang / de nyid bsdus pa chen po'i rgyud las /
translated: The Tantra of the Great Compendium states:

analyzed: gsang sngags spyod pas grol 'gyur te //
translated: One will be liberated by mantra conduct;🔽Vajradhara is the supreme secret.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i mchog / ces 'byung ba'i phyir dang / thugs khros pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i mchog / ces 'byung ba'i phyir dang / thugs khros pa'i rgyud las /
translated: The Tantra of Wrathful Mind states:🔽Union is the supreme conduct;

original: zung du 'brel pa spyod pa'i mchog / spyod pa'i gzhis ni rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: zung du 'brel pa spyod pa'i mchog / spyod pa'i gzhis ni rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: the basis of conduct is Vajradhara.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / phrin las rdzogs pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / phrin las rdzogs pa'i rgyud las /
translated: And the Perfect Action Tantra says:

original: rdo rje padmar rab sbyar nas //
analyzed: rdo rje padmar rab sbyar nas //
translated: Having united the vajra and lotus,

original: bde ba chen po chos kyi sku //🔽zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po chos kyi sku // zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the great bliss of the body of reality🔽is the supreme offering to the buddhas.

original: slob dpon klu sgrub kyi don de yang de nyid las /
analyzed: slob dpon klu sgrub kyi don de yang de nyid las /

original: rnam par dben don mi shes par //
analyzed: rnam par dben don mi shes par //
translated: Without knowing the meaning of voidness,

original: thos pa tsam la 'jug byed cing //
analyzed: thos pa tsam la 'jug byed cing //
translated: those who engage in mere study

original: gang dag bsod nams mi byed pa //
analyzed: gang dag bsod nams mi byed pa //
translated: and do not perform meritorious actions🔽are the worst of men, lost.🔽The actions with their effects

original: skyes bu tha shal de dag brlag /'bras bur bcas pa'i las rnams dang // 'gro ba dag kyang yang dag brjod //🔽de yi rang @200a * //
analyzed: skyes bu tha shal de dag brlag /'bras bur bcas pa'i las rnams dang // 'gro ba dag kyang yang dag brjod // de yi rang @200a * //

original: bzhin yongs shes na //
analyzed: bzhin yongs shes na //
translated: If one knows their nature,

original: skye ba med par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: skye ba med par bstan pa yin //
translated: nonproduction is taught.

original: zhes bshad pa de yang bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dgag pa las kun rdzob bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis grub par gsal bar gsungs na /🔽gang dag khyed kyi gzhung la ni //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa de yang bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dgag pa las kun rdzob bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis grub par gsal bar gsungs na / gang dag khyed kyi gzhung la ni //
translated: If you say that the meaning of that is that the accumulations of merit and so forth are established by the refutation of the view of self and so on, then you are clearly saying that those who do not have your scriptures are lost.

original: brlag par 'gyur bar gsal bar gsungs te /
analyzed: brlag par 'gyur bar gsal bar gsungs te /
translated: You are clearly saying that those who do not have your scriptures are lost.

original: gzhan yangs sangs rgyas ni chos can sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid 'dus byas yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yangs sangs rgyas ni chos can sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid 'dus byas yin te /
translated: Other masters say that the Buddha of the Great Vehicle is a conditioned phenomenon, having the characteristics of an illusion, a subject,🔽because it is dependently arisen, like a sprout arising from a seed.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir sa bon las myu gu 'byung ba bzhin no zhes lta ba gtso bor mi 'dzin par dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod pas 'grub po zhes slob dpon kha cig 'dod do //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir sa bon las myu gu 'byung ba bzhin no zhes lta ba gtso bor mi 'dzin par dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod pas 'grub po zhes slob dpon kha cig 'dod do //
translated: They do not hold the view that the Buddha is primary, but maintain that he is accomplished by conduct such as pledges.

original: de dag gi gzhung la brjod par bya ste /🔽re zhig phyogs snga ma ltar na don dam pa'i lta ba gtso che ste /
analyzed: de dag gi gzhung la brjod par bya ste / re zhig phyogs snga ma ltar na don dam pa'i lta ba gtso che ste /
translated: We must now address their texts.

original: dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod pa khyad du gsod pa'i tshul 'di rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod pa khyad du gsod pa'i tshul 'di rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: First, if one maintains that the view is primary, then this method of disparaging conduct such as pledges is illogical.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi rgyud sde mtha' dag dang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams las lta ba dang spyod pa cha mnyam pa las 'grub par gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi rgyud sde mtha' dag dang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams las lta ba dang spyod pa cha mnyam pa las 'grub par gsungs te /
translated: The Transcendent Conqueror taught in all the mantra systems and in the Mahayana sutras that accomplishment comes from the view and conduct being in balance.

original: gsang ba mchog gi rgyud las /
analyzed: gsang ba mchog gi rgyud las /
translated: The Supreme Secret Tantra says:

original: spros pa'i don ni rab rtogs pa //
analyzed: spros pa'i don ni rab rtogs pa //
translated: The meaning of elaboration is fully understood.

original: theg pa mchog la mngon dad cing //
analyzed: theg pa mchog la mngon dad cing //
translated: One has clear faith in the supreme vehicle.

original: snying rjes gzhan gyi don la mos //
analyzed: snying rjes gzhan gyi don la mos //
translated: Through compassion, one is devoted to the welfare of others.

original: bdud rtsi lnga ni rab spyod cing //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga ni rab spyod cing //
translated: One should practice the five ambrosias,

original: snang srid sgyu ma sbyor shes pas //
analyzed: snang srid sgyu ma sbyor shes pas //
translated: and know the union of illusion-like appearance and existence.

original: lha yi sbyor ba de nyid kyis //
analyzed: lha yi sbyor ba de nyid kyis //
translated: Through the reality of the union of the deity,

original: bsgrub pas dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgrub pas dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
translated: one will attain the supreme power.

original: las kyi dngos grub sbyor shes pas //
analyzed: las kyi dngos grub sbyor shes pas //
translated: One should know the union for the power of action.

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gzhan yang rdo rje padma snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: gzhan yang rdo rje padma snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgyud las /
translated: Moreover, the Tantra of the Union of the Vajra and Lotus states:

original: gsang ba'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i thabs rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i cho gas dngos grub bsgrub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i thabs rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i cho gas dngos grub bsgrub par 'gyur te /
translated: Lord of Secrets, one will attain power through the method of union with non-duality through the union of secret mantra, by means of the ritual of dependent origination.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po dper na skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang / gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / lag pa dang / rtsva rnams 'dus pa las me 'byung ba bzhin du gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba yang stong nyid kyi don dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i che ba dang /
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po dper na skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang / gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / lag pa dang / rtsva rnams 'dus pa las me 'byung ba bzhin du gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba yang stong nyid kyi don dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i che ba dang /
translated: For example, O Lord of Secrets, just as fire arises from the union of a person's effort, the fire stick, the supporting stick, the hands, and the kusha grass, so too, the application of mantra is accomplished by the meaning of emptiness, the greatness of dependent origination,

original: dbang dang dam tshig thob pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dbang dang dam tshig thob pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
translated: and the attainment of initiation and sacred pledge.🔽 Otherwise, one will fall.

original: gzhan du na ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba dang / dur khrod gsang ba'i rgyud las 'jam dpal gsang sngags la mngon @200b par dad pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod dam chu 'gram du dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan du na ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba dang / dur khrod gsang ba'i rgyud las 'jam dpal gsang sngags la mngon @200b par dad pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod dam chu 'gram du dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
translated: And the Tantra of the Secret Charnel Ground states: The yogi who has great faith in mantra should, in a charnel ground or on a riverbank, with a fearless mind, meditate on the stage of development and the stage of completion.🔽 He should meditate on the stage of development during the daytime and on the stage of completion at night.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor bas grub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po la gnas te zla ba drug tu rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad na rdo rje 'dzin ba'i sa bcu gsum bsgrod par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa dang / dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor bas grub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po la gnas te zla ba drug tu rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad na rdo rje 'dzin ba'i sa bcu gsum bsgrod par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa dang / dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las /
translated: The Array of Commitments Tantra states:🔽“Gatherings of vajra holders, listen well!

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshogs rab tu nyon cig / phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas byang chub kyi sems snying rje chen po dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i dam tshig yong su 'dzin pa dang / dogs pa med cing the tshom dang bral ba dang /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshogs rab tu nyon cig / phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas byang chub kyi sems snying rje chen po dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i dam tshig yong su 'dzin pa dang / dogs pa med cing the tshom dang bral ba dang /
translated: Later yogins who hold the awakening mind of great compassion, who uphold the unmistaken commitments, who are free of doubt and hesitation,

original: rang gi lus la chags pa med cing sems can gyi dpon la dga' ba dang / gsang sngags kyi las kyi cho ga shes pa dang / de dag kyang chos dbyings las ma g-yos na sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: rang gi lus la chags pa med cing sems can gyi dpon la dga' ba dang / gsang sngags kyi las kyi cho ga shes pa dang / de dag kyang chos dbyings las ma g-yos na sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba dang /
translated: who are not attached to their own bodies and who delight in the welfare of sentient beings, who understand the ritual actions of secret mantra, and who do not stray from the basic space of phenomena will fully embrace the grounds of the buddhas.”

original: de'i phyir na sgyu ma mkhan gyis ji ltar rdzas dang sngags kyi khang bzangs la sogs pa bzhin du 'di ltar yang cho ga 'dus pas 'grub par 'gyur te /

translated: Therefore, just as a magician accomplishes a castle and so forth with substances and mantras, so too is it accomplished by the assembly of rites.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /

analyzed: dper na sgyu ma mkhan po 'gas //

original: gang phyir de ni mngon shes pas //
analyzed: gang phyir de ni mngon shes pas //

analyzed: sgyu ma la ni de mi chags // de bzhin srid gsum sgyu ma ltar // rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pas mkhyen //

analyzed: zhes gsungs te /

analyzed: rnal 'byor ba rnams kyang tshul de las nyams pas 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: And the yogins, not deviating from that method, are successful.

analyzed: rdo rje thod pa'i rgyud las kyang /

analyzed: tshe gcig dngos grub mchog tu 'byung //
translated: one will attain the supreme power in one lifetime.

analyzed: spros pa med pa rab tu skye //

analyzed: tshul de nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur // zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: will accomplish that very method.

original: de ltar na phyogs gnyis ka 'gog par byed pa'i lung bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rgyud de dag dang / gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang / bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud mtha' dag dang / rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams las gzhung 'di nyid shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar na phyogs gnyis ka 'gog par byed pa'i lung bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rgyud de dag dang / gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang / bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud mtha' dag dang / rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams las gzhung 'di nyid shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, the Buddha himself refutes both positions, because this very scripture is taught very clearly in those tantras and also in the sūtras of the Mahāyāna, in all the kriyā and caryā tantras, and in the yoga and yoginī tantras.

original: re zhig phyogs dang po ltar na dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod pa khyad du bsad de lta ba gtso bor byas nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di phyogs gnyis pa'i lung dang / gzhung gzhan dag gis kyang bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: re zhig phyogs dang po ltar na dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod pa khyad du bsad de lta ba gtso bor byas nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i gzhung 'di phyogs gnyis pa'i lung dang / gzhung gzhan dag gis kyang bsal ba yin te /
translated: If the first position is correct, then this scripture, which says that one attains the stage of a vajra holder by disregarding the conduct of commitments and so forth and making the view primary, is refuted by other scriptures and reasonings.

original: 'di ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is an extreme consequence.

original: rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i khungs ma brjod dam zhe na /🔽rdo rje rtse mo la @201b sogs pa'i khungs de nyid las kyang /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i khungs ma brjod dam zhe na / rdo rje rtse mo la @201b sogs pa'i khungs de nyid las kyang /
translated: But aren't the Vajrashekhara and so forth cited as sources?🔽The Vajrashekhara and so forth teach that view and conduct are equal

original: lta ba dang spyod pa cha mnyam par ston te /
analyzed: lta ba dang spyod pa cha mnyam par ston te /
translated: because they say:

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang sems dpa' che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang sems dpa' che //
translated: The buddhas and great beings

original: bdag tu lta bas 'grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag tu lta bas 'grub par 'gyur // zhes 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: are accomplished through the view of self.

original: gzhan yang de nyid las /
analyzed: gzhan yang de nyid las /
translated: Also, that same text says:

original: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of your deity

original: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
translated: you should make offerings to yourself and others.

original: dam tshig sdom la gnas pa yis //
analyzed: dam tshig sdom la gnas pa yis //
translated: Those who abide in the commitments and vows

original: gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //🔽khrus dang gtsang sbra 'dir mi dgos //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur // zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // khrus dang gtsang sbra 'dir mi dgos //
translated: This is stated in the Tantra of the Great Natural Arising of Awareness:🔽The great yoga of the supreme vehicle🔽is the yoga of the mind-only stage.🔽The yoga of the mind-only stage

original: zhes bya ba ni sems brtan par gyur nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sems brtan par gyur nas /
translated: is the yoga of the single seal stage.🔽The yoga of the single seal stage🔽is the yoga of the great seal stage.🔽The yoga of the great seal stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme royal stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme royal stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage

analyzed: nyan thos la sogs pa'i lus ngag gtso bor gyur pa dgag pa yin pa'i phyir dgongs te bshad pa'o // gzhan yang rgyud gzhan dag gi khungs rnams kyang bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis lta ba dang spyod pa cha mnyam par gzhung 'di nyid las gsal la /
translated: is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage

original: 'dir ni gzhung mngas kyis dogs pas bdag gis ma spros so //
analyzed: 'dir ni gzhung mngas kyis dogs pas bdag gis ma spros so //
translated: is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can gdul ba'i don du tshul sna tshogs kyis bshad pas phyogs re tsam la rtog pa ni rmongs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sems can gdul ba'i don du tshul sna tshogs kyis bshad pas phyogs re tsam la rtog pa ni rmongs pa'o //
translated: is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage🔽is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.🔽The yoga of the supreme vehicle stage

original: de'i phyir na las dang po pa dang / spros bcas la dga' ba'i phyir spros pa shas cher bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir na las dang po pa dang / spros bcas la dga' ba'i phyir spros pa shas cher bstan to //
translated: is the yoga of the supreme vehicle stage.

original: sems brtan pa dang mtshan ma med pa la dga' ba'i dbang du byas te spros pa med pa'i don shas cher bstan to //
analyzed: sems brtan pa dang mtshan ma med pa la dga' ba'i dbang du byas te spros pa med pa'i don shas cher bstan to //
translated: The meaning of non-elaboration is taught in a general way from the perspective of those who delight in a stable mind and signlessness.

original: de'i phyir dgongs pa'i don rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dgongs pa'i don rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the intention should be understood.

original: las dang po bas ni dam tshig la sogs pa gtsor gzung ngo zhes bya ba'i gzhung ngo //
analyzed: las dang po bas ni dam tshig la sogs pa gtsor gzung ngo zhes bya ba'i gzhung ngo //
translated: The text is that beginners should emphasize the commitments and so forth.

original: phyogs gnyis pa ltar na lta pa khyad du bsad cing spyod pa lhur len pa yang phyogs snga ma'i lung dang gzhung gzhan gyis bkag pa ste /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa ltar na lta pa khyad du bsad cing spyod pa lhur len pa yang phyogs snga ma'i lung dang gzhung gzhan gyis bkag pa ste /
translated: According to the second position, the former scriptural passages and texts refute those who disparage the view and emphasize conduct.🔽With that in mind,

original: de nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de nyid kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: it was said above:

original: stong nyid lta bas grol 'gyur te //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: stong nyid lta bas grol 'gyur te // zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bshad zin to //
translated: One is liberated by the view of emptiness.

original: des na phyogs de gnyis ka'i gzhung gis kyang phan tshun dgag par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na phyogs de gnyis ka'i gzhung gis kyang phan tshun dgag par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the texts of both of those positions are not able to refute each other.

original: de nyid la lta ba dang spyod pa mnyam pas 'grub par gsal bar gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid la lta ba dang spyod pa mnyam pas 'grub par gsal bar gsungs te /
translated: It is clearly taught that both the view and conduct are equally necessary for accomplishment.

original: 'on kyang skyes bu'i 'dod pas zhugs pa'i phyir 'di tsam gyis ni bden pa gnyis la 'jug pa dgag par gal 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang skyes bu'i 'dod pas zhugs pa'i phyir 'di tsam gyis ni bden pa gnyis la 'jug pa dgag par gal 'gyur te /
translated: However, since this is the case only because of the wishes of persons, it is not the case that one is refuted from engaging in the two truths by this alone.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams dga' ba bskyed par yang mi 'gyur te /🔽phyogs de dag la bden @202a * //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams dga' ba bskyed par yang mi 'gyur te / phyogs de dag la bden @202a * //
translated: And it is not the case that yogis who are skilled in the tantras of method and wisdom do not generate joy.

original: pa gnyis la ji ltar 'jug pa dang / de dag phan tshun rim pa dang rim pa ma yin par sbyar ba rgyas par ni bdag gis ma spros so //
analyzed: pa gnyis la ji ltar 'jug pa dang / de dag phan tshun rim pa dang rim pa ma yin par sbyar ba rgyas par ni bdag gis ma spros so //
translated: I have not elaborated on how the two truths are engaged in those positions and how they are applied to each other in sequence and not in sequence.

original: de ltar na phyogs gnyis ka bkag nas /
analyzed: de ltar na phyogs gnyis ka bkag nas /
translated: Thus, having refuted both positions,

original: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi ni lta ba dang spyod pa cha mnyam pas 'grub bo zhes bya ba ni gzhung ngo /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi ni lta ba dang spyod pa cha mnyam pas 'grub bo zhes bya ba ni gzhung ngo /
translated: the text states that in the way of mantra, one is accomplished by the equality of view and conduct.

original: // / da ni gzhung dbu ma pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gzhung gi don la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni gzhung dbu ma pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir gzhung gi don la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: Now, in order to clarify the Madhyamaka textual system, I will engage the meaning of the text.

original: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yongs su bcom ste /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yongs su bcom ste /
translated: The so-called root downfalls of the Vajra Vehicle are the destruction of the things that are grasped and the grasper by means of the nature of method and wisdom.

original: chos kyi sku skye ba med pa'i ngang du lta ba dang spyod pa phyin ci ma log par zhon te 'gro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos kyi sku skye ba med pa'i ngang du lta ba dang spyod pa phyin ci ma log par zhon te 'gro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should ride the unerring view and conduct into the state of the non-arising dharmakāya.

original: rtsa ba ni bcu bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: rtsa ba ni bcu bzhi pa ste /
translated: The root is the fourteenth.

original: de chad nas ma gsos na rdo rje'i dmyal bar ltung zhes bya ba'i don te //
analyzed: de chad nas ma gsos na rdo rje'i dmyal bar ltung zhes bya ba'i don te //
translated: The meaning is that if it is cut and not nourished, one will fall into the vajra hell.

original: yang na rdo rje theg pa ni 'bras bu lam du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: yang na rdo rje theg pa ni 'bras bu lam du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Again, the Vajra Vehicle is the characteristic of engaging the result as the path.

original: so so'i skye bo mtshan nyid dang skal ba ldan pas sku gsung thugs kyi nga rgyal byas te sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar 'byin pa'i phyir des 'gro bas na theg pa ste /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo mtshan nyid dang skal ba ldan pas sku gsung thugs kyi nga rgyal byas te sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar 'byin pa'i phyir des 'gro bas na theg pa ste /
translated: Since an ordinary being with the characteristics and good fortune creates the pride of body, speech, and mind and perfects the deeds of a buddha, it is a vehicle because it is gone to by that.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rtsa ba yongs su nyams na mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni ltung ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rtsa ba yongs su nyams na mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni ltung ba zhes bya'o //
translated: If the root of method and wisdom is completely damaged, the attainment of an undesirable result is called a downfall.

original: dper na 'jig rten na yang rtsa ba chad na yal ga dang me tog dang 'bras bu med do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na 'jig rten na yang rtsa ba chad na yal ga dang me tog dang 'bras bu med do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the world, if the root is cut, there are no branches, flowers, or fruits.

original: 'di ni re zhig bsdus pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig bsdus pa'i don to //
translated: This is the concise meaning for now.

original: da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the meaning of the branches should be stated.

original: de yang ya rabs kyi tshul dang bstun par bya ba'i phyir /🔽kun nas dang bas bla ma yi //
analyzed: de yang ya rabs kyi tshul dang bstun par bya ba'i phyir / kun nas dang bas bla ma yi //
translated: Moreover, in order to conform with the way of the noble ones,🔽with complete faith, bow to the lotus feet

original: zhabs kyi padmar rab btud de //🔽zhes smros te /
analyzed: zhabs kyi padmar rab btud de // zhes smros te /
translated: of the guru.

original: bstan bcos rtsom pa pos lus ngag yid gsum shin tu dang bas bdag gi bla ma gsum dang rdo rje 'dzin pa tha dad du mi rtog ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos rtsom pa pos lus ngag yid gsum shin tu dang bas bdag gi bla ma gsum dang rdo rje 'dzin pa tha dad du mi rtog ste /
translated: The author of the treatise, with complete faith in body, speech, and mind, does not conceive of the three gurus and Vajradhara as separate.

original: gus pa'i tshul gyis zhags dang gdan dang padmar bcas par btud de phyag 'tshal ba'i don to //
analyzed: gus pa'i tshul gyis zhags dang gdan dang padmar bcas par btud de phyag 'tshal ba'i don to //
translated: With a respectful manner, bow to the lotus feet with the noose and seat, meaning to pay homage.

original: gzhung yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhung yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to complete the text,

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi ni //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi ni //
translated: The fourteen root downfalls

original: rgyud las 'byung ba bshad par bya //
analyzed: rgyud las 'byung ba bshad par bya //
translated: will be explained as they occur in the tantras.

original: zhes smos te rtsa ba ni rgyu'i don te /
analyzed: zhes smos te rtsa ba ni rgyu'i don te /
translated: Here, “root” has the meaning of cause.

original: de chad na 'bras bu ltung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de chad na 'bras bu ltung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: If it is severed, the result is the characteristic of a downfall.

original: bcu bzhi ni gsal ba'i dbye bas te gzhung gi tshogs so //
analyzed: bcu bzhi ni gsal ba'i dbye bas te gzhung gi tshogs so //
translated: “ Fourteen” is a specification of the number of topics, which are the collection of the texts.

original: yang na rtsa ba ni yan lag brgyad dang / nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gsang ba chen po'i rgyud las @202b 'bum sde bzhugs pa'i gzhir gyur pas na rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: yang na rtsa ba ni yan lag brgyad dang / nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gsang ba chen po'i rgyud las @202b 'bum sde bzhugs pa'i gzhir gyur pas na rtsa ba'o //
translated: Or, “root” is the basis of the existence of the one hundred thousand sections of the tantras of the eight branches, the twenty-eight, and the great secret.

original: de las nyams na ni ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de las nyams na ni ltung ba'o //
translated: If one degenerates from that, it is a downfall.

original: de'i phyir thabs la brten pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir thabs la brten pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, it is only based on the method.

original: rgyud ni rgyun te /
analyzed: rgyud ni rgyun te /
translated: “ Tantra” is a continuum.

original: rgyu'i rgyud dang / 'bras bu'i rgyud dang / thabs kyi rgyud do //
analyzed: rgyu'i rgyud dang / 'bras bu'i rgyud dang / thabs kyi rgyud do //
translated: There is a causal tantra, a resultant tantra, and a method tantra.

original: de la rigs kyi dbye bas ni rgyu'i rgyud do //
analyzed: de la rigs kyi dbye bas ni rgyu'i rgyud do //
translated: Among them, the causal tantra is the division of the family.

original: de la rigs kyi dbye ba las 'bras bur gyur pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dbye bas ni 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
analyzed: de la rigs kyi dbye ba las 'bras bur gyur pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dbye bas ni 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
translated: Among them, the resultant tantra is the division of the result, Mahāvajradhara, by the division of the family.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu grub par bya ba'i phyir sngags dang phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis tshogs pa ni thabs kyi rgyud do //
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu grub par bya ba'i phyir sngags dang phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis tshogs pa ni thabs kyi rgyud do //
translated: The tantra of method is the collection of the conditions of mantra, mudra, mandala, and so on, in order to establish the result from the cause.

original: rnal 'byor gtso bor gyur pa'i rgyud yin pas rna rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gtso bor gyur pa'i rgyud yin pas rna rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de //
translated: Since the yoga tantra is the tantra that is the principal yoga, it is the yoga tantra.

original: de ston par byed pa yin pas tshig gi gzhung la yang de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa yin pas tshig gi gzhung la yang de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since it teaches that, the textual source is called that.

original: de yang / shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug pa //
analyzed: de yang / shes rab thabs kyi snyoms 'jug pa //
translated: Moreover, the union of wisdom and method

original: rnal 'byor ces ni bya bar bshad //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ces ni bya bar bshad //
translated: is explained as being yoga.

original: gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste //
analyzed: gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste //
translated: Wisdom is the knowledge of nonentity,

original: thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: and method is the characteristic of entity.

original: rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grags //
analyzed: rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grags //
translated: A tantra is renowned as a continuum.

original: rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur te //
analyzed: rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur te //
translated: That continuum is of three kinds:

original: gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang // mi 'phrogs pa yi rab phye ba //
analyzed: gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang // mi 'phrogs pa yi rab phye ba //
translated: the basis, the nature, and the unassailable.

original: gzhi dang rang bzhin rgyu yin te //
analyzed: gzhi dang rang bzhin rgyu yin te //
translated: The basis and the nature are the cause,

original: de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o //
translated: and likewise, the unassailable is the result.

original: gzhi ni thabs zhes bya ba ste //
analyzed: gzhi ni thabs zhes bya ba ste //
translated: The basis is called method,🔽and the nature is called wisdom.

original: rang bzhin rgyu yi rgyud du bshad //
analyzed: rang bzhin rgyu yi rgyud du bshad //
translated: The natural continuum is explained as the causal continuum.

original: gsum gyi rgyud kyi don bsdus so //
analyzed: gsum gyi rgyud kyi don bsdus so //
translated: The meaning of the three continuums is summarized.

original: zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation.

original: las ni kun la khyab ste mang po'i don du sbyar ro //
analyzed: las ni kun la khyab ste mang po'i don du sbyar ro //
translated: The action is to pervade all and to apply for the sake of many.

original: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud gsang ba 'dus pa dang / snying po'i rgyud 'jam dpal gshin rje nag po la sogs te /
analyzed: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud gsang ba 'dus pa dang / snying po'i rgyud 'jam dpal gshin rje nag po la sogs te /
translated: Moreover, it arises from the root tantra, the Guhyasamaja, the essence tantra, the Black Yamari of Manjusri, and so forth,

original: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams las 'byung ba bshad par bya zhes dam bcas pa'i don to /
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams las 'byung ba bshad par bya zhes dam bcas pa'i don to /
translated: and it is explained in the yoga and yogini tantras. This is the meaning of the promise.

original: // / da ni gzhung gi tshogs bcu bzhi bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni gzhung gi tshogs bcu bzhi bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the fourteen topics of the treatise will be explained.

original: dngos grub kyi rtsa bar gyur pa'i bla ma la sogs pa dngos grub kyi gzhir gyur pas thog mar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi rtsa bar gyur pa'i bla ma la sogs pa dngos grub kyi gzhir gyur pas thog mar brjod par bya ste /
translated: Since the guru and so forth are the root of siddhis and the basis of siddhis, they should be mentioned first.🔽Therefore it is said:

original: de'i phyir / gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //
translated: Because the vajra holder🔽said that siddhis follow the master

original: dngos grub slob dpon rjes 'brang gsum //🔽de bas de la brnyas pa ni //
analyzed: dngos grub slob dpon rjes 'brang gsum // de bas de la brnyas pa ni //
translated: and that siddhis are attained through pleasing the master,

original: rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang por bshad //🔽ces smos te /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang por bshad //🔽ces smos te /
translated: disrespecting him is explained as the first root downfall.

original: thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub slob dpon las thob par gsungs te /
analyzed: thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub slob dpon las thob par gsungs te /
translated: It is taught that the common and supreme feats are obtained from the master.
