analyzed: dam tshig phog na gnyis rdzogs dang sum rdzogs kyi tshul gyis mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: and is given the pledges, one should accomplish the supreme and common siddhis through the methods of the two stages and the three perfections.

original: gal te tshul de lta bu la rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba rdzogs te /
analyzed: gal te tshul de lta bu la rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba rdzogs te /
translated: If one is complete in the root and branch pledges, the main practice and the branches,

original: nyams par gyur kyang slob dpon gnang bar gyur na bskang ba'i tshad do //
analyzed: nyams par gyur kyang slob dpon gnang bar gyur na bskang ba'i tshad do //
translated: Even if there is a transgression, if the master permits, it is the measure of restoration.

original: gnang bar ma gyur cing dus las 'das na tshad las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: gnang bar ma gyur cing dus las 'das na tshad las 'das pa'o //
translated: If there is no permission and the time has passed, it is beyond the measure.

original: bshags kyang ltung ba'i 'bras bu myong la pham par gyur pa la ni log sred can ma bshags pa ste /
analyzed: bshags kyang ltung ba'i 'bras bu myong la pham par gyur pa la ni log sred can ma bshags pa ste /
translated: Even if confessed, if the result of the downfall is experienced, and if it is a defeating offense, it is not confessed by one with wrong views.

original: de'i rnam smin rdo rje'i dmyal ba myong ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i rnam smin rdo rje'i dmyal ba myong ba yin no //
translated: Its full ripening is experienced in the vajra hell.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi rgya cher bshad pa las ni snying rje dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas rdzu 'phrul la sogs pas gang zag de lta bu yang sbyor bas bskang ba'i tshad dang ldan pa ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi rgya cher bshad pa las ni snying rje dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas rdzu 'phrul la sogs pas gang zag de lta bu yang sbyor bas bskang ba'i tshad dang ldan pa ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: In the Extensive Explanation of the Sixteen Bodhisattvas, it says that a practitioner who has compassion, by means of miracles and so forth, should restore the person who has the measure of engagement.

original: de nas yi ge'i don bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas yi ge'i don bshad par bya ste /
translated: Next, the meaning of the words will be explained.

original: gang zhes bya ba ni bod pa'i tshig ste dang bo'o //
analyzed: gang zhes bya ba ni bod pa'i tshig ste dang bo'o //
translated: “ Whoever” is the Tibetan word for “first.”

original: phyir zhes bya ba ni ched kyi don to //
analyzed: phyir zhes bya ba ni ched kyi don to //
translated: “ For” is the purpose.

original: rdo rje ni thabs dang shes rab ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni thabs dang shes rab ste /
translated: “ Vajra” is method and wisdom.

original: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Because it holds that, it is a vajra holder.

original: dngos grub kyi don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of “attainment” has already been explained.

original: gong du bstan pa'i dngos grub de bla ma la rag las pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gong du bstan pa'i dngos grub de bla ma la rag las pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang zhes bshad do //
translated: Since that attainment taught above depends on the guru, it is said to be “followed.”

original: de yis de la brnyas pas ltung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yis de la brnyas pas ltung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By despising him, one falls.

original: ltung ba dang po'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: ltung ba dang po'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the first downfall.

original: // / da ni ltung ba gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the definition of the second downfall should be explained.

original: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa ni //
analyzed: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa ni //
translated: Transgressing the word of the Sugata

original: ltung ba gnyis pa yin par bshad //
analyzed: ltung ba gnyis pa yin par bshad //
translated: is explained as the second downfall.

original: ces bya ba smos pa yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba smos pa yin te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: “ Sugata” is Great Vajradhara.

original: de yang gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis ni sngar spyad pa la @206b sogs pa med pas dgag pa med par lam dang 'jug pa bde bas 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi sar gshegs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis ni sngar spyad pa la @206b sogs pa med pas dgag pa med par lam dang 'jug pa bde bas 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi sar gshegs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Moreover, by the method of mantra, since there is no need for prior conduct, and so on, there is no prohibition, and since the path and engagement are easy, the meaning of “gone to the stage of buddhahood, the result” is taught.

original: de yang gang zhe na rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / de'i ye shes kyi cha'o //
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / de'i ye shes kyi cha'o //
translated: Moreover, what is that? It is Vajradhara and his gnosis aspect.

original: de yang gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de yang gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las /
translated: The Tantra of the Complete Perfection of Secrets states:

original: sdom pa'i tshul khrims sngar bshad med //
analyzed: sdom pa'i tshul khrims sngar bshad med //
translated: The ethical discipline of vows has not been explained before.

original: thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas //
translated: The method and wisdom united

original: gsang sngags tshul nyid bde bas 'grub //
analyzed: gsang sngags tshul nyid bde bas 'grub //
translated: are accomplished by the bliss of the way of secret mantra.

original: 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
translated: The result is the vajra holder,

original: 'di ni gzhan don lhun gyis grub //🔽ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan don lhun gyis grub // ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: who spontaneously benefits others.

original: de bas na de'i bka' las 'das pa ni ltung ba ste /
analyzed: de bas na de'i bka' las 'das pa ni ltung ba ste /
translated: Thus, to transgress his word is a downfall.

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' ni dgongs pa sna tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' ni dgongs pa sna tshogs pa ste /
translated: The word of the Sugata has various intentions:🔽interpretable meaning and definitive meaning,🔽intentional explanations and nonintentional explanations,🔽explanations of the meaning and explanations of the meaning by implication,

original: drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / dgongs te bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin par bshad pa dang / don du bshad pa dang / don gcus te bshad pa dang / spyi'i don du bshad pa dang / yan lag gi don du bshad pa dang /
analyzed: drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / dgongs te bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin par bshad pa dang / don du bshad pa dang / don gcus te bshad pa dang / spyi'i don du bshad pa dang / yan lag gi don du bshad pa dang /
translated: general explanations and explanations of the branches,🔽and explanations of the ultimate.

original: slob ma la bshad pa dang / tshogs la bshad pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis sgra ji bzhin du bshad pa dang / sgra ji bzhin ma yin par bshad pa ste /
analyzed: slob ma la bshad pa dang / tshogs la bshad pa dang / gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis sgra ji bzhin du bshad pa dang / sgra ji bzhin ma yin par bshad pa ste /
translated: The explanation for disciples, the explanation for the assembly, the literal explanation by means of the secret mantra, and the non-literal explanation.

original: gdul bya'i snod kyi rim pas ko ta khya la sogs pa brda'i don sna tshogs kyis bshad pa dang / de'i phyir na gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di shin tu zab ste /
analyzed: gdul bya'i snod kyi rim pas ko ta khya la sogs pa brda'i don sna tshogs kyis bshad pa dang / de'i phyir na gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di shin tu zab ste /
translated: Since the sequence of the vessel of the disciple is explained with various symbolic meanings, such as koṭi, this way of the secret mantra is extremely profound.

original: de'i phyir sgra'i don la 'jug cing yang dag pa'i don la rmongs pas gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'brangs nas bka' log par spyad pas de'i phyir bka' las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra'i don la 'jug cing yang dag pa'i don la rmongs pas gzhan dang gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su 'brangs nas bka' log par spyad pas de'i phyir bka' las 'das pa'o //
translated: Therefore, since one is confused about the meaning of the words and the correct meaning, one follows the words of others and practices the opposite of the teachings. Therefore, one transgresses the teachings.

original: de ltar yang theg pa bla na med pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de ltar yang theg pa bla na med pa'i rgyud las /
translated: Thus, it says in the Tantra of the Supreme Vehicle:

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa rab tu nyon //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa rab tu nyon //
translated: Listen, Vajra Holder!

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bstan pa la //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bstan pa la //
translated: Thus, in the teachings of the Buddha,

original: theg chen chos la rab zhugs kyang //
analyzed: theg chen chos la rab zhugs kyang //
translated: although one has entered the Dharma of the Great Vehicle,

original: de don gsal bar mi shes pas //
analyzed: de don gsal bar mi shes pas //
translated: since one does not understand the meaning,

original: sngags kyi tshul ni rtogs dka' ste //
analyzed: sngags kyi tshul ni rtogs dka' ste //
translated: the way of the mantra is difficult to understand.

original: brda dang dgongs pas bshad pa dang // ji bzhin sgra min drang po'i don //
analyzed: brda dang dgongs pas bshad pa dang // ji bzhin sgra min drang po'i don //
translated: The interpretable meaning is taught by means of symbols and intentions,🔽and is not the literal meaning.

original: dngos po'i don la mi dpyod par //
analyzed: dngos po'i don la mi dpyod par //
translated: Without analyzing the meaning of the facts,

original: sgra dang tshig gi rjes su 'brang //
analyzed: sgra dang tshig gi rjes su 'brang //
translated: one follows after words and phrases.

original: phyi rol bstan bcos la dga' zhing //
analyzed: phyi rol bstan bcos la dga' zhing //
translated: Delighting in external treatises,

original: tshig gi bdud rtsi rgyab kyis phyogs //
analyzed: tshig gi bdud rtsi rgyab kyis phyogs //
translated: one turns one’s back on the nectar of the words.

original: de la dngos grub mi 'byung ste //
analyzed: de la dngos grub mi 'byung ste //
translated: There, one will not attain power,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa spong bar 'gyur //
translated: and will abandon the vajra holder.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / rdo rje gyur pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / rdo rje gyur pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las /
translated: And the Tantra of the Vajra-Holder’s Perfect Abiding says:

original: yang dag don la mi chags par //🔽log @207a * //
analyzed: yang dag don la mi chags par // log @207a * //
translated: Without attachment to the meaning of reality,

original: pa'i don la mngon dga' bas //
analyzed: pa'i don la mngon dga' bas //
translated: one delights in the manifest meaning of error,

original: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa yin //
analyzed: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa yin //
translated: and transgresses the Sugata’s word.

original: sa gzhi lcags bzhin mnar med skye //
analyzed: sa gzhi lcags bzhin mnar med skye //
translated: One is born in the Avīci hell, as if the earth were iron.

original: zhes pa dang / rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: zhes pa dang / rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgyud las kyang /
translated: And the Vajra Wheel Tantra also says:

original: gang zhig gang la mngon zhen pa //
analyzed: gang zhig gang la mngon zhen pa //
translated: Wherever there is manifest clinging,

original: de la bde ba'i don mi gnas //
analyzed: de la bde ba'i don mi gnas //
translated: there is no meaning of bliss.

original: de phir gzungs la zhen mi bya //
analyzed: de phir gzungs la zhen mi bya //
translated: Therefore, do not cling to the dhāraṇī.

original: 'dod chags zhes sdang lam dag gis //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhes sdang lam dag gis //
translated: Through the paths of desire and hatred,

original: tshig gi don la chags mi bya //
analyzed: tshig gi don la chags mi bya //
translated: Do not be attached to the meaning of the words.

original: chags na bde gshegs bka' las 'das //
analyzed: chags na bde gshegs bka' las 'das //
translated: If you are attached, you transgress the speech of the Sugata.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / rtog pa zhib pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / rtog pa zhib pa'i rgyud las /
translated: And the Detailed Analysis Tantra says:

original: stong pa nyid du mi lta zhing //
analyzed: stong pa nyid du mi lta zhing //
translated: Do not view it as emptiness.

original: mtshon ma dag tu lta mi bya //
analyzed: mtshon ma dag tu lta mi bya //
translated: Do not view it as a symbol.

original: zab pa'i sgra la mi zhen cing //
analyzed: zab pa'i sgra la mi zhen cing //
translated: Do not be attached to the sound of “profound.”

original: rtsa dang dbugs kyi skor bzlog kyang ;
analyzed: rtsa dang dbugs kyi skor bzlog kyang ;
translated: Even if you reverse the circulation of the channels and breath,

original: / dngos po yin te zhen mi bya //
analyzed: / dngos po yin te zhen mi bya //
translated: do not be attached to the thought “It is real.”🔽Whoever is attached

original: gang zhig mngon par zhen pa dang // bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig mngon par zhen pa dang // bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa'o //
translated: transgresses the speech of the Sugata.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang rin po che phung po'i mdo las /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang rin po che phung po'i mdo las /
translated: And the Heap of Jewels Sutra says:

original: sh'a ri'i bu don la rton la cig / ye shes la rton la rnam par shes pa lam rton cig nges pa'i don la rton la drang ba'i don la ma rton cig / chos la rton la gang zag lam rton cig ces 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu don la rton la cig / ye shes la rton la rnam par shes pa lam rton cig nges pa'i don la rton la drang ba'i don la ma rton cig / chos la rton la gang zag lam rton cig ces 'byung ba dang /
translated: “Śāriputra, rely on the meaning, not on consciousness. Rely on wisdom, not on consciousness. Rely on the definitive meaning, not on the provisional meaning. Rely on the Dharma, not on the person.”🔽And also:

original: gzhan yang / dge slong dag gam mkhas rnams kyis //
analyzed: gzhan yang / dge slong dag gam mkhas rnams kyis //
translated: The learned bhikṣus

original: bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du //
analyzed: bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du //
translated: are like gold: they are burned, cut, and rubbed.

original: yongs su brtags nas nga yi bka' blang bar bya yis gus phyir min //
analyzed: yongs su brtags nas nga yi bka' blang bar bya yis gus phyir min //
translated: Having examined, one should accept my word, not out of respect.

original: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang byams ma'i bu gang po 'jig rten bdag gi sgra'i don la mngon par zhen pas phal cher ngan song gsum du skye ste de dag thams cad kyang phal cher bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las byung ba'i don byang chub tu sems bskyod pa dang /
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang byams ma'i bu gang po 'jig rten bdag gi sgra'i don la mngon par zhen pas phal cher ngan song gsum du skye ste de dag thams cad kyang phal cher bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' las byung ba'i don byang chub tu sems bskyod pa dang /
translated: Moreover, Pūrṇa Maitrāyaṇī­putra, due to their attachment to the meaning of the words of the self of the world, most are born in the three lower realms. All of them, for the most part, generate the thought of awakening, which is the meaning that occurs in the words of the Tathāgata,

original: sems can gyi don bya ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu bar bya ba dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par spang ba dang / sa dang lam rnam par spong zhing byang chub kyi spyod pa bor nas /
analyzed: sems can gyi don bya ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu bar bya ba dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par spang ba dang / sa dang lam rnam par spong zhing byang chub kyi spyod pa bor nas /
translated: and they engage in benefiting sentient beings, gathering them with the four means of gathering, and they abandon the perfections such as generosity, abandon the grounds and paths, and cast aside the conduct of awakening.

original: log pa'i don la mngon par zhen pa yod de de'i rgyus ngan song du skye ste /
analyzed: log pa'i don la mngon par zhen pa yod de de'i rgyus ngan song du skye ste /
translated: They are attached to the meaning of the reverse. Due to that cause, they are born in the lower realms.

original: de bka' las mi 'byung ba'i chos rnams spyad pa'i nyes pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bka' las mi 'byung ba'i chos rnams spyad pa'i nyes pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is the fault of engaging in Dharmas that do not occur in the word of the Buddha.”

original: bdag cag la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi lam la dad pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po'i don la rnam par phye ste yang dag pa'i don la 'jug par bya'o /🔽de gang zhig bka' don la rmongs @207b pas dgongs te bstan pa la mngon par 'chel nas spyad par bya ba ma yin pa'i spyod pa la mngon par zhen na de nyid kyi bka' las 'das pas de'i phyir bla ma dam pa nye bar bsten la rgyud kyi
analyzed: bdag cag la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi lam la dad pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po'i don la rnam par phye ste yang dag pa'i don la 'jug par bya'o / de gang zhig bka' don la rmongs @207b pas dgongs te bstan pa la mngon par 'chel nas spyad par bya ba ma yin pa'i spyod pa la mngon par zhen na de nyid kyi bka' las 'das pas de'i phyir bla ma dam pa nye bar bsten la rgyud kyi
translated: We who have faith in the path of yoga should also analyze the meaning of the Great Vehicle and enter into the true meaning.

original: don shes par bya ste /
analyzed: don shes par bya ste /
translated: If someone, confused about the meaning of the Buddha's words, is attached to a practice that is not to be practiced because of misunderstanding the teachings that are intentionally-based, then because of transgressing the Buddha's words, he should rely on a holy guru and understand the meaning of the tantra.

original: spyad par bya ba dang spyad par bya ba ma yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: spyad par bya ba dang spyad par bya ba ma yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: He should understand what is to be practiced and what is not to be practiced.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang lam du khyer pa ni gdul bya drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang lam du khyer pa ni gdul bya drang ba'i don to //
translated: Taking desire and hatred onto the path is for the purpose of guiding those to be trained.

original: gzhan du stong pa nyid la goms pas nyon mongs pa'i mtha' shes pas dug sngags kyis btul ba bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan du stong pa nyid la goms pas nyon mongs pa'i mtha' shes pas dug sngags kyis btul ba bzhin no //
translated: Otherwise, by becoming familiar with emptiness, the end of the afflictions is known, like subduing poison with a mantra.

original: 'di ni brtan pa thob pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: 'di ni brtan pa thob pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: This is for those who have attained stability.

original: de skad du /
analyzed: de skad du /
translated: As is said:

original: thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
analyzed: thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
translated: For those who have the great means,

original: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
analyzed: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
translated: The afflictions become the branches of enlightenment.

original: 'khor ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid la //
analyzed: 'khor ba zhi ba'i bdag nyid la //
translated: Samsara has the nature of peace,

original: sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug bzhin no //
analyzed: sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug bzhin no //
translated: Like poison destroyed by a mantra.

original: zhes bshad pas so //
analyzed: zhes bshad pas so //
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: gzhan yang don de nyid la dgongs nas bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyud las /
analyzed: gzhan yang don de nyid la dgongs nas bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i rgyud las /

analyzed: ji ltar mar dang kar dang // sbrang rtsi 'o ma la sogs pa //
translated: Just as butter, sugar, honey, milk, and so forth,

original: 'thungs te zhu na sman du 'gyur //
analyzed: 'thungs te zhu na sman du 'gyur //
translated: When drunk and digested become medicine,

original: ma zhu dug tu 'gro zhes bya /
analyzed: ma zhu dug tu 'gro zhes bya /
translated: But undigested become poison,

original: de bzhin gsang sngags theg chen 'di //
analyzed: de bzhin gsang sngags theg chen 'di //
translated: So it is with this Secret Mantra Mahāyāna.

original: mkhas pa rnams kyi sman yin te //🔽brda dang don la rab rmongs pa'i //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams kyi sman yin te // brda dang don la rab rmongs pa'i //
translated: For the wise it is medicine,🔽But for those completely ignorant of the words and meanings,

analyzed: bris pas 'dod pas sgra don 'brangs //

original: tshul bzhin ma yin log spyad pas //
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin log spyad pas //

analyzed: dug gis 'chi dang ltung bar 'gyur //

original: kha cig dug gi dbang gis 'tsho //
analyzed: kha cig dug gi dbang gis 'tsho //

original: kha cig dug gi rkyen gyis 'chi //
analyzed: kha cig dug gi rkyen gyis 'chi //
translated: Some die from the conditions of poison.

original: nga yi bstan pa'i snyigs ma la //
analyzed: nga yi bstan pa'i snyigs ma la //
translated: In the degenerate age of my teachings,

original: tshong dus kyi ni 'o ma bzhin //
analyzed: tshong dus kyi ni 'o ma bzhin //
translated: like milk in the marketplace,

original: bslad nas thur du ltung bar byed //
analyzed: bslad nas thur du ltung bar byed //
translated: it is adulterated and falls to the ground.

analyzed: ces 'byung ste /
translated: This is stated.

original: 'di ni don gzhan la dgongs pa med pas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni don gzhan la dgongs pa med pas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Since this does not have another meaning, it should be adopted.

original: yang na ltung ba dang @209b po'i bshad pa'i gsum ldan gyi cha gcig nas brtsis pas rnam par phye 'di'i bskang tshad yin no //
analyzed: yang na ltung ba dang @209b po'i bshad pa'i gsum ldan gyi cha gcig nas brtsis pas rnam par phye 'di'i bskang tshad yin no //
translated: Or else, the measure of restoration is the analysis of this, beginning with one part that has the three: the downfall, the explanation, and the restoration.

original: 'di yang bdun dang ldan pa'i sbyor bas ltung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di yang bdun dang ldan pa'i sbyor bas ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: This also becomes a downfall through the application of the seven:

original: rdo rje spun yin zhing nyon mongs pas bslang ba dang / der 'du shes pa dang / sbyor ba gnyis pa bstan pa dang / rang dus 'das pa dang / yid la mi gcags pa dang / yi rang ba dang / ma 'khrul pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje spun yin zhing nyon mongs pas bslang ba dang / der 'du shes pa dang / sbyor ba gnyis pa bstan pa dang / rang dus 'das pa dang / yid la mi gcags pa dang / yi rang ba dang / ma 'khrul pa'o //
translated: being a vajra sibling, being motivated by affliction, perceiving that, teaching the second application, transgressing at the proper time, not regretting it, rejoicing in it, and not being mistaken.

original: 'di'i pham pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i pham pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'o //
translated: This is concordant with the defeat.

original: don 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: don 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This meaning is taught as follows.

original: rdo rje theg pa la dam tshig gi dbye ba la gnyis te /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa la dam tshig gi dbye ba la gnyis te /
translated: In the Vajra Vehicle, there are two kinds of divisions of pledges:

original: rtsa ba dang yan lag go //
analyzed: rtsa ba dang yan lag go //
translated: root and branch.

original: rnam par phye ba ni de'i yan lag gi bye brag go //
analyzed: rnam par phye ba ni de'i yan lag gi bye brag go //
translated: The distinctions are the specific branches.

original: de skad du yang slob dpon mtsho skyes kyis rnam par bsdus pa las /
analyzed: de skad du yang slob dpon mtsho skyes kyis rnam par bsdus pa las /
translated: Thus, Master Saroruha's Compendium of Practice says:

original: dngos grub thams cad gzhir gyur pa //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad gzhir gyur pa //
translated: The basis for all powers

original: rtsa ba dang ni yan lag go //
analyzed: rtsa ba dang ni yan lag go //
translated: is the root and the branches.

original: rtsa ba dus 'das pham pa 'dra //
analyzed: rtsa ba dus 'das pham pa 'dra //
translated: The root is like a defeat if transgressed;

original: tshad ldan ltung bar bshad pa yin //
analyzed: tshad ldan ltung bar bshad pa yin //
translated: it is explained as a downfall if not.

original: yan lag rtsa ba dus 'das pa //
analyzed: yan lag rtsa ba dus 'das pa //
translated: The branch is like a defeat if transgressed;

original: lci ba zhes ni bshad pa ste //
analyzed: lci ba zhes ni bshad pa ste //
translated: it is explained as a serious downfall if not.

original: sbyor ba ma rdzogs sbom po'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ma rdzogs sbom po'o //
translated: If the performance is incomplete, it is a gross downfall.

original: yan lag phra ba nyes byas so //
analyzed: yan lag phra ba nyes byas so //
translated: The branch is a minor offense.

original: phra mo'i phra ba dkyil 'khor gcig / nyes pa med pa gnang la sogs //
analyzed: phra mo'i phra ba dkyil 'khor gcig / nyes pa med pa gnang la sogs //
translated: The minor of the minor is not an offense, such as in the case of permission.

original: zhes bshad pa'i phyir rigs gnyis su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'i phyir rigs gnyis su shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, it should be understood that there are two kinds of pledges.

original: yang de nyid las bshags tshad bstan pa /
analyzed: yang de nyid las bshags tshad bstan pa /
translated: The same text also teaches the measure of confession:

original: pham pa rdzu 'phrul sogs kyis 'dul //
analyzed: pham pa rdzu 'phrul sogs kyis 'dul //
translated: A defeat is overcome by miracles and so forth;

original: ltung ba dbang gi rim pas so //
analyzed: ltung ba dbang gi rim pas so //
translated: a downfall is by the stages of empowerment.

original: lci ba tshogs kyi 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: lci ba tshogs kyi 'khor lo ste //
translated: The heavy one is the gaṇacakra.

original: sbom po tshogs pa'i nang du mchod //
analyzed: sbom po tshogs pa'i nang du mchod //
translated: The gross one is worshipped in the midst of the assembly.

original: yan lag tshogs la bshags pa ste //
analyzed: yan lag tshogs la bshags pa ste //
translated: The branch one is confessed to the assembly.

original: nyes byas phra mo'i dkyil 'khor sogs //
analyzed: nyes byas phra mo'i dkyil 'khor sogs //
translated: The minor misdeed is the maṇḍala and so on.

original: nyes pa med pa mkhas pas brtag //
analyzed: nyes pa med pa mkhas pas brtag //
translated: The wise one is examined without fault.

original: nyes pa chung du phra mo yang //
analyzed: nyes pa chung du phra mo yang //
translated: Even the smallest misdeed

original: gong bzhin 'dud pa 'dzin na lci //
analyzed: gong bzhin 'dud pa 'dzin na lci //
translated: is heavy if held with the above bowing.

original: gong bzhin dngos po lci 'gyur yang //
analyzed: gong bzhin dngos po lci 'gyur yang //
translated: Even though the substance is heavy as above,

original: mi 'jigs ster zhing gsong por smra //
analyzed: mi 'jigs ster zhing gsong por smra //
translated: it is given fearlessly and with open speech.

original: de sogs ma go bshad pa yang //
analyzed: de sogs ma go bshad pa yang //
translated: And so on, the explanation of what is not understood

original: phyir zhing sdom pa dga' ba ni //
analyzed: phyir zhing sdom pa dga' ba ni //
translated: is the joy of the vow again and again.

original: nyes pa che yang yang bar bshad //
analyzed: nyes pa che yang yang bar bshad //
translated: Even though the fault is great, it is explained as light.

original: bshags kyang mdud par 'dzin byed na //
analyzed: bshags kyang mdud par 'dzin byed na //
translated: If one holds the knot even though confessed,

original: nyes pa chung yang lci bar bshad //
analyzed: nyes pa chung yang lci bar bshad //
translated: even a small fault is explained as heavy.

original: khyad du bsad de ma bshags na //
analyzed: khyad du bsad de ma bshags na //
translated: If one does not confess with contempt,

original: nyes pa chung yang lci bar bshad //
analyzed: nyes pa chung yang lci bar bshad //
translated: even a small fault is explained as heavy.

original: rtag tu 'dzem zhing 'jigs 'gyur na //
analyzed: rtag tu 'dzem zhing 'jigs 'gyur na //
translated: If one is always careful and fearful,

original: nyon mongs zil non nyes 'byung yang //
analyzed: nyon mongs zil non nyes 'byung yang //
translated: even though a fault arises from being overwhelmed by afflictions,

original: nyes pa che bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyes pa che bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it will not become a great fault.

original: de bas grogs la sogs pa brtag //
analyzed: de bas grogs la sogs pa brtag //
translated: Therefore, examine the friends and so on.

original: @210a * // ces 'byung bas rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o //
analyzed: @210a * // ces 'byung bas rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is explained by analyzing it.

original: phal cher ltung ba dang po las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: phal cher ltung ba dang po las shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood for the most part from the first downfall.

original: shan 'dra ba ni phyogs su bsdu'o //
analyzed: shan 'dra ba ni phyogs su bsdu'o //
translated: The similar class is included in the direction.

original: dam pa rnams kyi nyes pa mi 'byung ba la 'bad par bya'o //
analyzed: dam pa rnams kyi nyes pa mi 'byung ba la 'bad par bya'o //
translated: The holy ones should strive to prevent faults from arising.

original: byung yang dus ma yol bar chad du bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: byung yang dus ma yol bar chad du bshags par bya'o //
translated: Even if they do arise, they should be confessed before the end of the day.

original: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa yang shes pas brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa yang shes pas brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should also examine what should and should not be done.

original: gzhan du na ltung ba rnam bar gzhag pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: gzhan du na ltung ba rnam bar gzhag pa'i rgyud las /
translated: Otherwise, the Tantra of the Presentation of Downfalls states:

original: dkyil 'khor thar pa'i grong mchog 'dir //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thar pa'i grong mchog 'dir //
translated: Those who enter this supreme mandala of liberation

original: zhugs pa dang ni dbang bskur bas //
analyzed: zhugs pa dang ni dbang bskur bas //
translated: and are conferred empowerment

original: phyir ldog pa ni yong ma yin //
analyzed: phyir ldog pa ni yong ma yin //
translated: will never turn back.

original: 'dir zhugs bu rnams skad cig kyang //
analyzed: 'dir zhugs bu rnams skad cig kyang //
translated: The moment the children enter here,

original: 'bral med 'og min gnas su 'gro //
analyzed: 'bral med 'og min gnas su 'gro //
translated: they will go to the Akaniṣhṭha realm without separation.

original: nyams nas 'bral bar gyur pa na //
analyzed: nyams nas 'bral bar gyur pa na //
translated: If they fall and become separated,

original: thur du bltas nas dmyal bar 'gro //
analyzed: thur du bltas nas dmyal bar 'gro //
translated: they will look down and go to hell.

original: zhes bshad pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pas shes par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood.

original: de'i phyir / rdo rje spun la khros pa ni sems khong nas 'khrugs shing mnar sems dgu dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rdo rje spun la khros pa ni sems khong nas 'khrugs shing mnar sems dgu dang ldan pa'o //
translated: to be angry with a vajra sibling is to be deeply disturbed in mind and to have the nine kinds of malice.

original: 'dir lus ngag gtso bo ma yin pas phal cher ltung ba'i sems la bzhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir lus ngag gtso bo ma yin pas phal cher ltung ba'i sems la bzhag pa'o //
translated: Here, since body and speech are not primary, the downfall is mainly considered in terms of the mind.

original: nyes pa ni 'dod pa ma yin par ltung ba'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni 'dod pa ma yin par ltung ba'o //
translated: The “fault” is the downfall.

original: ltung ba gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: ltung ba gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the third downfall.

original: // / da ni ltung ba bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the defining characteristics of the fourth downfall will be explained:

original: sems can rnams la byams sems spong //
analyzed: sems can rnams la byams sems spong //
translated: To abandon loving thoughts for sentient beings

original: bzhi pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: bzhi pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: is the fourth, the Victor has said.

original: zhes bya bas bshad de /
analyzed: zhes bya bas bshad de /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: 'dir sems can gyi khams gsum pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir sems can gyi khams gsum pa ste /
translated: Here, the realm of sentient beings is the three realms.

original: rang gi de nyid ma rtogs pas 'khrul ba'i dbang gis sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi de nyid ma rtogs pas 'khrul ba'i dbang gis sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: They are suffering by the power of delusion, because they have not realized their own suchness.

original: theg pa chen pos snying rje dang byams pa dang skad cig kyang bral bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: theg pa chen pos snying rje dang byams pa dang skad cig kyang bral bar mi bya ste /
translated: One should not be separated even for a moment from compassion and loving kindness through the Great Vehicle,

original: gzhan gyi don du zhugs pas bu gcig pa la sdug pa'i ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don du zhugs pas bu gcig pa la sdug pa'i ma bzhin no //
translated: because one is engaged in the welfare of others, like a loving mother for her only son.

original: de bas na gzhan gyi don mthong na bdag nyid kyi lus dang srog la ma chags pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na gzhan gyi don mthong na bdag nyid kyi lus dang srog la ma chags pa ste /
translated: Therefore, when seeing the benefit for others, one should not be attached to one’s own body and life.

original: gzhan du theg pa chen po rnam par spangs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du theg pa chen po rnam par spangs pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, one would abandon the Great Vehicle.

original: de yang yul rnam pa gsum la khyad par mi rtog par snyoms par rgyu snying rje'i stobs kyis don la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de yang yul rnam pa gsum la khyad par mi rtog par snyoms par rgyu snying rje'i stobs kyis don la 'jug pa ste /
translated: Moreover, one engages in the benefit of others through the power of compassion, without discriminating among the three objects.

original: de bas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'dod pas ci'i phyir byams pa dang snying rje don du mi gnyer /
analyzed: de bas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'dod pas ci'i phyir byams pa dang snying rje don du mi gnyer /
translated: Therefore, why would one who desires the enlightenment of the Buddhas not strive for love and compassion?

original: byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i dags khri snyan sa le yang rtag tu sems can la bu gcig pa bzhin du sems pa'i snying rje dang ldan na theg pa chen @210b po rnams kyis lta ci smos /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i dags khri snyan sa le yang rtag tu sems can la bu gcig pa bzhin du sems pa'i snying rje dang ldan na theg pa chen @210b po rnams kyis lta ci smos /
translated: If even a deer born in the animal realm always has compassion for sentient beings, as if they were her only child, what need is there to mention those in the Great Vehicle?

original: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One said:

original: sangs rgyas byang chub 'dod pa yis //🔽rtsa ba chad pa'i zhe sdang ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub 'dod pa yis // rtsa ba chad pa'i zhe sdang ni //
translated: Those who desire the enlightenment of the Buddhas🔽Should not rely for even a moment

original: skad cig tsam yang bsten mi bya //
analyzed: skad cig tsam yang bsten mi bya //
translated: On the hatred that severs the root.

original: sems 'khrugs pa la thar lam med //
analyzed: sems 'khrugs pa la thar lam med //
translated: There is no path to liberation for the disturbed mind.🔽

original: ces bstan to //
analyzed: ces bstan to //
translated: There is no path to liberation for the disturbed mind.

original: gzhan yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams kyis ni 'dod chags kyi phung po ri rab tsam ni bla'i zhes dang skad cig ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams kyis ni 'dod chags kyi phung po ri rab tsam ni bla'i zhes dang skad cig ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, those who have generated the mind of enlightenment should prefer a mass of desire the size of Mount Meru, but not a moment of anger.🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / sems bskyed pas ni gzhan don phyir //
analyzed: de'i phyir / sems bskyed pas ni gzhan don phyir //
translated: through generating the mind of enlightenment,

original: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod //
translated: one desires perfect complete enlightenment for the sake of others.

original: ces bsten pa gzhan gyi don ni byams pa dang snying rjes rjes su gzung ge zhe sdang gis gzhan don byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ces bsten pa gzhan gyi don ni byams pa dang snying rjes rjes su gzung ge zhe sdang gis gzhan don byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The benefit of others is to be cared for through love and compassion, not through anger.

original: gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo dang rgyud mtha' dag las zhe sdang spang zhing byams pa dang snying rje bsten par gsungs pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo dang rgyud mtha' dag las zhe sdang spang zhing byams pa dang snying rje bsten par gsungs pa shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, one should understand that all the Mahayana sutras and tantras teach that one should abandon anger and rely on love and compassion.

original: 'dir yang sbyor ba bdun dang ldan pas nyes pa ci byung ba'ang gong du bsten pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang sbyor ba bdun dang ldan pas nyes pa ci byung ba'ang gong du bsten pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, one should understand that whatever faults occur are due to not having the seven practices.

original: 'dir mnar sems dgu dang ldan pa ni ltung ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir mnar sems dgu dang ldan pa ni ltung ba'o //
translated: Here, having the nine states of mind that are harmful is a downfall.

original: sems khong nas 'khrugs pa ni sbom po'o //
analyzed: sems khong nas 'khrugs pa ni sbom po'o //
translated: The most serious is to be mentally disturbed.

original: dus 'das su mdud par 'dzin pa ni lci ba'o //
analyzed: dus 'das su mdud par 'dzin pa ni lci ba'o //
translated: The heaviest is to hold a vow that has passed its time.

original: sbyor ba tsam nyes byas so //
analyzed: sbyor ba tsam nyes byas so //
translated: The mere preparation is a minor offense.

original: lus ngag gi nyes pa ni phra mo'o //
analyzed: lus ngag gi nyes pa ni phra mo'o //
translated: The minor is a fault of body or speech.

original: gzhan la ba'i dngos gzhi skyes pa ma bshags par mi gnang bar gyur pa dang / rang la de lta bu gzhan chos bzhin du bshags pa las rang dang gzhan dri ma las ldang bar mi byed par snang par ma gyur na pham pa'i phyogs su bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan la ba'i dngos gzhi skyes pa ma bshags par mi gnang bar gyur pa dang / rang la de lta bu gzhan chos bzhin du bshags pa las rang dang gzhan dri ma las ldang bar mi byed par snang par ma gyur na pham pa'i phyogs su bsdus pa'o //
translated: The defeat is to not confess to another person the actual basis of a vow that has arisen, to not be suspended, and to not appear to oneself or another to rise from the stain.

original: bshags pa'i tshad ni zhing bla ma dang rdo rje spun lag gang gi nyes pa bshags pa'o //
analyzed: bshags pa'i tshad ni zhing bla ma dang rdo rje spun lag gang gi nyes pa bshags pa'o //
translated: The measure of confession is to confess the faults of any field, whether a guru or vajra sibling.

original: sems can thams cad la yang zhing dang bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i nyes pa dang sbyar te nges tshangs pa sbyin pa dang / rgyun de las log pa dang / sems sun phyung ba ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la yang zhing dang bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i nyes pa dang sbyar te nges tshangs pa sbyin pa dang / rgyun de las log pa dang / sems sun phyung ba ste /
translated: Also, with regard to all sentient beings, the field, thought, and application are applied to the faults, and the vow is given, the stream is turned away from that, and the mind is disgusted.

original: sngom pa dang / 'tshogs pa la tshogs dang mandala dang / ngag gi sbyor ba dang / nor la sogs pas rjes su dga' bar bya ba dang / yul de nyid las bshags pa dang / srog chags gzhan tshe bskyab pa la sogs pas nyes pa la 'jigs shing bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: sngom pa dang / 'tshogs pa la tshogs dang mandala dang / ngag gi sbyor ba dang / nor la sogs pas rjes su dga' bar bya ba dang / yul de nyid las bshags pa dang / srog chags gzhan tshe bskyab pa la sogs pas nyes pa la 'jigs shing bshags par bya'o //
translated: One should delight them with gifts, honors, and offerings, with the practice of the six ways of gathering disciples, with mandalas, with verbal expressions of joy, with gifts of wealth, and so on. One should confess one’s faults in the presence of those very persons, and should fear and confess those faults.

original: phyogs su bsdu ba ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la tshad med bzhi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs su bsdu ba ni khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la tshad med bzhi bsgom pa'o //
translated: The universal way of gathering disciples is to cultivate the four immeasurables in relation to all sentient beings of the three world spheres.

original: khyad par du ni yul nye ba rnams @211a * //
analyzed: khyad par du ni yul nye ba rnams @211a * //
translated: The special way of gathering disciples is in relation to those who are close by.

original: la'o // slob dpon klu sgrub kyis bshad pa //
analyzed: la'o // slob dpon klu sgrub kyis bshad pa //
translated: The master Nagarjuna explains:

original: theg pa che la zhugs pa yis //
analyzed: theg pa che la zhugs pa yis //
translated: Those who have entered the Great Vehicle

original: sems can rnams la bu bzhin byams //
analyzed: sems can rnams la bu bzhin byams //
translated: love sentient beings as if they were their children.

original: snying rjes gzhan don rang srog sbyin //🔽nyan thos rnams kyang gnod las log / snod du ma gyur log sred can //
analyzed: snying rjes gzhan don rang srog sbyin // nyan thos rnams kyang gnod las log / snod du ma gyur log sred can //
translated: Out of compassion, they give away even their lives for the sake of others.🔽Even the disciples and hermit buddhas turn away from harming others.

original: nam yang dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: nam yang dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: But never abandon those who are not suitable vessels, who have wrong beliefs,🔽and who have committed evil deeds.

original: nyes pa byung na bshags par bya //
analyzed: nyes pa byung na bshags par bya //
translated: When a fault occurs, confess it.

original: snying rje byams pas zhugs gyur na //
analyzed: snying rje byams pas zhugs gyur na //
translated: When you have entered into compassion and love,

original: sngar byas nyes pa de yis ldang // bshags kyang phyir zhing mi sdom na //
analyzed: sngar byas nyes pa de yis ldang // bshags kyang phyir zhing mi sdom na //
translated: If, even though confessed, one does not refrain from it again,

original: bshags pas dri ma ldang ba med //
analyzed: bshags pas dri ma ldang ba med //
translated: the stain is not removed by confession.

original: ces bya bas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya bas bshad pa'o //
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: de bas na dam pa rnams kyis bshags te bsdam par bya'o zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de bas na dam pa rnams kyis bshags te bsdam par bya'o zhes bshad do //
translated: Therefore, the holy ones confess and restrain themselves.

original: de bas na sems can rnams zhes pa ni mang ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: de bas na sems can rnams zhes pa ni mang ba'i tshig go //
translated: Therefore, sentient beings is a word for many.

original: byams pa'i sems spong ba ni mnar sems kyi zhe sdang ngo //
analyzed: byams pa'i sems spong ba ni mnar sems kyi zhe sdang ngo //
translated: Abandoning the thought of love is the hatred of malice.

original: de sems la skyed pa ni ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de sems la skyed pa ni ltung ba'o //
translated: To generate it in the mind is the downfall.

original: yid ches par bya ba'i phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: yid ches par bya ba'i phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is the word of the Victor for the sake of instilling confidence.

original: ltung ba bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: ltung ba bzhi pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of the fourth downfall.

original: // / da ni ltung ba lnga pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba lnga pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the definition of the fifth downfall should be explained.

original: chos kyi rtsa ba byang chub sems //
analyzed: chos kyi rtsa ba byang chub sems //
translated: The root of the Dharma is the thought of awakening.

original: de spong ba ni lnga pa yin //
analyzed: de spong ba ni lnga pa yin //
translated: To abandon it is the fifth downfall.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: 'dir 'brum mang po par sbyar te /
analyzed: 'dir 'brum mang po par sbyar te /
translated: Here, it is applied as a plural.

original: bi bag sha ste /🔽skyes pa lta bu'i don to //
analyzed: bi bag sha ste / skyes pa lta bu'i don to //
translated: Vibhaṣā means🔽like a man.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: Thus it is.

original: rang bzhin gzhi mthun byang chub sems //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhi mthun byang chub sems //
translated: The nature is the common ground of enlightenment mind.

original: sgra gcig gis ni dngos rnams brjod //🔽kun rdzob la sogs dbye ba yis //
analyzed: sgra gcig gis ni dngos rnams brjod // kun rdzob la sogs dbye ba yis //
translated: One word expresses all things.

original: senta pa yi sgra bzhin no //🔽zhes 'byung ste /
analyzed: senta pa yi sgra bzhin no // zhes 'byung ste /
translated: Like the word “sentāpa”🔽By the divisions of the conventional and so forth.

original: senta pa yi gnas skabs kyis rta dang chu dang ral gri dang lan tshva'o //
analyzed: senta pa yi gnas skabs kyis rta dang chu dang ral gri dang lan tshva'o //
translated: “Sentāpa” is a word that means “horse,” “water,” “sword,” and “salt,” depending on the context.

original: 'dir yang don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi dbye bas so //
analyzed: 'dir yang don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi dbye bas so //
translated: Here, it is by the divisions of the ultimate and the conventional.

original: 'dir don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems spong ba ni rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad la ye shes gnas pa ma rtogs par spong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems spong ba ni rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad la ye shes gnas pa ma rtogs par spong ba'o //
translated: Here, the ultimate bodhicitta is rejected by those who do not realize the primordial wisdom that abides in all sentient beings by nature.🔽Therefore it is explained:

original: de'i phyir / rgyu dang mi rgyu'i dngos po kun //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rgyu dang mi rgyu'i dngos po kun //
translated: All things, animate and inanimate,

original: khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis //
analyzed: khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis //
translated: are pervaded by Vajrasattva.

original: gzod gnas dag pa'i ye shes gnas //
analyzed: gzod gnas dag pa'i ye shes gnas //
translated: Primordial wisdom abides in purity.

original: thabs gzhan sangs rgyas mi rnyed do //🔽zhes bshad pa dang / ji ltar mar la mar bzhag bzhin //
analyzed: thabs gzhan sangs rgyas mi rnyed do // zhes bshad pa dang / ji ltar mar la mar bzhag bzhin //
translated: The buddhas do not find any other method.🔽And:🔽Just as butter is placed in milk

original: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag bzhin //
translated: and water is placed in water,

original: rang gi ye shes de rtogs bya //
analyzed: rang gi ye shes de rtogs bya //
translated: so is one’s wisdom realized.

original: zhes bya bas kyang bshad la /🔽rang gi ye shes gang yin pa //
analyzed: zhes bya bas kyang bshad la / rang gi ye shes gang yin pa //
translated: And:🔽The realization of one's own pristine consciousness

original: de rtogs pa ni 'dir phyag @211b yin //
analyzed: de rtogs pa ni 'dir phyag @211b yin //
translated: is the homage here.🔽Since the essence of enlightenment, the pristine consciousness of the buddhas, exists in the continuums of all sentient beings, if that is realized, all sentient beings will attain nirvāṇa.

original: zhes 'byung bas sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la byang chub kyi snying po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gnas pas de rtogs na sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa dang / gzhan yang 'di ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang rgyud mtha' dag nas gsal bar bsten pas de'i phyir yul stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: zhes 'byung bas sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la byang chub kyi snying po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gnas pas de rtogs na sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa dang / gzhan yang 'di ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang rgyud mtha' dag nas gsal bar bsten pas de'i phyir yul stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Furthermore, since this is clearly explained in all the sūtras and tantras of the Mahāyāna, the emptiness of the object and the naturally luminous subject are nondual.

original: yul can rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba gnyis tha dad pa med pa ni byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: yul can rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba gnyis tha dad pa med pa ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: That is the mind of enlightenment.

original: de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pas de la mi mos shing spong ba chos kyi rtsa ba spong ba'o //
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pas de la mi mos shing spong ba chos kyi rtsa ba spong ba'o //
translated: Since that is the root of all the qualities of the buddhas, those who do not aspire to that and abandon it abandon the root of the Dharma.

original: de ma rtogs na thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa mi thob ste /
analyzed: de ma rtogs na thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa mi thob ste /
translated: If that is not realized, liberation and omniscience are not attained.

original: de'i phyir nyan thos kyis kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi bye brag rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyan thos kyis kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi bye brag rtogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the śrāvakas also realize the particularities of the dharmadhātu.

original: de skad du slob dpon klu sgrub kyis /
analyzed: de skad du slob dpon klu sgrub kyis /
translated: As the master Nāgārjuna says:

original: skye med rtogs pas mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: skye med rtogs pas mya ngan 'das //
translated: Through realizing nonarising, one attains nirvāṇa.

original: nyan thos gang zag bdag med pas //🔽chos dbyings bye brag rtogs pas thar //🔽mkhas pas rang sems dag la brtag / rang sangs rgyas kyi bye brag cha //
analyzed: nyan thos gang zag bdag med pas // chos dbyings bye brag rtogs pas thar // mkhas pas rang sems dag la brtag / rang sangs rgyas kyi bye brag cha //
translated: The śrāvakas are liberated through realizing the selflessness of persons.🔽The wise are liberated through realizing the particularities of the dharmadhātu.

original: dngos kun skye med thams cad mkhyen //🔽zhes bshad pas khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos kun skye med thams cad mkhyen // zhes bshad pas khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: The pratyekabuddhas are distinguished by their realization of the nonarising of all things.

original: de bas na de rtogs par bya ste bye brag gi rgyud las /
analyzed: de bas na de rtogs par bya ste bye brag gi rgyud las /
translated: One should understand this through the explanation in the Tantra of the Perfected Sphere:

original: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: Enlightenment has the characteristic of space,

original: kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs //
analyzed: kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs //
translated: free from all conceptual thoughts.

original: gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa ste//
analyzed: gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa ste//
translated: Those who wish to realize that

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //🔽zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o // zhes bshad pa'o //
translated: are called bodhisattvas.

original: de bas de la smon pa dang / 'bad rtsol gyis 'jug pa dang / lam du bstan pa la 'bad par bya ste /
analyzed: de bas de la smon pa dang / 'bad rtsol gyis 'jug pa dang / lam du bstan pa la 'bad par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, one should aspire to that, engage in it through striving, and strive in the path that is taught.

original: gzhan du na de spong ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na de spong ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, it is the downfall of abandoning it.🔽Therefore,🔽he who wishes to enter into the Thought of Enlightenment

original: de'i phyir / byang chub sems la 'jug pa dang // gang zhig rtogs par 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: de'i phyir / byang chub sems la 'jug pa dang // gang zhig rtogs par 'dod pa ste //
translated: and to realize it,

original: sgrib pa thams cad sel byed cing //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad sel byed cing //
translated: he who removes all obscurations,

original: bdud rnams shin tu skrag byed de //
analyzed: bdud rnams shin tu skrag byed de //
translated: he who frightens the demons,

original: ji ltar sgron ma skyes ma thag / mun pa lo stong sel ba bzhin //
analyzed: ji ltar sgron ma skyes ma thag / mun pa lo stong sel ba bzhin //
translated: just as soon as the lamp is born, it removes the darkness of a thousand years,

original: de bzhin seng ge'i phru gus kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin seng ge'i phru gus kyang //
translated: just so, the lion cub

original: shin tu rgas pa'i gcan gzan 'jigs //
analyzed: shin tu rgas pa'i gcan gzan 'jigs //
translated: terrifies the very old beasts.

original: zhes bshad pas de ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pas de ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba'o //
translated: Thus, it is the root of all dharmas.

original: de spong ba'i ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de spong ba'i ltung ba'o //
translated: It is the downfall of abandoning it.

original: sgra'i don gyi kun rdzob kunda lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bya ste /
analyzed: sgra'i don gyi kun rdzob kunda lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bya ste /
translated: The conventional meaning of the word is the Thought of Enlightenment, which is like the white kunda flower.

original: de ni byang chub kyi ched du dam tshig ma dang / lag gi 'du byed kyis dor bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de ni byang chub kyi ched du dam tshig ma dang / lag gi 'du byed kyis dor bar mi bya ste /
translated: It is not to be discarded by the pledge for the sake of enlightenment, nor by the activity of the hands.

original: sems ma bltas pas kyang lces blang bar bya'o zhes bshad pas so //
analyzed: sems ma bltas pas kyang lces blang bar bya'o zhes bshad pas so //
translated: It is to be taken up by the tongue, even without looking at the mind.

original: gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang gi dus su @212a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang gi dus su @212a * //
translated: Moreover, at the time of the secret initiation,

original: goms pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dra ba phab ste sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: goms pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dra ba phab ste sbyin par bya'o //
translated: By being familiar with that, the gnosis of buddhahood is induced and given.

original: gzhan du spangs na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du spangs na ltung ba'o //
translated: If one abandons it otherwise, there is a downfall.

original: gzhan du shes rab ye shes dang / dam tshig ma las rnal 'byor goms par byed pas ni spong bar thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud las bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du shes rab ye shes dang / dam tshig ma las rnal 'byor goms par byed pas ni spong bar thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud las bstan pa'o //
translated: In other tantras of method and wisdom, it is taught that one should abandon it by being familiar with the gnosis of wisdom and the pledge of karma yoginīs.

original: sbyor ba dus dngos gzhir gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba dus dngos gzhir gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should also understand that the time of application becomes the actual basis.

original: dbye ba'i gzhi yang de nyid do //
analyzed: dbye ba'i gzhi yang de nyid do //
translated: The basis of division is also that.

original: sun phyung ba la rim pa bzhin rjes su 'jug pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: sun phyung ba la rim pa bzhin rjes su 'jug pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the sequence of engaging in the refutation.

original: dbang gi rim pa de nyid kyis bskang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang gi rim pa de nyid kyis bskang bar bya'o //
translated: That very sequence of empowerment should be restored.

original: gzhan du chu tshod gsum dang / lnga dang / dgu dang / bcu bdun dang / nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / sum cu rtsa lnga dang / bzhi bcu rtsa bdun dang / lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskyed de /
analyzed: gzhan du chu tshod gsum dang / lnga dang / dgu dang / bcu bdun dang / nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / sum cu rtsa lnga dang / bzhi bcu rtsa bdun dang / lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang / drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskyed de /
translated: Otherwise, it is restored by three, five, nine, seventeen, twenty-eight, thirty-five, forty-seven, fifty-five, or sixty-two hours.

original: de dam tshig gi rim pa la sogs pa la bde ba chen po dang / dga' ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ba mnyes par byas pas ldang ba'o //
analyzed: de dam tshig gi rim pa la sogs pa la bde ba chen po dang / dga' ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ba mnyes par byas pas ldang ba'o //
translated: That is the arising of the great bliss and the four joys in the maṇḍala of the pledge beings and so forth.

original: de'i phyir aindra bh'u tis bshad pa /🔽gang zhig don dam kun rdzob kyi //
analyzed: de'i phyir aindra bh'u tis bshad pa / gang zhig don dam kun rdzob kyi //
translated: Therefore, Indrabhūti explains:🔽If one degenerates from the ultimate and relative

original: byang chub sems las nyams gyur na //
analyzed: byang chub sems las nyams gyur na //
translated: awakening minds,

original: don dam don dam nyid kyis te //
analyzed: don dam don dam nyid kyis te //
translated: the ultimate is restored by the ultimate,

original: kun rdzob lces blang ga la nyams //
analyzed: kun rdzob lces blang ga la nyams //
translated: but how can the relative be restored by the tongue?

original: de nyid las ni bslab par bya //
analyzed: de nyid las ni bslab par bya //
translated: One should train in that.

original: shukra dor na rtsa ba nyams //
analyzed: shukra dor na rtsa ba nyams //
translated: If one emits semen, the root is broken.

original: chu tshod nas brtsis dga' ba bzhi //
analyzed: chu tshod nas brtsis dga' ba bzhi //
translated: The four joys are counted from the hour.🔽Through practice, one arises from that stain.

original: goms pas dri ma de las ldang // de phyir dam tshig rig ma dang // rnal 'byor tshang ldan med pas ni //
analyzed: goms pas dri ma de las ldang // de phyir dam tshig rig ma dang // rnal 'byor tshang ldan med pas ni //
translated: Therefore, one who does not have the pledge, the knowledge consort,

original: nam yang 'jug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nam yang 'jug par mi bya'o //
translated: and the complete yoga should never enter.

original: gzhan du ltung ba'i rtsa ba ste //
analyzed: gzhan du ltung ba'i rtsa ba ste //
translated: Otherwise, it is a root downfall.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa spangs na ltung //🔽zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa spangs na ltung // zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one abandons the vajra holder, one falls.

original: de bas na brtan pa thob pas 'bad par bya'o //🔽gzhan du yang /
analyzed: de bas na brtan pa thob pas 'bad par bya'o //🔽gzhan du yang /
translated: Therefore, one should strive to attain stability.

original: skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
analyzed: skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
translated: For the sake of those with attachment,

original: 'di yi byed pa rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: 'di yi byed pa rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: the Vajra Holder created this.

original: zhes bshad pa dang / shes rab kyi rgyud las kyang /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa dang / shes rab kyi rgyud las kyang /
translated: And in the Wisdom Tantra it is also said:

original: ji ltar me yis tshig pa las //
analyzed: ji ltar me yis tshig pa las //
translated: Just as one who is burned by fire

original: me de nyid la bsro bar bya //
analyzed: me de nyid la bsro bar bya //
translated: is warmed by that fire itself,

original: de bzhin rna bar chu song pa //
analyzed: de bzhin rna bar chu song pa //
translated: so too, when water enters the ear,

original: chu de nyid kyis slar dbyung bya //
analyzed: chu de nyid kyis slar dbyung bya //
translated: it is drawn out by that water itself.

original: 'dod chags ldan pa'i gang zag kyang //
analyzed: 'dod chags ldan pa'i gang zag kyang //
translated: For a person with attachment,

original: 'dod chags nyid kyis gdul bar bya //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyid kyis gdul bar bya //
translated: one is tamed by attachment itself.

original: zhes bshad pa yang brtan pa dang ldan pa la lam du 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa yang brtan pa dang ldan pa la lam du 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
translated: This is explained for those with stability, and it should be understood as the path.

original: de lta ma yin par 'dod chags kyi rjes su 'brangs te sgra tsam gyi phyogs su gzhol ba la ltung ba dang sbom po la sogs par 'gyur bas tshogs pa la bshags la don ma yin par @212b mi 'jug par bsdams la rjes su bskang zhing don du
analyzed: de lta ma yin par 'dod chags kyi rjes su 'brangs te sgra tsam gyi phyogs su gzhol ba la ltung ba dang sbom po la sogs par 'gyur bas tshogs pa la bshags la don ma yin par @212b mi 'jug par bsdams la rjes su bskang zhing don du
translated: Otherwise, if one follows attachment and is inclined toward mere words, one will fall into downfalls, serious faults, and so forth. Therefore, confess to the assembly, restrain oneself from engaging in meaningless actions, and restore the vows.

original: bslab par bya'o zhes bshad pa ste lnga pa yin pas lnga pa ste ltung ba lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: bslab par bya'o zhes bshad pa ste lnga pa yin pas lnga pa ste ltung ba lnga pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the fifth, therefore it is the explanation of the fifth downfall.🔽Now, desiring to explain the sixth downfall,

original: // / da ni ltung ba drug pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba drug pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
translated: it says:

original: rang ngam gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' //
analyzed: rang ngam gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' //
translated: One’s own or another’s tenets,

original: chos la smod pa drug pa yin //
analyzed: chos la smod pa drug pa yin //
translated: deprecating the Dharma is the sixth.

original: zhes snos te rang ni bdag med par smra ba dang / gzhan ni phyi rol pa'o //
analyzed: zhes snos te rang ni bdag med par smra ba dang / gzhan ni phyi rol pa'o //
translated: One’s own is the proponent of selflessness, and another is the non-Buddhist.

original: de la smad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de la smad par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not deprecate them.

original: gzhan dag ni theg pa chen po'i mdo dang rgyud la bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni theg pa chen po'i mdo dang rgyud la bya ste /

original: mu stegs sun dbyung ba'o zhes zer te /
analyzed: mu stegs sun dbyung ba'o zhes zer te /
translated: saying that it is the refutation of the tīrthikas.

original: de yang gzhan de la 'jug pa bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de yang gzhan de la 'jug pa bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ste /
translated: Moreover, it is explained in order to stop others from engaging in that.

original: nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ste smad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ste smad pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not a deprecation motivated by afflictions.

original: bye brag gi rgyud las /
analyzed: bye brag gi rgyud las /
