original: rnam par snang mdzad ring ba'i rgyu //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ring ba'i rgyu //
translated: Vairocana is the distant cause,

original: mu stegs can la smad mi bya //
analyzed: mu stegs can la smad mi bya //
translated: so do not deprecate the tīrthikas.

original: zhes bshad pa dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa dang / de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly:

original: grub pa'i mtha' yis blo bskyed phyir //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' yis blo bskyed phyir //
translated: In order to generate the mind through tenets,

original: phyi rol ba yang lam tshol zhugs //
analyzed: phyi rol ba yang lam tshol zhugs //
translated: Even non-Buddhists are engaged in seeking the path.

original: de phyir de la smad mi bya //
analyzed: de phyir de la smad mi bya //
translated: Therefore, one should not disparage them.

original: lam zhugs nyan thos smos ci dgos //
analyzed: lam zhugs nyan thos smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention those who have entered the path, the śrāvakas?

original: zhes bshad pas so //🔽de'i phyir / sems can bsam pa tha dad pas //
analyzed: zhes bshad pas so // de'i phyir / sems can bsam pa tha dad pas //
translated: Thus it is explained.🔽Therefore:🔽In order to lead sentient beings with different aspirations

original: mya ngan 'das par drang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das par drang ba'i phyir //
translated: to nirvāṇa,

original: byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pas //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pas //
translated: through blessings and direct perception,

original: 'di dang phyi rol bstan pa yin //
analyzed: 'di dang phyi rol bstan pa yin //
translated: this and the outer are taught.

original: de phyir smad par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de phyir smad par mi bya ste /
translated: Therefore, one should not disparage them,

original: phal cher thar lam 'dod pas so //
analyzed: phal cher thar lam 'dod pas so //
translated: because they mostly desire the path of liberation.

original: zhes bshad de /
analyzed: zhes bshad de /
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: de'i phyir lha sbyin yang yang dag pas na lha sbyin ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir lha sbyin yang yang dag pas na lha sbyin ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, Devadatta is not really Devadatta.

original: mu stegs can gyi grub pa'i mtha' la yang smad par mi bya'o zhes 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: mu stegs can gyi grub pa'i mtha' la yang smad par mi bya'o zhes 'byung ba ste /
translated: And one should not disparage the tenets of the tīrthikas.

original: theg pa chen po la gzud pa dang / lta ba ngan pa la dad pa sun dbyung ba dang / gdul bya'i bsam pas smad pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: theg pa chen po la gzud pa dang / lta ba ngan pa la dad pa sun dbyung ba dang / gdul bya'i bsam pas smad pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in leading them to the Mahāyāna, refuting their faith in bad views, and disparaging them according to the inclinations of the disciples.

original: bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel lo //
translated: And merit increases greatly.

original: de'i phyir rgyud la smad na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyud la smad na ltung ba'o //
translated: Therefore, if one disparages the tantras, there is a downfall.

original: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la smad na sbom po'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la smad na sbom po'o //
translated: If one disparages the Mahayana scriptures, it is a serious violation.

original: nyan thos kyi la nyes byas so //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi la nyes byas so //
translated: If one disparages the sravaka scriptures, it is a minor offense.

original: phyi rol pa yang phra mo'i nyes byas so //
analyzed: phyi rol pa yang phra mo'i nyes byas so //
translated: If one disparages the scriptures of non-Buddhists, it is a very minor offense.

original: sbyor ba du dang ldan pas dngos gzhir 'gyur bas ltung ba dang / na smad pas re re la yang yul dang bsam pas na smad pas bshags pa'i dus yol ba lci ba la sogs pa'i nyes byas dang nyes pa med pa shes par bya'o //🔽de bas na lam tshol ba la zhugs pa dang / lam la zhugs pa dang / lam chen @213a * //
analyzed: sbyor ba du dang ldan pas dngos gzhir 'gyur bas ltung ba dang / na smad pas re re la yang yul dang bsam pas na smad pas bshags pa'i dus yol ba lci ba la sogs pa'i nyes byas dang nyes pa med pa shes par bya'o // de bas na lam tshol ba la zhugs pa dang / lam la zhugs pa dang / lam chen @213a * //
translated: One should understand that there are downfalls, minor offenses, and no offense, depending on the number of preparations one has, the basis of the downfall, and the attitude.🔽Therefore, in order to cause those who have not entered the path to enter it, to teach selflessness to non-Buddhists, and to teach the special path to sravakas and so on, the Buddha taught the three vehicles.

original: po la zhugs pa dang / lam ches che ba'i lam bla na med pa la zhugs pa'i snod kyi rim pas lam la ma zhugs pa gzhug pa dang / phyi rol pa la bdag med par bstan pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa la khyad par gyi lam bstan pa'i phyir ro //🔽lam med grub pa'i mtha' la dgod //
analyzed: po la zhugs pa dang / lam ches che ba'i lam bla na med pa la zhugs pa'i snod kyi rim pas lam la ma zhugs pa gzhug pa dang / phyi rol pa la bdag med par bstan pa dang / nyan thos la sogs pa la khyad par gyi lam bstan pa'i phyir ro //🔽lam med grub pa'i mtha' la dgod //
translated: The three vehicles are taught in order to cause those who have not entered the path to enter it, to cause those who have entered the path to enter the great vehicle, and to cause those who have entered the great vehicle to enter the unsurpassed vehicle.🔽The three vehicles are taught in order to cause those who have not entered the path to enter it, to cause those who have entered the path to enter the great vehicle, and to cause those who have entered the great vehicle to enter the unsurpassed vehicle.

original: phyi rol pa la bdag med bstan //
analyzed: phyi rol pa la bdag med bstan //
translated: The non-Buddhists are taught selflessness.

original: nyan thos la sogs rim pas drang //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs rim pas drang //
translated: The Disciples and so on are gradually led.

original: rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyis gdul //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyis gdul //
translated: The trainees are disciplined by various means.

original: zhes bshad pa dang / dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa dang / dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
translated: And the Hevajra Tantra also says:

original: dang po'i bye brag smra ba ste //
analyzed: dang po'i bye brag smra ba ste //
translated: First, the Vaibhashikas,

original: zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /
translated: and so on up to:

original: kun gyi tha mar theg pa'i mchog / ces bya bar bshad do //🔽de'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: kun gyi tha mar theg pa'i mchog / ces bya bar bshad do // de'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: In the end, the supreme vehicle.

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las bya ba grub pa'i ye shes la bstod pa las /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las bya ba grub pa'i ye shes la bstod pa las /
translated: With this in mind, the Praise of the Knowledge of the Performance of Action in the Litany of the Names of Manjushri says:

original: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul rig /'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //🔽theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
analyzed: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul rig /'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po // theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
translated: You know the various vehicles and methods, and you are the one who understands the aims of living beings.🔽You are the one who abides in the result of the single vehicle,

original: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //🔽nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //
analyzed: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas // nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //
translated: the one who has the certain deliverance of the three vehicles.🔽You are the one who purifies the elements of affliction,

original: zhes bshad pas /
analyzed: zhes bshad pas /
translated: and the one who exhausts the elements of karma.

original: thabs sna tshogs kyis gdul bya gdul bar bya'o //
analyzed: thabs sna tshogs kyis gdul bya gdul bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, you should discipline trainees by various means.

original: de bas na dgongs pa sna tshogs shes pas skabs kha cig tu theg pa gsum la zhugs ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na dgongs pa sna tshogs shes pas skabs kha cig tu theg pa gsum la zhugs ba'o //
translated: Therefore, since the intention is various, in some contexts it is the three vehicles.

original: zhugs pa ni 'og ma spong bcug la gong ma la dgod pa'o //
analyzed: zhugs pa ni 'og ma spong bcug la gong ma la dgod pa'o //
translated: Those who have entered are those who have been caused to abandon the lower and to enter the higher.

original: de'i dbang du mdzad nas /🔽dmyal bar 'gro ba byang chub la //
analyzed: de'i dbang du mdzad nas / dmyal bar 'gro ba byang chub la //
translated: With reference to that, it is said:🔽Going to the hells is not

original: rtag tu gegs byed ma yin te //
analyzed: rtag tu gegs byed ma yin te //
translated: always an obstacle to enlightenment.🔽The levels of the solitary realizers

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams dang // nyan thos sa yis gegs byed do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams dang // nyan thos sa yis gegs byed do //
translated: and the levels of the hearers are obstacles.

original: zhes bshad pa dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: Similarly, with reference to the mundane, it is said:

original: bden par smra bya khro mi bya //
analyzed: bden par smra bya khro mi bya //
translated: Speak the truth, do not get angry,

original: slong na chung yang sbyin par bya //
analyzed: slong na chung yang sbyin par bya //
translated: give even if it is a little.

original: snyan par smra bya khro mi bya //
analyzed: snyan par smra bya khro mi bya //
translated: Speak pleasantly, do not get angry.

original: rnam pa 'di gsum gnas kyis ni //
analyzed: rnam pa 'di gsum gnas kyis ni //
translated: Through these three aspects

original: lha yi nang du skye bar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa yis yang dag lta //
analyzed: lha yi nang du skye bar 'gyur // zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten pa yis yang dag lta //
translated: one is born among the gods.🔽And with reference to the mundane, it is said:

original: chen po su la yod gyur pa //🔽de ni tshe rabs stong du yang //
analyzed: chen po su la yod gyur pa // de ni tshe rabs stong du yang //
translated: Whoever has the right view of the world🔽will not go to the lower realms

original: ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: even in a thousand lifetimes.

original: zhes bya bas bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bya bas bshad do //
translated: This is explained.

original: de bas na dgongs pas rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na dgongs pas rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood through the intention.

original: de'i phyir bskang ba yang phal cher yul dang bsam pa dang dus la sogs pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir bskang ba yang phal cher yul dang bsam pa dang dus la sogs pa shes par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the restoration is also mostly to be understood in terms of object, attitude, time, and so on.

original: de nyid las bzlog ste /
analyzed: de nyid las bzlog ste /
translated: That is the opposite.

original: dgongs pa sna tshogs pa'i don dang / yang dag pa'i don shes pa la gzhug cing phyis bsdams te /
analyzed: dgongs pa sna tshogs pa'i don dang / yang dag pa'i don shes pa la gzhug cing phyis bsdams te /
translated: In order to introduce the understanding of the various intended meanings and the correct meaning, later on one is bound and

original: tshogs pa'i nang du bshags @213b pas dri ma las ldang ngo //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i nang du bshags @213b pas dri ma las ldang ngo //
translated: admits it in the assembly, and one rises from the stain.

original: gzhan du na phyis sngom pa dang dam pa gcig la bshags pas ldang ste de'i phyir blos phye bas shes par bya ste ltung pa drug pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: gzhan du na phyis sngom pa dang dam pa gcig la bshags pas ldang ste de'i phyir blos phye bas shes par bya ste ltung pa drug pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: Otherwise, later on, one rises by confessing the vow and the one commitment. Therefore, it should be understood through the analysis by the mind. This is the explanation of the sixth downfall.🔽Now, desiring to explain the definition of the seventh downfall,

original: // / da ni ltung ba bdun pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod pas /🔽yongs su ma smin sems can la //
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba bdun pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod pas / yongs su ma smin sems can la //
translated: it is said:🔽To proclaim the secret

original: gsang ba sgrogs pa bdun pa yin //
analyzed: gsang ba sgrogs pa bdun pa yin //
translated: to immature sentient beings is the seventh.

original: zhes bshad de /
analyzed: zhes bshad de /
translated: This is explained.

original: de yang snod ma smin pa dang / tshogs smin par ma byas pa dang / cho ga rdzogs pas smin par ma byas pa dang / zab pas 'jigs pas ma smin pa dang / nyams pas ma smin pa'o //
analyzed: de yang snod ma smin pa dang / tshogs smin par ma byas pa dang / cho ga rdzogs pas smin par ma byas pa dang / zab pas 'jigs pas ma smin pa dang / nyams pas ma smin pa'o //
translated: Furthermore, there are those who are not vessels due to immaturity, those who are not vessels due to not having matured the accumulations, those who are not vessels due to not having matured through the complete rite, those who are not vessels due to being frightened by the profound, and those who are not vessels due to degeneration.

original: de la rang bzhin gyi log sred can snod kha spub pa thabs sna tshogs kyis btul yang snod du ma gyur pa yod de /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin gyi log sred can snod kha spub pa thabs sna tshogs kyis btul yang snod du ma gyur pa yod de /
translated: Among those, there are those who are naturally inclined to wrong views, who are like overturned vessels, who are not vessels despite being tamed by various methods.

original: skur zhing smod par byas pas bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: skur zhing smod par byas pas bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: They are not to be taught because they denigrate and disparage.

original: gzhan du na snod du ma gyur pa med de /
analyzed: gzhan du na snod du ma gyur pa med de /
translated: Otherwise, there are none who are not vessels.

original: 'dus pa las /
analyzed: 'dus pa las /
translated: As the Guhyasamaja Tantra explains:

original: rigs ngan sme sha can la sogs //
analyzed: rigs ngan sme sha can la sogs //
translated: Even those of low caste, untouchables, and so forth

original: gsod pa don du gnyer ba rnams //
analyzed: gsod pa don du gnyer ba rnams //
translated: who strive to kill

original: theg mchog 'di las 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: theg mchog 'di las 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: will attain this supreme vehicle.

original: zhes bshad pa dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: zhes bshad pa dang / gzhan yang /
translated: And also:🔽Even those who have committed the five heinous acts,

original: mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // gsod la sogs pa'i mi dge sogs //
analyzed: mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // gsod la sogs pa'i mi dge sogs //
translated: those who have done nonvirtuous acts such as killing,

original: dbang ma bskur ba'i mi rnams kyang //
analyzed: dbang ma bskur ba'i mi rnams kyang //
translated: and those who have not been initiated

original: nag pos bka' stsal bzhin du 'grub //🔽ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nag pos bka' stsal bzhin du 'grub //🔽ces 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: will attain this through the black [course].

original: sbyor ba phul du gyur pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: sbyor ba phul du gyur pa'i tshig go //
translated: The words are of the highest application.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa la snod du rung bar bshad kyi /
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa la snod du rung bar bshad kyi /
translated: One who has the Thought of Enlightenment is explained as being a fit vessel.

original: thams cad du cho ga med pas ni 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du cho ga med pas ni 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not accomplished by all, because of the absence of the rite.

original: slob dpon dang slob ma rkyen ma tshang pas snod du rung yang dbang ma thob pa'i gang zag kyang ngo //
analyzed: slob dpon dang slob ma rkyen ma tshang pas snod du rung yang dbang ma thob pa'i gang zag kyang ngo //
translated: Even though one is a fit vessel, one does not obtain the consecration, because of the incompleteness of the conditions of the master and the disciple.

original: bum pa'i dbang tsam thob pa la gsang ba la sogs pa ma thob pa yang ngo //
analyzed: bum pa'i dbang tsam thob pa la gsang ba la sogs pa ma thob pa yang ngo //
translated: Also, one who has obtained only the vase consecration, but not the secret and so on.

original: dbang rdzogs kyang spyod pa dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang / lam rnam pa bzhi'i tshul dang zab mo'i don la 'jigs pa yang snod du ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dbang rdzogs kyang spyod pa dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang / lam rnam pa bzhi'i tshul dang zab mo'i don la 'jigs pa yang snod du ma gyur pa'o //
translated: Even though one has obtained the complete consecration, one is not a fit vessel if one is afraid of the profound meaning, of the conduct, of the observances of the awareness, and of the method of the four kinds of paths.

original: thob kyang ltung ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: thob kyang ltung ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
translated: Even though one has obtained it, one may fall into transgression and so on.

original: nyams kyang rkyen ma tshang ba dang / ma gus pas dri ma las mi ldang ba yang ma smin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nyams kyang rkyen ma tshang ba dang / ma gus pas dri ma las mi ldang ba yang ma smin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Even though one has fallen, one should know that one is not ripe if one does not rise above the stain by the incompleteness of the conditions and by disrespect.

original: de lta bu la snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi 'dod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis bsam pas mi 'dul zhing ma gus pa la skur bas ltung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta bu la snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi 'dod pa dang 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis bsam pas mi 'dul zhing ma gus pa la skur bas ltung bar 'gyur la /
translated: In such a case, the master is not disciplined by the desire for the five kinds of desirable objects, or by the eight worldly concerns.

original: smin par byas kyang dri ma ma dag pa la ston pa ni ltung ba ste /
analyzed: smin par byas kyang dri ma ma dag pa la ston pa ni ltung ba ste /
translated: If he teaches those who are not sufficiently mature, or those whose defilements are not purified, he commits a downfall.

original: snying rje zhugs na sbom po'o //🔽tshul ma @214a * //
analyzed: snying rje zhugs na sbom po'o // tshul ma @214a * //
translated: If he teaches out of compassion, it is a serious transgression.

original: yin par bstan te lus ngag gis bsdam pa ma byas na nyes byas so //🔽'og ma'i cho ga byas ba la gong ma ston na lci ba'o //
analyzed: yin par bstan te lus ngag gis bsdam pa ma byas na nyes byas so // 'og ma'i cho ga byas ba la gong ma ston na lci ba'o //
translated: If he teaches improperly, without restraining his body and speech, it is a minor infraction.🔽If he teaches the higher training to those who have not yet completed the lower training, it is a serious transgression.

original: ma rtogs pa phra mo'i nyes byas so //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa phra mo'i nyes byas so //
translated: If he fails to teach the subtle points to those who do not understand them, it is a minor infraction.

original: zhing dang bsam pas lci yang dang sbyor ba dus dngos gzhir gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhing dang bsam pas lci yang dang sbyor ba dus dngos gzhir gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The weight of the downfall should be understood in terms of the field and the attitude, and in terms of the application and the actual performance.

original: zab pa ma yin pa bstan pa'i dus su zab mo'i don ston pa dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i nang du 'dus pa dang / nyes byas bshags pa'i dus su 'dus pa dang / spa bar bya ba brda dang phyag rgya gcig tsam mthong bas bshags pa'i tshad kyang dus yol ba dang ma yol bas de nyid dbang rnam pa gsum nyid dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang /🔽dpa' bo'i ston mo dang / tshogs kyi mchod pas 'dus pa la bshags pa dang / chad pa'i las dang / mandala sngon du 'gro bas dri ma las ldang bar bya'o //
analyzed: zab pa ma yin pa bstan pa'i dus su zab mo'i don ston pa dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i nang du 'dus pa dang / nyes byas bshags pa'i dus su 'dus pa dang / spa bar bya ba brda dang phyag rgya gcig tsam mthong bas bshags pa'i tshad kyang dus yol ba dang ma yol bas de nyid dbang rnam pa gsum nyid dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / dpa' bo'i ston mo dang / tshogs kyi mchod pas 'dus pa la bshags pa dang / chad pa'i las dang / mandala sngon du 'gro bas dri ma las ldang bar bya'o //
translated: The three empowerments, the gaṇacakra,

original: 'di ni slob dpon gyi nyes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni slob dpon gyi nyes pa'o //
translated: the feast of the hero, and the confession in the gaṇacakra, the rite of the vow, and the arising from the stains by way of a maṇḍala are the faults of the master.

original: de yang slob dpon ku ku ri pas bshad pa /
analyzed: de yang slob dpon ku ku ri pas bshad pa /
translated: Moreover, it is explained by the master Kukkurīpāda:

original: snod min pa la gsang mi bsgrags //
analyzed: snod min pa la gsang mi bsgrags //
translated: Do not proclaim the secret to the unsuited.

original: smin dang ma smin rim pa rnams //🔽gung mo'i rtse mo brnga sbyor sogs //
analyzed: smin dang ma smin rim pa rnams // gung mo'i rtse mo brnga sbyor sogs //
translated: The stages of the ripened and unripened

original: mkhas pas rtogs par mi byed na //
analyzed: mkhas pas rtogs par mi byed na //
translated: are not to be understood by the wise🔽through the tip of the middle finger,🔽the union, and so on.

original: gal te 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhugs //🔽de ni shin tu lci ba ste //
analyzed: gal te 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhugs // de ni shin tu lci ba ste //
translated: If one enters into it with a desire for sensual pleasure,🔽it is very heavy.

original: snying rje can la shin tu yang //
analyzed: snying rje can la shin tu yang //
translated: It is very heavy for the compassionate one.

original: snyom las la sogs nyes pa chung //
analyzed: snyom las la sogs nyes pa chung //
translated: Laziness and so on are minor faults.

original: rkun thabs slob ma'i nyes pa'o //
analyzed: rkun thabs slob ma'i nyes pa'o //
translated: The fault of the disciple is stealing.🔽The consecration, the feast-offering, and so on,

original: dbang bskur tshogs 'khor la sogs dang // mandala ngag gi bshags pas bsdam //
analyzed: dbang bskur tshogs 'khor la sogs dang // mandala ngag gi bshags pas bsdam //
translated: the mandala, and the confession with words, are the restraints.🔽It is explained that otherwise the inferior person is lost.

original: gzhan du skyes bu tha shal brlag / ces bshad pas rgya cher shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du skyes bu tha shal brlag / ces bshad pas rgya cher shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand it extensively.

original: shan 'dra ba phyogs su bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: shan 'dra ba phyogs su bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: One should gather the faults into groups according to their similarity.

original: phal cher yul dang dngos po dang / dus dang sbyor ba dang / bsam ba dang / gang zag dang / gzhan gyi don la sogs spyad de dri ma las ldang bar bya'o //
analyzed: phal cher yul dang dngos po dang / dus dang sbyor ba dang / bsam ba dang / gang zag dang / gzhan gyi don la sogs spyad de dri ma las ldang bar bya'o //
translated: One should rise above the defilements by means of the practice of the universal vehicle, which is concerned with the field, the object, the time, the application, the intention, the person, the benefit of others, and so on.

original: slob dpon gyi nyes pa ni ltung ba dang po dang sbyar te bshags par bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyi nyes pa ni ltung ba dang po dang sbyar te bshags par bya'o //
translated: The fault of the master is to be confessed by applying the first downfall.

original: gzhan du na /
analyzed: gzhan du na /
translated: Otherwise,

original: yongs su smin par ma byas shing //
analyzed: yongs su smin par ma byas shing //
translated: without having brought them to maturity,

original: bla ma la sogs mchod mi byed //
analyzed: bla ma la sogs mchod mi byed //
translated: one should not worship the guru and so on.

original: zab mo'i don la zhugs gyur kyang //
analyzed: zab mo'i don la zhugs gyur kyang //
translated: Even though one has entered into the profound meaning,

original: nyan la sogs te phyag rgya 'ching //🔽ji ltar sa bon tshig pa las //
analyzed: nyan la sogs te phyag rgya 'ching // ji ltar sa bon tshig pa las //
translated: One should listen, etc., and form the seal.

original: myu gu 'bras bu mi 'byung bzhin //
analyzed: myu gu 'bras bu mi 'byung bzhin //
translated: Just as a sprout does not arise from a burnt seed,🔽so also there is no enlightenment for one who has burnt the seed of the wholesome roots.

original: zhes bya bas gsal bar bstan te /
analyzed: zhes bya bas gsal bar bstan te /
translated: Thus it is taught.🔽Therefore, if the master and disciple are fully mature, there will be a great result.

original: de'i phyir slob dpon dang slob ma yongs su smin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur @214b ro zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir slob dpon dang slob ma yongs su smin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur @214b ro zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus it is taught.

original: de bas na 'dod pa la sogs pas zab mo'i don bstan na ltung ba'o zhes bshad pa ste ltung ba bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: de bas na 'dod pa la sogs pas zab mo'i don bstan na ltung ba'o zhes bshad pa ste ltung ba bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: Therefore, if one teaches the profound meaning with desire, etc., it is a downfall. This is the explanation of the seventh downfall.

original: // / da ni ltung ba brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /🔽phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid //
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste / phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid //
translated: Now, the definition of the eighth downfall should be stated.🔽The eighth is to disparage the aggregates,

original: de la smod byed brgyad pa yin//
analyzed: de la smod byed brgyad pa yin//
translated: which are the lords of the buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba bshad do /
analyzed: zhes bya ba bshad do /
translated: This is explained.

original: phung po ni gzugs la sogs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: phung po ni gzugs la sogs pa lnga'o //
translated: The aggregates are the five beginning with form.

original: sangs rgyas ni de dag gi rang bzhin dang / byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni de dag gi rang bzhin dang / byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
translated: The buddhas are their nature and blessing.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o //
translated: By nature, they are primordially unborn.

original: gzod ma nas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni shes pa dang shes bya tha dad du med pa'i phyir 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la rang bzhin gyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rnam pa lnga gnas te /
analyzed: gzod ma nas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni shes pa dang shes bya tha dad du med pa'i phyir 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la rang bzhin gyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rnam pa lnga gnas te /
translated: The five aspects of nonconceptual wisdom are present by nature in the mind streams of all sentient beings.

original: glo bur gyi dri ma mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya bas ma thob pa thob par bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: glo bur gyi dri ma mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya bas ma thob pa thob par bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that they have not obtained it and must obtain it by means of eliminating the adventitious stains that are to be eliminated by the path of seeing and the path of meditation.

original: gzhan du na thog ma med pa'i dus nas ma rig pa'i bag chags kyis yongs su dkrugs pa'i phyir shin tu bag chags kyi mthu brtas pas ma rig pa'i thibs po sa non pa'i phyir tshe gcig la sogs te /
analyzed: gzhan du na thog ma med pa'i dus nas ma rig pa'i bag chags kyis yongs su dkrugs pa'i phyir shin tu bag chags kyi mthu brtas pas ma rig pa'i thibs po sa non pa'i phyir tshe gcig la sogs te /
translated: Otherwise, since beginningless time, the mind has been thoroughly disturbed by the latent tendencies of ignorance, and the power of those latent tendencies has increased greatly, so that the mind is covered by the darkness of ignorance.

original: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could omniscience be attained in just one lifetime, or in three countless eons?

original: de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes gnas te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes gnas te /
translated: Therefore, the five aspects of nonconceptual wisdom, which is naturally luminous, are present in the mind streams of all sentient beings.

original: de'i nus pa'i khyad par dang / yon tan gyi khyad par las gnyis su med pa'i khyad par dang / yul dang yul can du snang ba ste /
analyzed: de'i nus pa'i khyad par dang / yon tan gyi khyad par las gnyis su med pa'i khyad par dang / yul dang yul can du snang ba ste /
translated: The special features of its power and the special features of its qualities are the special feature of nonduality and the appearance as subject and object.

original: de'i phyir dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud mtha' dag las /
analyzed: de'i phyir dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud mtha' dag las /
translated: Therefore, in all the tantras of yoga and yoginī, such as the glorious Guhyasamāja,

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa snang ba ste don de nyid la dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa snang ba ste don de nyid la dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the appearance of the arrangement of the body maṇḍala is intended.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: As such,

original: phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid //
analyzed: phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid //
translated: the aggregates are the lords of the buddhas.

original: spyan la sogs pa chen po bzhi //
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa chen po bzhi //
translated: The four great ones, such as the eyes,

original: sgrol ma la sogs de bzhin no //🔽yul dang yul can rang snang ba'i//
analyzed: sgrol ma la sogs de bzhin no // yul dang yul can rang snang ba'i//
translated: are Tārā and so on.🔽The many elements and sense bases

original: khams dang skye mched mang po ni //
analyzed: khams dang skye mched mang po ni //
translated: are the self-appearance of the object and the subject.

original: sa snying la sogs byang chub sems //
analyzed: sa snying la sogs byang chub sems //
translated: The bodhisattvas, such as Kṣitigarbha,

original: gzugs kyi phung po bgegs mthar byed //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po bgegs mthar byed //
translated: are the aggregate of form, Viṣṇu.

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang //
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang //
translated: The body maṇḍala is Vairocana.

original: zhes bshad de /
analyzed: zhes bshad de /
translated: It is explained:

original: gzhan yang / gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de //
translated: The form aggregate is Vairocana.

original: tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan yin //
analyzed: tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan yin //
translated: Feeling is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: @215a * // 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas so //🔽'du byed don yod grub pa yin //
analyzed: @215a * // 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas so // 'du byed don yod grub pa yin //
translated: Ideation is Amitābha.🔽Mentality is Amoghasiddhi.

original: rnam par shes pa mi bskyod pa //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi bskyod pa //
translated: Consciousness is Akṣobhya.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud mang po las gsal bar bstan te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud mang po las gsal bar bstan te /
translated: And so on, it is clearly taught in many tantras of method and wisdom.

original: bdag dang gzhan rdo rje theg pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'di ni bsgrub pa'i phyir rgyud de dag gi dgongs pa bdag gis 'dir ma spros so //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan rdo rje theg pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'di ni bsgrub pa'i phyir rgyud de dag gi dgongs pa bdag gis 'dir ma spros so //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing this for the vajra yogis and yoginīs, self and others, I have not elaborated on the intention of those tantras here.

original: rgyud de dag las kyang lha'i grangs tha dad par snang ste /
analyzed: rgyud de dag las kyang lha'i grangs tha dad par snang ste /
translated: Also, in those tantras, the number of deities appears to be different.

original: de dag kyang gdul ba'i bsam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i nus pa dang / dbang po'i bye brag gis gsungs kyi /
analyzed: de dag kyang gdul ba'i bsam pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i nus pa dang / dbang po'i bye brag gis gsungs kyi /
translated: Those are taught according to the inclinations of those to be tamed, the power of dependent origination, and the differences in faculties.

original: rnam par dag pa lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa phung po las tha dad par brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa phung po las tha dad par brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: However, it is not said that the pure body maṇḍala arrangement is different from the aggregates.🔽Therefore:

original: de'i phyir / de yi rang bzhin de yin phyir //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de yi rang bzhin de yin phyir //
translated: Because that is its nature,

original: de yi nus pa de la gnas //
analyzed: de yi nus pa de la gnas //
translated: its power abides in that.

original: de phyir sems can sangs rgyas te //
analyzed: de phyir sems can sangs rgyas te //
translated: Therefore, sentient beings are buddhas.

original: thams kyis 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
analyzed: thams kyis 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to reverse the error of all,

original: de phyir sangs rgyas tha dad snang //
analyzed: de phyir sangs rgyas tha dad snang //
translated: buddhas appear as distinct.

original: lus la dkyil 'khor rnam bar dgod //🔽ces bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus la dkyil 'khor rnam bar dgod // ces bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The maṇḍala is arranged in the body.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul gyis kyang rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags zad par bya ba'i phyir dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / las dang po pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor pa'i sems goms par bya ba'i phyir dbang dang dam tshig sngon du 'gro bas yan lag bdun pas sems rgyud sbyangs te /
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul gyis kyang rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags zad par bya ba'i phyir dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / las dang po pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor pa'i sems goms par bya ba'i phyir dbang dang dam tshig sngon du 'gro bas yan lag bdun pas sems rgyud sbyangs te /
translated: Also, by the method of blessing, in order to exhaust the latent tendencies of conceptuality, in order to complete the accumulation of merit, and in order to familiarize the minds of beginner individuals with yoga, having purified the mind with the seven limbs, which are preceded by empowerment and samaya,

original: stong pa nyid las lha'i gzugs su rnam par ldang zhing /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las lha'i gzugs su rnam par ldang zhing /
translated: one arises from emptiness in the form of the deity.

original: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang / gnyis su med pas phra mo dang thig le dang rtsa'i 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms te cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang / gnyis su med pas phra mo dang thig le dang rtsa'i 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms te cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: One should complete all the rites by meditating on the maṇḍala of pristine consciousness and nonduality, the subtle bindu, and the cakra of nāḍīs.

original: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i don dang byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor la thun bzhi'i rim pas tshogs kyi mchod pas bsnyen par byed cing /
analyzed: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i don dang byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor la thun bzhi'i rim pas tshogs kyi mchod pas bsnyen par byed cing /
translated: One should worship the natural body mandala and the empowered body mandala with the worship of the gaṇas in the four periods of the day,

original: bdag dang tha mi dad par mnyam pa ni /
analyzed: bdag dang tha mi dad par mnyam pa ni /
translated: and one should be equal, not different from oneself.

original: phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid do //
analyzed: phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid do //
translated: The aggregates are the lords of the buddhas.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi rim pa la 'jug pa las /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi rim pa la 'jug pa las /
translated: In the Introduction to the Stages of the Path of Yogins,

original: brtags pas lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom //
analyzed: brtags pas lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the maṇḍala of the deity by means of imagination.

original: thun bzhi'i rim pas tshogs kyis mchod //
analyzed: thun bzhi'i rim pas tshogs kyis mchod //
translated: One should worship with the gaṇas in the four periods of the day.

original: dka' thub la sogs rnam spangs te //🔽skad cig sangs rgyas bral med 'grub //
analyzed: dka' thub la sogs rnam spangs te // skad cig sangs rgyas bral med 'grub //
translated: One should abandon austerities and so forth.

original: ces bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One should accomplish the instant buddhahood that is not separate from the aggregates.

original: de bas na de la brnyas pa ni ltung @215b ba ste /
analyzed: de bas na de la brnyas pa ni ltung @215b ba ste /
translated: Therefore, one should not despise that.

original: de yang gsad pa dang / spyug pa dang / bcing ba dang / tha snyad du sems pa dang / smyung bar gnas pa dang / dka' thub dang / dka' spyod dang / sngar spyad dang / lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pas mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa gnyis su sun 'byin par byed pa la /🔽yan lag la sogs pa ma rung bar byed cing gso nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid dang zhes rnam par brnyas shing smod par byed de de ni ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de yang gsad pa dang / spyug pa dang / bcing ba dang / tha snyad du sems pa dang / smyung bar gnas pa dang / dka' thub dang / dka' spyod dang / sngar spyad dang / lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pas mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa gnyis su sun 'byin par byed pa la / yan lag la sogs pa ma rung bar byed cing gso nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid dang zhes rnam par brnyas shing smod par byed de de ni ltung ba'o //
translated: Moreover, it is to kill, to banish, to bind, to think of as a conventional reality, to fast, to practice austerities, to undergo hardships, to remember the body as something previously enjoyed, to disparage the body as consisting of thirty-two impure substances,🔽to disparage the body as being a collection of limbs and so on, as being perishable, as being a heap, as being insubstantial.🔽

analyzed: de yang yan lag dus dngos gzhir gyur pa dang / ltung ba dang yan lag gi nyes pa yang shes par bya'o //

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / tshogs la bshags pa ste /
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / tshogs la bshags pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattva who, out of pride, does not give up the practice of the perfections, and who does not give up the practice of the perfections in order to convert those who are to be converted by the practice of the perfections, incurs a downfall

original: rang bzhin dang byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing phyis skad cig kyang mi 'jug pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing phyis skad cig kyang mi 'jug pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in meditating on the natural mandala and the mandala of consecration, and later not enter into even a moment of doubt.

original: ltung ba brgyad ba'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: ltung ba brgyad ba'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the eighth downfall.

original: // / da ni ltung ba dgu pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod na /
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba dgu pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod na /
translated: Now, wishing to explain the characteristics of the ninth downfall,🔽it is said:

original: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la //🔽som nyi za ba dgu pa yin //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la // som nyi za ba dgu pa yin //
translated: About the phenomena that are pure by nature,

original: zhes bshad do //
analyzed: zhes bshad do //
translated: to have doubts is the ninth downfall.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pa ni bdag med pas rnam par dben pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pa ni bdag med pas rnam par dben pa'o //
translated: Pure by nature means empty of self.

original: de'i phyir de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is naturally empty.

original: gzhan phya dang dbang phyug dang byed pa po dang bdag tu 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan phya dang dbang phyug dang byed pa po dang bdag tu 'dod pa ste /
translated: Others assert a self that is different, such as Ishvara, the creator, or the experiencer.

original: de dag dang gzhan yang phyi rol gyi dngos po don du 'dod cing bsags pa dang 'dus pa'i dngos po dang / shes pa yang dus gsum rdzas su smra ba dang / gzhan yang nang gi shes byed ni don du yod la /
analyzed: de dag dang gzhan yang phyi rol gyi dngos po don du 'dod cing bsags pa dang 'dus pa'i dngos po dang / shes pa yang dus gsum rdzas su smra ba dang / gzhan yang nang gi shes byed ni don du yod la /
translated: They and others assert external things to be real, such as the things that are accumulations and composites, and consciousness to be substantial in the three times.

original: shes bya gnyis med pa la don lta bur snang pa'o zhes 'dod pa la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' la rnam par rtog cing /
analyzed: shes bya gnyis med pa la don lta bur snang pa'o zhes 'dod pa la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' la rnam par rtog cing /
translated: They think that the two kinds of objects of knowledge are nondual, and that the meaning of the scriptures appears as an object.

original: ci rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos su smra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'am bdud kyi tshig ces rtog ste /
analyzed: ci rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos su smra ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'am bdud kyi tshig ces rtog ste /
translated: They think, “Is the teaching of the pure nature the word of the Tathāgata or the words of Māra?”

original: yang dag pa'i don la the tshom za zhing phyi rol pa la sogs pa grub pa'i mtha' sna tshogs su rtog cing the tshom za ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don la the tshom za zhing phyi rol pa la sogs pa grub pa'i mtha' sna tshogs su rtog cing the tshom za ba'o //
translated: They doubt the true meaning and think and doubt various tenets such as those of the non-Buddhists.

original: gzhan dag rjod byed kyi chos rgyud dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo rnams la smod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag rjod byed kyi chos rgyud dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo rnams la smod pa'o //
translated: Others disparage the scriptures that are the means of expression, such as the Perfection of Wisdom sūtras.

original: de yang tha dad par brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang tha dad par brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, this is not said to be a separate downfall.

original: gzhi gcig tu brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gzhi gcig tu brjod pa'o //
translated: It is said to be one basis.

original: de'i phyir de la the tshom za ba ni ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la the tshom za ba ni ltung ba'o //
translated: Therefore, doubting it is a downfall.

original: sbyor ba du dang ldan pas dngos gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba du dang ldan pas dngos gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o //
translated: It should also be understood that the actual downfall occurs when it is committed with a certain number of attendant acts.

original: @216a * // ltung ba dang yan lag gi nyes pa yang zhing dang bsam pa dang dus dang sbyor ba'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: @216a * // ltung ba dang yan lag gi nyes pa yang zhing dang bsam pa dang dus dang sbyor ba'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
translated: The downfalls and infractions of the branches should be understood according to the distinctions of field, attitude, occasion, and application.

original: dri ma lags ldang ba ni tshogs pa la bshags la phyis bsdams te skye ba med pa la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: dri ma lags ldang ba ni tshogs pa la bshags la phyis bsdams te skye ba med pa la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: As for the arising of stains, one should confess them in the presence of a group and then, having restrained oneself, one should engage in the practice of not generating them again.

original: gzhan gdul ba'i bsam pa dang / dngos po gtan la 'bebs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa 'grel ba'i dus su nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan gdul ba'i bsam pa dang / dngos po gtan la 'bebs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa 'grel ba'i dus su nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault when one has the intention to train others, when one is ascertaining a matter, or when one is commenting on the intention of the Transcendent Conqueror.

original: gzhi mthun pa'i phyogs su bsdu'o //
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa'i phyogs su bsdu'o //
translated: They are included in the category of concordant bases.

original: ltung ba dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: ltung ba dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the ninth chapter, having nine verses, called “the downfall of not giving material things and Dharma.

original: // / da ni ltung ba bcu pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas //
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba bcu pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas //
translated: Now, wishing to explain the defining characteristics of the tenth downfall, it is said:

original: gdug la rtag tu byams sems ldan //
analyzed: gdug la rtag tu byams sems ldan //
translated: Always having loving kindness for the malicious,

original: byed pa de ni bcu par 'dod //
analyzed: byed pa de ni bcu par 'dod //
translated: this is asserted to be the tenth.

original: ces bya ba bshad de /
analyzed: ces bya ba bshad de /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: de yang gdug pa ni bdud dang mu stegs dang / phyir rgol ba dregs pa can dang / log sred can la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang gdug pa ni bdud dang mu stegs dang / phyir rgol ba dregs pa can dang / log sred can la sogs pa ste /
translated: The malicious are demons, extremists, arrogant opponents, those with wrong views, and so on.

original: yang dag pa'i bkas mi 'dul ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang snying rje dang bral ba'i gang zag la snying rjes rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba dang / thabs gzhan gyis mi 'dul ba la snying rjes bsgral ba la sogs pas 'di dang phyi ma'i don chen po thob par mi byed pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i bkas mi 'dul ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang snying rje dang bral ba'i gang zag la snying rjes rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba dang / thabs gzhan gyis mi 'dul ba la snying rjes bsgral ba la sogs pas 'di dang phyi ma'i don chen po thob par mi byed pa dang /
translated: It is to not bring about the great benefit of this life and the next by means of taming with compassion those who are not to be tamed by the true word, by means of taming with magical power those persons who are devoid of the thought of awakening and compassion, and by means of liberating with compassion those who are not to be tamed by other means.

original: bla ma dang dkon mchog dang sems can phal po che la gnod pa'i gang zag la dga' bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma dang dkon mchog dang sems can phal po che la gnod pa'i gang zag la dga' bar byed pa'o //
translated: It is to delight in persons who harm the guru, the Three Jewels, and many sentient beings.

original: de la snying rjes bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi dang / thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang drag shul gyi spyod pas mi 'dul na ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de la snying rjes bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi dang / thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang drag shul gyi spyod pas mi 'dul na ltung ba'o //
translated: It is to commit a downfall if one does not tame by means of the four means of gathering and various skillful activities, and by means of magical power and wrathful conduct.

original: de'i phyir bde mchog 'khor lo las /
analyzed: de'i phyir bde mchog 'khor lo las /
translated: Therefore, the Cakrasaṃvara Tantra states:

original: shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la //
analyzed: shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la //
translated: For those who are very wrathful and violent,

original: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te//
analyzed: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te//
translated: pacification will not be of benefit.

original: shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of wisdom and means,

original: khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
analyzed: khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
translated: The wrathful one is the activity of all the Tathagatas.

original: ces bshad pa dang / gzhan yang /
analyzed: ces bshad pa dang / gzhan yang /
translated: And also:

original: snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni //
translated: By the power of great compassion,

original: gdug pa yal bar mi 'dor te //
analyzed: gdug pa yal bar mi 'dor te //
translated: the wicked are not abandoned.

original: rdzu 'phrul bsgral la sogs pas gdul //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul bsgral la sogs pas gdul //
translated: They are subdued by miracles, liberation, and so forth.

original: gzhan du bla ma dkon mchog spangs//
analyzed: gzhan du bla ma dkon mchog spangs//
translated: Otherwise, the guru and the Three Jewels are abandoned.

original: zhes 'byung bas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes 'byung bas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation.

original: sbyor ba du dang ldan pas dngos gzhir 'gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba du dang ldan pas dngos gzhir 'gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the basis is endowed with many applications.

original: dri ma las ldang ba dang / tshogs la bshags pa ste /
analyzed: dri ma las ldang ba dang / tshogs la bshags pa ste /
translated: Rising from stains and confessing to the assembly.

original: phrin las rnam pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: phrin las rnam pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o //
translated: The activity of the Tathagata is performed with the four types of activity.

original: shan 'dra pa ni phyogs su bsdu pa'o//
analyzed: shan 'dra pa ni phyogs su bsdu pa'o//
translated: The similar part is the collection into directions.

original: @216b ltung ba bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
analyzed: @216b ltung ba bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
translated: The explanation of the ten downfalls is complete.🔽Now, desiring to explain the characteristics of the eleventh downfall,

original: // / da ni ltung ba bcu gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba bcu gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
translated: it is said:

analyzed: ming sogs bral ba'i chos rnams la //

original: der rtog pa ni bcu gcig pa //🔽zhes bshad pa ste /
analyzed: der rtog pa ni bcu gcig pa // zhes bshad pa ste /
translated: the conception of that is the eleventh.

original: ming sogs bral ba'i chos rnams ni //
analyzed: ming sogs bral ba'i chos rnams ni //
translated: The phenomena free from name and so forth are

original: rjod par byed pa'i tha snyad las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa'i tha snyad las 'das pa ste /
translated: It is beyond the conventions of expression.

original: mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi yul shes brjod kyi yul bas 'das pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi yul shes brjod kyi yul bas 'das pa'o //
translated: It is beyond the objects of the mind that conceptualizes and the speech that expresses.

original: de yang lung dang rigs pas grub ste /
analyzed: de yang lung dang rigs pas grub ste /
translated: This is established by both scripture and logic.

original: lung ni theg pa chen po'i rgyud dang mdo mtha' dag las grub pa'o //
analyzed: lung ni theg pa chen po'i rgyud dang mdo mtha' dag las grub pa'o //
translated: The scripture is established in all the tantras and sutras of the Mahayana.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: It says:

original: dngos rnams bdag dang gzhan las min //
analyzed: dngos rnams bdag dang gzhan las min //
translated: Things do not arise from self or other,

original: gnyis ka las te med mi skye //
analyzed: gnyis ka las te med mi skye //
translated: From both or causelessly.

original: skye 'gag spros bral rnam par stong //
analyzed: skye 'gag spros bral rnam par stong //

original: yod med shes brjod yul las 'das //🔽gcig dang du ma'i mtha' shes shing //
analyzed: yod med shes brjod yul las 'das // gcig dang du ma'i mtha' shes shing //
translated: They are beyond the objects of existent and nonexistent knowledge and expression.🔽They are beyond the extremes of one and many.

original: skad cig cha shas brtags pas dben //
analyzed: skad cig cha shas brtags pas dben //
translated: They are free from the analysis of moments and parts.

original: gzugs dang stong ba tha dad min //
analyzed: gzugs dang stong ba tha dad min //
translated: Form and emptiness are not different.

original: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang //
translated: They are totally afflicted and totally pure.🔽Desire, affliction, the view of self,

original: 'dod chags nyon mongs bdag lta dang // skye med thams cad mkhyen pa yang //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyon mongs bdag lta dang // skye med thams cad mkhyen pa yang //
translated: And the unborn omniscience

original: rang bzhin gcig ste tha dad med //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig ste tha dad med //
translated: Are the same nature and not different.

original: 'di dag dam pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'di dag dam pa'i don du'o //
translated: This is the ultimate.

analyzed: zhes 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: All phenomena are like a dream, like an illusion.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu /

original: mya ngan las 'das pa las ches lhag pa'i chos cig yod na yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa las ches lhag pa'i chos cig yod na yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Even if there were a phenomenon superior to nirvana, that would also be like a dream, like an illusion.

original: rigs pa ni /
analyzed: rigs pa ni /
translated: The reasoning is as follows.

original: phyi dang nang gi dngos po ni //
analyzed: phyi dang nang gi dngos po ni //
translated: Outer and inner things

original: dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med //
analyzed: dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med //
translated: are in reality devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: bdag las ma skyes gzhan las min//
analyzed: bdag las ma skyes gzhan las min//
translated: They are not born from themselves, not from another,

original: gnyis ka las te rgyu med min //
analyzed: gnyis ka las te rgyu med min //
translated: not from both, and not without cause.

original: gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin du brtag / bdag la sogs pas rnam par dben //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin du brtag / bdag la sogs pas rnam par dben //
translated: Like a reflection and so on, they are devoid of self and so on.

original: nang gi shes pa yod min te //
analyzed: nang gi shes pa yod min te //
translated: There is no inner consciousness.

original: rtag chad mtha' dang rnam par bral //
analyzed: rtag chad mtha' dang rnam par bral //
translated: It is free from the extremes of permanence and annihilation.

original: gzhan du lung dang rigs pas gnod //
analyzed: gzhan du lung dang rigs pas gnod //
translated: Otherwise, it is undermined by scripture and reasoning.

original: ces bshad pa dang / slob dpon 'phags pa lhas bshad pa //
analyzed: ces bshad pa dang / slob dpon 'phags pa lhas bshad pa //
translated: And as explained by the master Āryadeva:

original: ji srid yod par rtog pa na //
analyzed: ji srid yod par rtog pa na //
translated: For as long as there is the conception of existence,

original: de yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
analyzed: de yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
translated: That also is not the definition of illusion.

original: ji srid med par rtog pa na //
analyzed: ji srid med par rtog pa na //
translated: As long as one conceives of non-existence,

original: de yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
analyzed: de yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
translated: that also is not the definition of illusion.

original: ji srid dbus mar rtog pa na //
analyzed: ji srid dbus mar rtog pa na //
translated: As long as one conceives of the middle,

original: de yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
analyzed: de yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
translated: that also is not the definition of illusion.

original: de kun rang bzhin med do zhes //
analyzed: de kun rang bzhin med do zhes //
translated: All of those are said to be essenceless.

original: theg pa che @217a * //🔽rnams smra byed kyang //
analyzed: theg pa che @217a * // rnams smra byed kyang //
translated: The proponents of the Great Vehicle

original: bdag byin brlab las phyi rol phyogs //
analyzed: bdag byin brlab las phyi rol phyogs //
translated: are outside of the self-consecration.

original: zhes bshad pas ming dang brda la sogs pa dang bral ba'i chos lung dang rigs pas yang dag par bsgrub ste /🔽rigs pa ni rgya cher slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
analyzed: zhes bshad pas ming dang brda la sogs pa dang bral ba'i chos lung dang rigs pas yang dag par bsgrub ste / rigs pa ni rgya cher slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
translated: Thus, one should correctly establish the Dharma free from names, signs, and so forth, by means of scripture and reasoning.

original: dbu ma rigs pa'i tshogs las rgya cher gtan la phab pas /
analyzed: dbu ma rigs pa'i tshogs las rgya cher gtan la phab pas /
translated: The reasoning is extensively determined by the master Nagarjuna in the Collection of Reasonings.

original: de yang 'dir bdag gis spros na don med pa'i phyir ma spros so //
analyzed: de yang 'dir bdag gis spros na don med pa'i phyir ma spros so //
translated: Since it is pointless for me to elaborate on that here, I will not elaborate.

original: de'i rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar rtog na ni ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar rtog na ni ltung ba'o //
translated: If one conceives of the extremes of permanence and annihilation, one falls.

original: yan lag dus dngos gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag dus dngos gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should also understand that the branches become the actual basis.

analyzed: ldang ba ni tshogs pa la bshags te de nyid las log ste goms par byed pa'o //
translated: Rising from it is to confess it to the assembly, to turn away from it, and to cultivate it.

original: ltung ba bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: ltung ba bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the eleventh downfall.🔽Now, wishing to explain the definition of the twelfth downfall,

analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba bcu gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas / sems can dad dang ldan pa yi //
translated: it is said:🔽To cause disillusionment in a faithful

original: sems sun 'byin pa bcu gnyis pa //🔽zhes bshad de /
analyzed: sems sun 'byin pa bcu gnyis pa // zhes bshad de /
translated: sentient being is the twelfth root downfall.

original: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i las dang po pa la sogs pa la mi dad cing ma gus pa'i rnal 'byor pa lus ngag gis bag med par spyod cing /
analyzed: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i las dang po pa la sogs pa la mi dad cing ma gus pa'i rnal 'byor pa lus ngag gis bag med par spyod cing /
translated: A yogin who is disrespectful and has no faith in beginners and those newly embarked on the vehicle, and who acts carelessly with body and speech,

original: de'i rgyus gzhan ma dang cing rdo rje theg pa la smod cing ma zhugs pa rnams mi 'jug cing /
analyzed: de'i rgyus gzhan ma dang cing rdo rje theg pa la smod cing ma zhugs pa rnams mi 'jug cing /

original: zhugs pa rnams zlog par byed na ltung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhugs pa rnams zlog par byed na ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: If one does that, there is a downfall.

original: yan lag dus dngos gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag dus dngos gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the branch is the actual basis.

original: yan lag gi nyes byas la sogs pa lci yang gi bye brag gis dri ma las ldang ba yang tshogs pa la bshags pa dang / mandala sngon du 'gro bas dam pa gcig la bshags pa dang / phra mo ni sems kyis bsdams te de nyid la sogs pa rjes su gzung ba'o //

translated: One should confess the faults that arise from the stains by means of the distinctions of heavy and light secondary transgressions and so forth, in the presence of an assembly, or in the presence of a holy being, preceded by a maṇḍala.

original: yul dang dus dang bsam pa dang / rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa lci yang dang nyes med pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang bsam pa dang / rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa lci yang dang nyes med pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the distinctions of heavy and light faults and the absence of faults by means of the distinctions of object, time, intention, and circumstances.

original: ltung ba bcu gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: ltung ba bcu gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the twelve downfalls.🔽Now, wishing to explain the definition of the thirteenth downfall,

original: // / da ni ltung ba bcu gsum pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba bcu gsum pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
translated: it is said:

original: dam tshig rdzas ni ji bzhin rnyed //
analyzed: dam tshig rdzas ni ji bzhin rnyed //
translated: “The pledge substances are not used as found,

original: mi bsten pa ni bcu gsum pa //
analyzed: mi bsten pa ni bcu gsum pa //
translated: not relying is the thirteenth.”

original: zhes bya ba bshad de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba bshad de /
translated: This is explained.

original: dam tshig ni 'dir bshad pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba la bya ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni 'dir bshad pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba la bya ste /
translated: Pledge is used here and below for the pledges and vows that will be explained.

original: de khyad du gsod cing ma gus pa dang / nyon mongs pas zil gyis non pas nyes pa byung yang dri ma @217b las ldang bar mi byed pa dang / mi shes pa yang ltung ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: de khyad du gsod cing ma gus pa dang / nyon mongs pas zil gyis non pas nyes pa byung yang dri ma @217b las ldang bar mi byed pa dang / mi shes pa yang ltung ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ste /
translated: And even when they do not know the precepts, they are a cause for downfalls.

original: de bas na skyes bu blun po smin par byas pa rnams kyang phal cher ltung ba'i gzhi yin pas /
analyzed: de bas na skyes bu blun po smin par byas pa rnams kyang phal cher ltung ba'i gzhi yin pas /
translated: Therefore, even when fools have been ripened, they are mostly a basis for downfalls.

original: de dag ni dri ma las ldang ba dka' ba ste /
analyzed: de dag ni dri ma las ldang ba dka' ba ste /
translated: Thus, it is difficult for them to rise up from the stain.

original: de dag rang gi ldang ba'i nus pa chung ba'i phyir phal cher gzhan la bsten pa dang / dpa' bo'i ston mo la sogs pas ldang bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag rang gi ldang ba'i nus pa chung ba'i phyir phal cher gzhan la bsten pa dang / dpa' bo'i ston mo la sogs pas ldang bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Because their ability to rise up is weak, they mostly rely on others and rise up through the hero’s feast and so on.🔽Those who are wise rise up from the stain very easily.

original: skyes bu shes rab can rnams kyis dri ma las ldang ba ni shin tu yang bas de dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu'i don la mkhas pa dag gis 'dag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: skyes bu shes rab can rnams kyis dri ma las ldang ba ni shin tu yang bas de dag kyang sgyu ma lta bu'i don la mkhas pa dag gis 'dag par 'gyur te /
translated: And they are purified by those who are skilled in the meaning of illusion-like emptiness.

original: de yang smras pa /
analyzed: de yang smras pa /
translated: This is stated:

original: mkhas pas dri ma las ldang ba ;
analyzed: mkhas pas dri ma las ldang ba ;
translated: The wise rise up from the stain.

original: / bshags dang bral dang bkru ba dang // dbyung dang bsreg dang dmigs pas stong //
analyzed: / bshags dang bral dang bkru ba dang // dbyung dang bsreg dang dmigs pas stong //
translated: expelling, burning, and emptiness of reference points,🔽initiation, gathering, and so forth,🔽gathering of the assembly, the one sublime,

analyzed: dbang dang tshogs la sogs pa dang // tshogs pa 'dus dang dam pa gcig / dkyil 'khor la sogs mdun du byas //
translated: making the mandala and so forth in front,🔽mandala, burnt offerings, stupas,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg mchod rten dang // gtor ma la sogs dri ma ldang // blun pos lci pa dri ma la //
translated: food offerings, and so forth, rising up from stains,🔽the fool thinks that heavy stains🔽are not purified.

analyzed: 'dag pa'i shes pa min par rtog / ces bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa dang / gzhan yang de lta bu'i dbang du byas nas /

analyzed: mkhas pas sdig pa bshags pa dang ldang ba yang /

original: mkhas pas sdig pa byas pa rnam smin 'phral la spyang //
analyzed: mkhas pas sdig pa byas pa rnam smin 'phral la spyang //

analyzed: mi mkhas sdig pa byas pas de nyid thur du 'gro //

original: lcags kyi gong bu chung yang chu yi gting du 'gro //
analyzed: lcags kyi gong bu chung yang chu yi gting du 'gro //

analyzed: de nyid snod du byas na che yang kha na 'phyo //

analyzed: zhes bshad pas kyang tshul de nyid bstan to //

original: gzhan dag las /
analyzed: gzhan dag las /
translated: And from other sources:

analyzed: mkhas pas sdig pa byas pa rnams //
translated: The wise who commit misdeeds

original: bka' sogs bslus te shin tu lci //
analyzed: bka' sogs bslus te shin tu lci //
translated: are deceived by the words and so forth, and it is very heavy.

original: blun pos sdig pa lci ba min //
analyzed: blun pos sdig pa lci ba min //

original: rang bzhin blun pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rang bzhin blun pa nyid kyis so //

analyzed: zhes bya ba yang mkhas pas bka' bslus pa dang / khyad du dpas lci par shes par bya'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir don du mi gnyer ba ni ltung ba'o //
