original: gzhan yang sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig thun bzhi'i rim pas sku'i dam tshig ni lha'i rnam par bsgom pa dang / gsung gi dam tshig ni sngags kyi grangs dang / thugs kyi dam tshig ni bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis mi rtog pa dang /🔽gzhan yang rtsa ba'i 'khrul @218a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig thun bzhi'i rim pas sku'i dam tshig ni lha'i rnam par bsgom pa dang / gsung gi dam tshig ni sngags kyi grangs dang / thugs kyi dam tshig ni bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis mi rtog pa dang / gzhan yang rtsa ba'i 'khrul @218a * //
translated: Moreover, the pledges of body, speech, and mind are the stages of the four periods. The pledge of body is the meditation on the form of the deity; the pledge of speech is the recitation of the mantra; the pledge of mind is non-conceptuality by the method of the two truths;

original: 'khor mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: and the pledge of quality is not to meditate on the root and branch samayas.

original: gzhan yang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lnga'i rang bzhin shes par byas te mi spad pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / dri chu la sogs pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin shes par byas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa lnga'i rang bzhin shes par byas te mi spad pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / dri chu la sogs pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin shes par byas te /
translated: One should know the nature of the five nectars such as Vairocana and urine and not rely on them.🔽Having refined the impurities such as dust, one should discard them without relying on them.

original: sbar sbur la sogs pa sbyangs nas mi bsten par 'dor ba dang / gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis nas /
analyzed: sbar sbur la sogs pa sbyangs nas mi bsten par 'dor ba dang / gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis nas /
translated: Furthermore, one should not rely on the bodhicitta from the thirty-two channels of bodhicitta, and so on, and discard them.

original: chu ser la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnams bsten par mi byed cing 'dor ba dang / gzhan yang yan lag gi dam tshig mang du bshad pa rnams bsten par mi byed pa dang / rtog pa dang bral zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs te /
analyzed: chu ser la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnams bsten par mi byed cing 'dor ba dang / gzhan yang yan lag gi dam tshig mang du bshad pa rnams bsten par mi byed pa dang / rtog pa dang bral zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs te /
translated: Furthermore, one should not rely on the many explained branch pledges and should be free from concepts and realize the meaning of equality.

original: blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i dam tshig la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i dam tshig la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: One should not abide in the pledge of non-acceptance and non-rejection.

original: de dag las 'da' bar byed pa ni ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de dag las 'da' bar byed pa ni ltung ba'o //
translated: To transgress those is a downfall.

original: yan lag dus dngos gzhir gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag dus dngos gzhir gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that the branch is the actual basis at the time.

original: ldang ba ni bshad zin pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyi dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba dang / ldang ba yang de nyid las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ldang ba ni bshad zin pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyi dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba dang / ldang ba yang de nyid las shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand from that very source the transgression of the vow and the rising from it, which have been explained and will be explained.

original: yul dang bsam pa dang dus dang rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yul dang bsam pa dang dus dang rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the distinctions of non-transgression and transgression by the distinctions of object, thought, time, and circumstance.

original: ltung ba bcu gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: ltung ba bcu gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the thirteenth downfall.

original: // / da ni ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /🔽shes rab rang bzhin bud med la //
analyzed: // / da ni ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste / shes rab rang bzhin bud med la //
translated: Now, the characteristics of the fourteenth downfall will be explained.🔽The fourteenth is to disparage a woman

original: smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa //
analyzed: smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa //
translated: who is the nature of wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said:

original: shes rab kyi rang bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi rang bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste /
translated: The nature of wisdom is the mother of the buddhas, the perfection of wisdom.

original: de yang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su gzung ba dang / rig pa'i brtul zhugs nye bar bsten pa la bya ste /
analyzed: de yang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su gzung ba dang / rig pa'i brtul zhugs nye bar bsten pa la bya ste /
translated: Moreover, she is to be taken as the consort in the secret empowerment and the wisdom-awareness empowerment, and she is to be relied upon in the practice of pure awareness.

original: de dag kyang khyad par dang bye brag gi dbye ba yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang khyad par dang bye brag gi dbye ba yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should also know their distinctions and specific divisions.

original: yan lag dus dngos gzhir 'gyur ba dang / yul dang bsam pa dang / dus dang rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa dang lci yang dang nyes pa med pa la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yan lag dus dngos gzhir 'gyur ba dang / yul dang bsam pa dang / dus dang rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa dang lci yang dang nyes pa med pa la sogs pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should also know the faults, the heavy and light [actions], the absence of faults, and so forth, through the distinctions of the occasion, the basis, the object, the intention, the time, and the circumstances.

original: ldang ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pas so //
analyzed: ldang ba ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pas so //
translated: [One should also know] the rising [from downfalls] through the wheel of the assembly and so forth.

original: shan 'dra ba ni bud med thams cad de phyogs su bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: shan 'dra ba ni bud med thams cad de phyogs su bsdu ba'o //
translated: [One should also know] the similarity of the classes [of downfalls], which is the inclusion of all women in that category.

original: bshags pa'i tshad kyang yan lag gi nyes pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: bshags pa'i tshad kyang yan lag gi nyes pa'i tshad do //
translated: [One should also know] the measure of confession, which is the measure of the faults of the branches.

original: ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i bshad @218b pa'o /
analyzed: ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i bshad @218b pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the fourteen downfalls.

original: // / de dag nye bar bsdus te bshad pa /
analyzed: // / de dag nye bar bsdus te bshad pa /
translated: The summary explanation

original: sngags pas de dag spangs na ni //
analyzed: sngags pas de dag spangs na ni //
translated: If the mantrin abandons those,

original: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
translated: he will quickly attain power.

original: gzhan du dam tshig nyams pas na //
analyzed: gzhan du dam tshig nyams pas na //
translated: Otherwise, by violating the commitments,

original: nyams pas bdud kyis gzung bas 'gyur //
analyzed: nyams pas bdud kyis gzung bas 'gyur //
translated: he will be seized by demons through the violation,

original: de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: de nas sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing //
translated: and then he will experience suffering

original: thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro //
analyzed: thur du bltas te dmyal bar 'gro //
translated: and fall into the hells, looking downward.

original: de bsang rgyal bcom nas ni //
analyzed: de bsang rgyal bcom nas ni //
translated: Having purified that,🔽one should hold the commitments with respect,

original: bdag nyid dang ldan gus pa dang // ma 'khrul pas ni gzung bar bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid dang ldan gus pa dang // ma 'khrul pas ni gzung bar bya //
translated: not confused, and with self-control.

original: gal te nyams na bla ma la //
analyzed: gal te nyams na bla ma la //
translated: If one transgresses, one should purify the stains

original: phul la sogs pas dri ma 'dag / bdag nyid gzhan la phan 'dogs pas //
analyzed: phul la sogs pas dri ma 'dag / bdag nyid gzhan la phan 'dogs pas //
translated: with offerings and so forth, and benefit oneself and others.

original: bla ma dkon mchog mchod byas shing //
analyzed: bla ma dkon mchog mchod byas shing //
translated: Having made offerings to the guru and the Three Jewels,

original: gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te /
analyzed: gsum la skyabs 'gro nas brtsams te /
translated: beginning with going for refuge to the Three Jewels,

original: bsod nams tshogs ni nyer bas gas nas //
analyzed: bsod nams tshogs ni nyer bas gas nas //
translated: one should accumulate merit.🔽Having done that, one should take up all the vows,

original: byang chub sems la sogs pa yi //🔽sdom pa thams cad gzung bar bya //
analyzed: byang chub sems la sogs pa yi // sdom pa thams cad gzung bar bya //
translated: such as the mind of enlightenment and so forth.

original: zhes pa la sogs pas bshad de /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pas bshad de /
translated: Thus it is explained.

original: de dag kyang tshig gnyis kyis phan yon bstan pa dang / tshig bshad gcig gis dam tshig las nyams pa'i nyes dmigs bstan pa dang / tshig bshad phyed kyis bdag nyid gus pa dang ldan pas ma 'khrul pas dam tshig gzung bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang tshig gnyis kyis phan yon bstan pa dang / tshig bshad gcig gis dam tshig las nyams pa'i nyes dmigs bstan pa dang / tshig bshad phyed kyis bdag nyid gus pa dang ldan pas ma 'khrul pas dam tshig gzung bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: Two lines teach the benefits, one line teaches the disadvantages of transgressing the commitments, and one and a half lines teach that one should hold the commitments with respect, not confused, and with self-control.

original: tshig rkang gnyis kyis ni dri ma las ldang bar bstan to//
analyzed: tshig rkang gnyis kyis ni dri ma las ldang bar bstan to//
translated: Two lines teach rising from stains.

original: tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis ni bla ma dang dkon mchog mchod cing tshogs de nye bar gzung zhing /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis ni bla ma dang dkon mchog mchod cing tshogs de nye bar gzung zhing /
translated: The first two and a half verses show how to worship the teacher and the Three Jewels and how to take up the collections.🔽

original: dam tshig dang sdom pa gzung bar bstan to //
analyzed: dam tshig dang sdom pa gzung bar bstan to //
translated: The first and a half verses show the worship of the guru and the Three Jewels, the taking up of the collection, and the taking of the vow.

original: 'di dag ni bcas pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'di dag ni bcas pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the injunctions.

original: yan lag gi don yang thabs dang shes rab dang / de kho na nyid bcu dang / rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / thabs kyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: yan lag gi don yang thabs dang shes rab dang / de kho na nyid bcu dang / rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / thabs kyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: The subsidiary meaning is that of method and insight, the ten realities, the reality of cause, result, and method,

original: tshul bdun dang / bskyed rdzogs gnyis dang / bsnyen sgrub kyi bye brag gis bdag dang / gzhan gyi don bya bar 'dod ba ni sngags pa ste /
analyzed: tshul bdun dang / bskyed rdzogs gnyis dang / bsnyen sgrub kyi bye brag gis bdag dang / gzhan gyi don bya bar 'dod ba ni sngags pa ste /
translated: the seven modes, the two processes, and the desire to perform one's own and another's aim by means of the distinctions of the approach and accomplishment.

original: de lta bus dam tshig gi dri ma spangs pa ni snod du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bus dam tshig gi dri ma spangs pa ni snod du gyur pa ste /
translated: The one who is thus a mantri/ni, having abandoned the stain of the vow, is a fit vessel,

original: mchod dang thun mong gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mchod dang thun mong gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: and will attain the common and supreme feats.

original: gzhan du dam tshig las nyams na ni tshe 'di la yang bdud kyis gzung ste sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: gzhan du dam tshig las nyams na ni tshe 'di la yang bdud kyis gzung ste sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur la /
translated: Otherwise, if one violates the vow, one will be seized by Mara in this life and will experience suffering.

original: phyi ma la yang rdo rje dmyal ba la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi ma la yang rdo rje dmyal ba la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And in the future, one will be born in the Vajra Hell and so forth.

original: de dag la sogs pa'i tshad ni gong du bstan pas 'dir ma bstan @219a * //
analyzed: de dag la sogs pa'i tshad ni gong du bstan pas 'dir ma bstan @219a * //
translated: The measure of these and other [downfalls] has been taught above, so it is not taught here.

original: to ; / de bas na bdag nyid ma 'khrul par rtog tu dam tshig rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: to ; / de bas na bdag nyid ma 'khrul par rtog tu dam tshig rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should maintain the commitments without being confused about them.

original: gal te nyams na yang bla ma la phul ba dang bshags pa'i tshad rnams kyis dri ma las ldang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te nyams na yang bla ma la phul ba dang bshags pa'i tshad rnams kyis dri ma las ldang bar bya'o //
translated: If one does transgress, one should rise up from the stains by the measures of offering to the guru and confessing.

original: bdag nyid la phan par 'dod pas //🔽dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la //
analyzed: bdag nyid la phan par 'dod pas // dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la //
translated: One who wishes to benefit oneself🔽should gather the accumulation of merit

original: skyabs su 'gro ba nas brtsams te bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsag par bya'o //
analyzed: skyabs su 'gro ba nas brtsams te bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsag par bya'o //
translated: beginning with going for refuge to the Three Jewels and so forth.

original: byang chub sems kyi sdom pa la sogs ta sdom pa thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi sdom pa la sogs ta sdom pa thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
translated: One should take up all the vows, such as the vow of bodhicitta and so forth.

original: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'i nye bar bsdus pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'i nye bar bsdus pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the summary of the extensive explanation of the fourteen root downfalls of the Vajra Vehicle.

original: // / da ni yan lag gi nyes pa bshad par 'dod nas /
analyzed: // / da ni yan lag gi nyes pa bshad par 'dod nas /
translated: Now, wishing to explain the branch faults, it says:

original: he ru ka dang slob dpon la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa ni mchod par brjod par sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: he ru ka dang slob dpon la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa ni mchod par brjod par sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: Homage to Heruka and the master means that, having first made an offering,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i he ru ka dang bla ma tha mi dad la phyag 'tshal ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang ldan pa'i rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i he ru ka dang bla ma tha mi dad la phyag 'tshal ba'i don to //
translated: one pays homage to the Heruka and the guru who are inseparable, who are pure cause, path, and result, and who possess the three gates of liberation.

original: rab tu bde ba 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: rab tu bde ba 'phrog par byed //
translated: Stealing the highest bliss,

original: yan lag nyes pa bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: yan lag nyes pa bdag gis bshad //
translated: I will explain the branch faults.

original: ces bya ba ni rab tu bde ba 'phrog par byed pa ni gzhi dam tshig las bde ba thams cad skyed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rab tu bde ba 'phrog par byed pa ni gzhi dam tshig las bde ba thams cad skyed pa'o //
translated: Stealing the highest bliss means that all bliss is generated from the basis, the pledge.

original: yan lag nyes pa nga yis bshad //
analyzed: yan lag nyes pa nga yis bshad //
translated: I will explain the branch faults

original: ces pa ni yan lag gi dngos gzhi ma rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni yan lag gi dngos gzhi ma rdzogs pa'o //
translated: means that the branch basic elements are incomplete.

original: yan lag gi gtso bo tsam yod pa ni sbom po'o //
analyzed: yan lag gi gtso bo tsam yod pa ni sbom po'o //
translated: The mere existence of the principal branch is gross.

original: bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci ba'o //
analyzed: bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci ba'o //
translated: The confession that is past the time is heavy.

original: gzhan du ni nyes pa dang phra mo'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni nyes pa dang phra mo'o //
translated: In other cases, it is a fault or subtle.

original: nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should also know that there is no fault.

original: de dag bye brag tu phye bas nang yis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de dag bye brag tu phye bas nang yis bshad pa'o //
translated: By distinguishing those, the inner explanation is complete.

original: de nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
analyzed: de nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
translated: he says,

original: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i //
analyzed: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i //
translated: “One who is not endowed with the commitments,

original: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang // zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: and delights in relying on a knowledge-woman.”

original: dam tshig dang mi ldan pa ni dbang ma thob pa dang / gsang mi thub pa dang / sngags pa bdag nyid lam dad pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi rig ma'i lo grangs dang mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig dang mi ldan pa ni dbang ma thob pa dang / gsang mi thub pa dang / sngags pa bdag nyid lam dad pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi rig ma'i lo grangs dang mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'o //
translated: One who is not endowed with the commitments is one who has not obtained initiation, who cannot keep a secret, and who is not himself a mantrin, and who does not have a knowledge-woman of the body, speech, and mind maṇḍalas who is of the proper age and qualifications.

original: ldan yang chags pas nye bar bsten zhing mya ngan las 'das pa la mi dga' ba la sogs pas bsten par byed na yan lag gi nyes pa'o //
analyzed: ldan yang chags pas nye bar bsten zhing mya ngan las 'das pa la mi dga' ba la sogs pas bsten par byed na yan lag gi nyes pa'o //
translated: If one relies on a woman who is endowed with the commitments, but relies on her with attachment and without delight in nirvana, and so on, that is a branch fault.

original: dri ma las ldang ba ni tshogs la bshags pa ste /
analyzed: dri ma las ldang ba ni tshogs la bshags pa ste /
translated: Rising from stains is confession in the ganacakra ritual.

original: dam tshig dang ldan pa la rjes su bslab pa'o //🔽shan 'dra ba ni phyogs @219b su bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig dang ldan pa la rjes su bslab pa'o // shan 'dra ba ni phyogs @219b su bsdu ba'o //
translated: One should train in the commitments.🔽The same is the case for the second branch.

original: yan lag gi nyes pa dang po bshad pa'o /
analyzed: yan lag gi nyes pa dang po bshad pa'o /
translated: The first branch fault has been explained.🔽Wishing to explain the second,

original: // / gnyis pa bshad par 'dod nas /
analyzed: // / gnyis pa bshad par 'dod nas /
translated: he says,

original: tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa ni //
analyzed: tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa ni //
translated: “Disputes in the gaṇacakra ritual,

original: yan lag nyes pa gnyis par bshad //
analyzed: yan lag nyes pa gnyis par bshad //
translated: This is explained as the second branch fault.

original: ces pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / dpa' bo'i ston mo dang / tshogs kyi nang du rtsod pa ste /
analyzed: ces pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / dpa' bo'i ston mo dang / tshogs kyi nang du rtsod pa ste /
translated: The gaṇacakra, the hero’s feast, and the dispute in the assembly🔽are the branch faults.

original: stan de nyid la zhi ba ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o //🔽dus las 'das pa ni sbom po'o //
analyzed: stan de nyid la zhi ba ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o // dus las 'das pa ni sbom po'o //
translated: The transgression is a serious transgression.

original: gzhan du nyes byas dang phra mo'o //
analyzed: gzhan du nyes byas dang phra mo'o //
translated: The other faults are minor faults.

original: ldang ba ni de nyid las bshags shing nyes pa'i rim pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pas dri ma las ldang ngo //
analyzed: ldang ba ni de nyid las bshags shing nyes pa'i rim pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pas dri ma las ldang ngo //
translated: The rising is the confession in that very seat. By the order of the faults, one rises from the stains by the gaṇacakra, and so on.

original: shan 'dra ba ni phyogs su bsdu pa'o //
analyzed: shan 'dra ba ni phyogs su bsdu pa'o //
translated: The similar class is the gathering in the direction.

original: zhing dang bsam pa'i khyad par las kyang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: zhing dang bsam pa'i khyad par las kyang shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood from the distinctions of the field and the intention.

original: nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //
translated: The absence of faults should also be understood.

original: yan lag gi nyes pa gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
analyzed: yan lag gi nyes pa gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
translated: This is the explanation of the second branch fault.

original: // / yan lag gi nyes pa gsum pa bshad par 'dod nas /🔽ma gsungs pa yi rig ma las //
analyzed: // / yan lag gi nyes pa gsum pa bshad par 'dod nas / ma gsungs pa yi rig ma las //
translated: The third branch fault is explained by

original: sngags pas bdud rtsi thob byed pa //
analyzed: sngags pas bdud rtsi thob byed pa //
translated: the mantra practitioner who obtains nectar🔽from a consort who is not mentioned

original: yan lag nyes pa gsum pa yin //🔽zhes bya bas bshad do /
analyzed: yan lag nyes pa gsum pa yin //🔽zhes bya bas bshad do /
translated: is the third branch fault.

original: ma gsungs pa ni smod pa'o //
analyzed: ma gsungs pa ni smod pa'o //
translated: Not speaking is a downfall.

original: de las bdud rtsi lnga 'thob par byed pa ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o //
analyzed: de las bdud rtsi lnga 'thob par byed pa ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o //

analyzed: bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci ba'o //

analyzed: ldang ba ni mandala gcig sngon du 'gro bas dam pa gcig la bshags par bya'o //

analyzed: nyan thos ni zag la bdag med pa tsam rtogs shing /

analyzed: de'i nang du zhag bdun 'das te rang gi spyod pa mi byed na yan lag gi nyes pa sbom po'o //

analyzed: bshags pa dus 'das pa lci pa'o //

original: nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //

analyzed: yan lag gi nyes pa drug pa'i bshad pa'o /

analyzed: // / da ni yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa bshad par 'dod nas /
translated: it is said:

analyzed: nga ni sngags pa yin zer ba //

original: bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci ba'o //
analyzed: bshags pa dus 'das pa ni lci ba'o //

original: nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //

translated: The rising is as follows: Having first made a single maṇḍala, one should confess in the presence of a holy being, and later one should restrain oneself and engage in the meaning of reality.

analyzed: yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /

analyzed: // / da ni yan lag gi nyes pa brgyad pa bshad par 'dod nas //

analyzed: phyi yi chos 'chad byed pa las //

original: gsang ba'i chos rnams 'chad pa ni //
analyzed: gsang ba'i chos rnams 'chad pa ni //

analyzed: bshags pa dus las 'das na lci ba'o //

original: nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: nyes pa phra mo dang nyes pa med pa yang shes par bya'o //

analyzed: / bskal ba mang por dmyal bar skye //

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: yan lag gi nyes pa brgyad pa'i bshad pa'o /

analyzed: rig byed dngos la zhen pa yin //

analyzed: khyad du gsod pa yang ni ri //

analyzed: gang min tshul ston bkra shis so //

original: phrin las ma gtogs gza' zhes grags //
analyzed: phrin las ma gtogs gza' zhes grags //

original: don med gnas pa phyogs yin no //
analyzed: don med gnas pa phyogs yin no //
translated: The direction is the meaningless abode.

original: brtse ba gtong ba drag po ste //
analyzed: brtse ba gtong ba drag po ste //

original: dman pa'i spyod pa nyi ma'o //
analyzed: dman pa'i spyod pa nyi ma'o //
translated: The day is the conduct of the inferior.

original: zang zing rtog pa yan lag go //
analyzed: zang zing rtog pa yan lag go //
translated: The branch is the conception of material things.

original: yongs su mi 'dzin sa zhes bya //
analyzed: yongs su mi 'dzin sa zhes bya //
translated: The earth is called the non-grasping.

original: rang spyod dor ba tshes zhes bya //
analyzed: rang spyod dor ba tshes zhes bya //
translated: The date is called the abandonment of one's own conduct.

original: zhes pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes pa smos te /

analyzed: de dag kyang yan lag du dang ldan pas nyes par 'gyur ba yang gong du bstan pa las shes par bya'o //

analyzed: de dag kyang rim pa bzhin du bshad @221a * //
translated: These will now be explained in order.🔽🔽

original: par bya ste /
analyzed: par bya ste /
translated: These are to be explained in order.

original: mig ni gnyis so //
analyzed: mig ni gnyis so //
translated: The eyes are two.

original: rang lha dor ba ni yi dam spong ba'o //
analyzed: rang lha dor ba ni yi dam spong ba'o //
translated: The rejection of one's deity is the abandonment of the tutelary deity.

analyzed: de la ma gus pa la sogs pa gnyis su brtags te blang dor ni ltung ba'o //
translated: Therein, disrespect, etc. are considered to be two, and the taking up and rejecting are the downfalls.

original: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / yang na rtog ge pa rnams kyis rang gi 'dod pa'i lha la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa gzhug pa snang ste /
analyzed: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / yang na rtog ge pa rnams kyis rang gi 'dod pa'i lha la dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa gzhug pa snang ste /
translated: Or else, it appears that logicians insert their own desired deity into the mandala lord, etc.

original: gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi rgyud la dgongs nas /
analyzed: gzhan yang mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi rgyud la dgongs nas /
translated: Moreover, with reference to the tantra of the dakini's magical power, the supreme bliss,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lus la bsdus nas byin gyis brlabs na khyad par du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bshad pas phyogs 'di lta bus kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lus la bsdus nas byin gyis brlabs na khyad par du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bshad pas phyogs 'di lta bus kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: it is explained that if one concentrates all the Tathagatas in one's body and blesses it, one will achieve the special powers. Thus, one will achieve by this method.

original: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo 'pho ba la sogs pa yang tshul de nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo 'pho ba la sogs pa yang tshul de nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the transference of the mandala lord, etc. should be understood by the same method.

original: dbang dang mi ldan pa la ldang ba'i dus na me tog bab pa dang / bla ma'i rjes su mos pa dang / thabs khyad par can thob pa dang / las gzhan dang 'brel pa'i dus rnams su nyes pa med do //
analyzed: dbang dang mi ldan pa la ldang ba'i dus na me tog bab pa dang / bla ma'i rjes su mos pa dang / thabs khyad par can thob pa dang / las gzhan dang 'brel pa'i dus rnams su nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault if one is not empowered, if it is time to rise, if the flower has fallen, if one is devoted to the guru, if one has attained a special method, or if it is time connected with other activities.

original: thams cad du mnyam pa nyid rtogs na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: thams cad du mnyam pa nyid rtogs na nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault if one realizes the equality of all.

original: gzhan du nyes pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du nyes pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, there is a fault.

original: ri bong can ni zla ba ste gcig ces bya'o //
analyzed: ri bong can ni zla ba ste gcig ces bya'o //
translated: The moon is the rabbit, which is called one.

original: de nyid dus 'das pa ni nyin dang mtshan mo 'das pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid dus 'das pa ni nyin dang mtshan mo 'das pa ste /
translated: That very moon is past time, which is the passing of day and night.

original: lha la lus dang ga dang yid kyis mchod pa dang yon tan gzung ba la sogs ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: lha la lus dang ga dang yid kyis mchod pa dang yon tan gzung ba la sogs ma byas pa'o //
translated: It is not worshipping the deity with body, speech, and mind, not taking up the qualities, and so on.

original: le lo dang brjed ngas pa la sogs pas lan gnyis kyis bskang ba'o //
analyzed: le lo dang brjed ngas pa la sogs pas lan gnyis kyis bskang ba'o //
translated: It is made up by two repetitions due to laziness, forgetfulness, and so on.

original: bla ma'i bya ba dang na ba la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: bla ma'i bya ba dang na ba la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in the activities of the guru or when sick.

original: yon tan ni gsum mo //
analyzed: yon tan ni gsum mo //
translated: The qualities are three.

original: lha gzhan ni mu stegs kyi lha rten pa la sogs pa la mchod cing phyag byed pa'o //
analyzed: lha gzhan ni mu stegs kyi lha rten pa la sogs pa la mchod cing phyag byed pa'o //
translated: Another deity is worshipping and bowing to the tirthikas, the nathas, and so on.

original: bla ma la sogs pa mdun du byas nas gzhan 'dul ba dang / srog la bab pa dang / chad pa la sogs pa 'gal bar 'gyur na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: bla ma la sogs pa mdun du byas nas gzhan 'dul ba dang / srog la bab pa dang / chad pa la sogs pa 'gal bar 'gyur na nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in disciplining others, even if it means violating the rules of training, in order to save one's life or to save others from great suffering.

original: rig byed ni bzhi'o //
analyzed: rig byed ni bzhi'o //
translated: The four Vedas are the Rg Veda, the Yajur Veda, the Sama Veda, and the Atharva Veda.

original: dngos la zhen pa ni sgyu ma lta bur mi shes par dngos po ther zug tu dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dngos la zhen pa ni sgyu ma lta bur mi shes par dngos po ther zug tu dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The attachment to things is the meditation on the mandala, etc. as permanent entities, without knowing them to be like a magical illusion.

original: dmigs pa 'dzin pa dang rtas par byed la la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: dmigs pa 'dzin pa dang rtas par byed la la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in grasping and increasing the objective supports.

original: mda' ni lnga'o //
analyzed: mda' ni lnga'o //
translated: The five arrows are the five aggregates.

original: ma rdzogs pa ni bdag smin par ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: ma rdzogs pa ni bdag smin par ma byas pa'o //
translated: The incomplete is the incomplete ripening of oneself.

original: rdzogs pa ni gzhan smin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa ni gzhan smin par byed pa'o //
translated: The complete is the ripening of others.

original: rang rdzogs nas gzhan rdzogs par byed pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: rang rdzogs nas gzhan rdzogs par byed pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in completing others after one has completed oneself.

original: dbang po ni drug ste /
analyzed: dbang po ni drug ste /
translated: The six sense organs are the eyes, etc.

original: 'jig rten chos ni tshe 'di tsam gyi don du zab mo @221b la zhugs te phyi ma la sogs pa gzhan gyi don du byang chub 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten chos ni tshe 'di tsam gyi don du zab mo @221b la zhugs te phyi ma la sogs pa gzhan gyi don du byang chub 'dor ba'o //
translated: The worldly dharmas are the profound dharmas for the sake of this life, but one should not give up the enlightenment which is for the sake of others in future lives, etc.

original: gtsor byas pa las zhar la rgyas pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gtsor byas pa las zhar la rgyas pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in expanding on the main point.

original: ri ni bdun no //
analyzed: ri ni bdun no //
translated: The seven mountains are the seven continents.

original: khyad du gsod pa ni bslab pa 'og ma dang nyes byas la sogs pa'i dam tshig mi srung ba'o //
analyzed: khyad du gsod pa ni bslab pa 'og ma dang nyes byas la sogs pa'i dam tshig mi srung ba'o //
translated: Disdain is not to keep the commitments of the lower trainings and misdeeds, etc.

original: gong ma dang 'gal ba dang / yar ldan pa dang / na ba la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gong ma dang 'gal ba dang / yar ldan pa dang / na ba la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in contradicting the higher [trainings] and in possessing the lower [ones], and when one is sick.

original: bkra shis ni brgyad do //
analyzed: bkra shis ni brgyad do //
translated: The auspicious [times] are the eight [auspicious] days.

original: gong min tshul ston pa ni gzhan dad par byas nas rnyed pa la sogs pa don du gnyer ba ste /
analyzed: gong min tshul ston pa ni gzhan dad par byas nas rnyed pa la sogs pa don du gnyer ba ste /
translated: To display the opposite is to seek gain, etc. by causing others to have faith after having pretended to have qualities.

original: shes bzhin du yon tan dang ldan par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: shes bzhin du yon tan dang ldan par bstan pa'o //
translated: It is to display oneself as having qualities while knowing that one does not have them.

original: 'khrul ba dang gdul bya mthong ba dang ma rtogs pa la ma nyes pa med do //
analyzed: 'khrul ba dang gdul bya mthong ba dang ma rtogs pa la ma nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in mistakes or in seeing those to be trained, or in not understanding.

original: gza' ni dgu'o //
analyzed: gza' ni dgu'o //
translated: The [nine] planets.

original: phrin las ma rtogs pa ni zhib la sogs pa sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas par spyo ba byas pas las gang yang mi 'grub pas skur pa dang the tshom skye ba ste nyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phrin las ma rtogs pa ni zhib la sogs pa sngon du bsnyen pa ma byas par spyo ba byas pas las gang yang mi 'grub pas skur pa dang the tshom skye ba ste nyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Not understanding action is to not perform the preliminary practices of pacifying, etc. and to engage in the activities of the rite. Since one will not accomplish any activities, one will be criticized and doubts will arise. This is a fault.

original: 'phral du spyad par 'os pa la mthus bstangs pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: 'phral du spyad par 'os pa la mthus bstangs pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in immediately attending to what is suitable to be done with power.

original: phyogs zhes pa ni bcu'o //
analyzed: phyogs zhes pa ni bcu'o //
translated: The directions are the ten.

original: don med gnas pa ni smin par byas nas rkyen drag po med par snyom las dang bcas par dus 'da' bar rnyed pas nyes pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: don med gnas pa ni smin par byas nas rkyen drag po med par snyom las dang bcas par dus 'da' bar rnyed pas nyes pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Pointless staying is when, having ripened someone, one passes the time with laziness in the absence of strong conditions, and one is at fault.

original: 'dul ba dang gzhan dang 'gal ba na nyes pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba dang gzhan dang 'gal ba na nyes pa med pa'o //
translated: There is no fault if one is in conflict with the Vinaya or with others.

original: drag po ni bcu gcig pa'o //
analyzed: drag po ni bcu gcig pa'o //
translated: Strong is the eleventh.

original: rtse ba gtong ba ni don mthong ba yal bar 'dor ba ste nyes pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rtse ba gtong ba ni don mthong ba yal bar 'dor ba ste nyes pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Giving up play is when one abandons the sight of the goal, and one is at fault.

original: bdag gis mi nus pa dang gzhan yod pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: bdag gis mi nus pa dang gzhan yod pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault if one is unable to do it oneself or if someone else is available.

original: nyi ma ni bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nyi ma ni bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The sun is the twelfth.

original: dman pa'i spyod pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig blangs nas gong ma la skrag nas nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: dman pa'i spyod pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig blangs nas gong ma la skrag nas nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod pa byed pa'o //
translated: Inferior conduct is when, having taken the commitments of a great yogi, one is afraid of the higher ones and engages in the conduct of the Sravakas, etc.

original: gzhan 'dul ba dang / kha na ma tho ba spang ba'i phyir dang / dus shes pas spang pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan 'dul ba dang / kha na ma tho ba spang ba'i phyir dang / dus shes pas spang pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault if one does it in order to train others, to avoid blame, or to give up the fault at the right time.

original: yan lag ni yid de bcu gsum mo //
analyzed: yan lag ni yid de bcu gsum mo //
translated: The branch is the mind, the thirteenth.

original: zang zing rtog pa ni 'jig rten chos la chags na bka' dang 'gal bas gzhan gyi ngor 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: zang zing rtog pa ni 'jig rten chos la chags na bka' dang 'gal bas gzhan gyi ngor 'jug pa'o //
translated: The idea of material things is to engage in the worldly affairs in order to please others, which is contrary to the scriptures.

original: gdul ba'i thabs dang / don chen por 'gyur na nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gdul ba'i thabs dang / don chen por 'gyur na nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault if it is a means of disciplining others or if it is for a great purpose.

original: sa ni bcu bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: sa ni bcu bzhi pa'o //
translated: The stage is the fourteenth.

original: yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni sdom pa zhig pa rnams so //
analyzed: yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni sdom pa zhig pa rnams so //
translated: Those who do not hold the vows are those who have broken their vows.

original: de yal bar 'dor ba ni nyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yal bar 'dor ba ni nyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: There is a fault if one abandons them.

original: rang nyes pa khas len pa dang / gzhan 'dul ba dang / 'du shes pa la nyes pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rang nyes pa khas len pa dang / gzhan 'dul ba dang / 'du shes pa la nyes pa med pa'o //
translated: There is no fault if one admits one's own faults, if one disciplines others, or if one has the idea of doing so.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni bco lnga pa'o //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni bco lnga pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is the fifteenth.

original: rang spyod 'dor ba ni rang gi spyod pa mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang spyod 'dor ba ni rang gi spyod pa mi byed pa'o //
translated: Abandoning one's own conduct is not engaging in one's own conduct.

original: spyod pa de yang rnam @222a * //
analyzed: spyod pa de yang rnam @222a * //
translated: That conduct is also of four types.

original: pa bzhi ste las dang po las kun du bzang po'i spyod pa bya bar gsungs te /
analyzed: pa bzhi ste las dang po las kun du bzang po'i spyod pa bya bar gsungs te /
translated: For beginners, the conduct of Samantabhadra is taught.

original: rgyud gzhan las kun du bzang po'i spyod pa gnas skabs gzhan du yang bstan te dgongs pa gzhan no //
analyzed: rgyud gzhan las kun du bzang po'i spyod pa gnas skabs gzhan du yang bstan te dgongs pa gzhan no //
translated: The conduct of Samantabhadra is also taught in other tantras in other contexts, but with a different intention.

original: cung zad brtan pa thob nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa ste /
analyzed: cung zad brtan pa thob nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa ste /
translated: vajra awareness.🔽It is explained that one should engage in the conduct of mantra for six

original: sngags spyod kyis zla ba drug la sogs par bya bar bshad do //
analyzed: sngags spyod kyis zla ba drug la sogs par bya bar bshad do //
translated: months and so forth.🔽It is explained in the great tantra The Manifestations of Manjushri

original: brtan pa thob pa rnams kyis mgon po kun du spyod pa la gnas par bya'o zhes bshad pa'i rgyud chen po las bshad do //
analyzed: brtan pa thob pa rnams kyis mgon po kun du spyod pa la gnas par bya'o zhes bshad pa'i rgyud chen po las bshad do //
translated: that those who have gained stability should abide in the conduct of the🔽protector.🔽Then, there is the great conduct of meditative equipoise, which is free

original: de nas mnyam gzhag gi spyod pa chen po rang bzhin gyi rtog pa dang bral ba gnyis kyi rnam par bral ba ste /
analyzed: de nas mnyam gzhag gi spyod pa chen po rang bzhin gyi rtog pa dang bral ba gnyis kyi rnam par bral ba ste /
translated: from the concepts of the nature and free from the two extremes.

original: de la ni blang ba dang dor ba'i shes pa las 'das pa'o zhes bshad pa ste /
analyzed: de la ni blang ba dang dor ba'i shes pa las 'das pa'o zhes bshad pa ste /
translated: It is explained that this is beyond the cognition of adopting and rejecting.🔽The various tantras teach an immeasurable number of ways to engage in

original: snod kyi rim pas rgyud sna tshogs la spyod pa'i tshul dpag tu med pa bstan te /
analyzed: snod kyi rim pas rgyud sna tshogs la spyod pa'i tshul dpag tu med pa bstan te /
translated: conduct according to the level of the disciple.🔽Therefore, the intention of🔽those tantras and the conduct of the vajra master according to the level of

original: de'i phyir na de rnams kyi dgongs pa dang / snod kyi rim pas rdo rje slob dpon gyis spyod pa'i tshul yang mtha' yas pa de dag gi rim pa dang sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i phyir na de rnams kyi dgongs pa dang / snod kyi rim pas rdo rje slob dpon gyis spyod pa'i tshul yang mtha' yas pa de dag gi rim pa dang sbyar te /
translated: the disciple are limitless.

original: sman dang sman pa dang / nad pa dang nad kyi bye brag gi tshul gyis shes par bya'o zhes gsungs pas pa shes par bya'o //
analyzed: sman dang sman pa dang / nad pa dang nad kyi bye brag gi tshul gyis shes par bya'o zhes gsungs pas pa shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood by the way of medicine, doctor, patient, and the various kinds of illness.

original: 'dir rnal 'byor gyi lam rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir rnal 'byor gyi lam rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya ste /
translated: Here, the path of yoga should be understood as twofold:

original: rnal 'byor la brten pa dang / thabs kyi dam tshig la brten pa'o //🔽kha cig dam tshig la brten nas rnal 'byor gyis grol ba yang yod /
analyzed: rnal 'byor la brten pa dang / thabs kyi dam tshig la brten pa'o // kha cig dam tshig la brten nas rnal 'byor gyis grol ba yang yod /
translated: that which is based on yoga, and that which is based on the pledge of means.🔽Some are liberated by yoga based on the pledge.

original: kha cig rnal 'byor la brten nas dam tshig gis grol ba yang yod /
analyzed: kha cig rnal 'byor la brten nas dam tshig gis grol ba yang yod /
translated: Some are liberated by the pledge based on yoga.

original: kha cig 'di la dngos grub thob pa yang yod /
analyzed: kha cig 'di la dngos grub thob pa yang yod /
translated: Some attain power in this life.

original: kha cig bar ma dor thob pa yang yod /🔽kha cig skyes nas thob pa yang yod /
analyzed: kha cig bar ma dor thob pa yang yod / kha cig skyes nas thob pa yang yod /
translated: Some attain it in the intermediate state.🔽Some attain it after birth.

original: kha cig lan grangs gzhan la thob pa yang yod de /
analyzed: kha cig lan grangs gzhan la thob pa yang yod de /
translated: Some attain it in another life.

original: de dag kyang rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul du spyod pa rnams so //
analyzed: de dag kyang rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul du spyod pa rnams so //
translated: And they are the ones who practice in the manner of great yoga.

original: de bas na las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa kha na ma tho ba dang bral bas gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: de bas na las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa kha na ma tho ba dang bral bas gnas par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the beginner yogi/ni should abide in the conduct of Samantabhadra, free from misdeeds.

original: de yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud cho gzhi ba mo pa rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa dang yang 'gal bar mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: de yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud cho gzhi ba mo pa rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa dang yang 'gal bar mi byed pa ste /
translated: Moreover, one should not contradict the Vajra Peak and other root tantras of Yoga Tantra.

original: brtan pa ma thob pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang / kha na ma tho bas ma dad par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma'i g-yeng ba sna tshogs su 'gyur bas sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: brtan pa ma thob pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang / kha na ma tho bas ma dad par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma'i g-yeng ba sna tshogs su 'gyur bas sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o //
translated: One should abide in the three vows because, if one does not attain stability, one will degenerate, one will become faithless due to misdeeds, and one will become distracted by various signs.

original: thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pas sdom pa gsum ldan la gnas pas kyang rang rang gi cho ga las nyams pa ni las dang po pas kyang mi bya'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pas sdom pa gsum ldan la gnas pas kyang rang rang gi cho ga las nyams pa ni las dang po pas kyang mi bya'o //
translated: Even the yogi/nis of the tantras of method and wisdom, abiding in the three vows, should not transgress their own rituals, even as beginners.

original: gzhan du ni khyim @222b pa'i tshul gyis kyang sdom pa rang dang mthun pa la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni khyim @222b pa'i tshul gyis kyang sdom pa rang dang mthun pa la gnas par bya'o //
translated: Otherwise, even as a householder, one should abide in the vows that are suitable for oneself.

original: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa ni thams cad kyi nang na mchog ste /
analyzed: dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa ni thams cad kyi nang na mchog ste /
translated: The fully ordained monk who is a vajra holder is the best of all.

original: de skad du yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus su khyim pa'i rdo rje slob dpon mkhas shing nus pa dang ldan yang dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa slob dpon du mchog go /
analyzed: de skad du yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus su khyim pa'i rdo rje slob dpon mkhas shing nus pa dang ldan yang dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa slob dpon du mchog go /
translated: Thus, even though the householder vajra master is skilled and powerful, the fully ordained monk who is a vajra holder is the best master at the time of the ganacakra ritual.

original: de med kyang dge tshul gyis bya'o //
analyzed: de med kyang dge tshul gyis bya'o //
translated: If he is not available, then the novice monk should perform the duties of the vajra master.

original: de dag kyang med na khyim pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang med na khyim pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya'o zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If they are not available, then the householder vajra master should perform the duties of the vajra master.🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni //
translated: having taken up the spirit of enlightenment,

original: lha gzhan la ni mi mos pas //
analyzed: lha gzhan la ni mi mos pas //
translated: one should not be devoted to other deities.🔽With faith in the Three Jewels,🔽one should strive to be devoted to them.🔽One should abandon killing, stealing, sexual misconduct,

original: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang // de la gzhol zhing 'bad pa yis gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang // brdzun dang chad ni rnam par spang //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang // de la gzhol zhing 'bad pa yis gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang // brdzun dang chad ni rnam par spang //
translated: and lying and divisive speech.

original: khyim pa'i tshul du gnas nas ni //
analyzed: khyim pa'i tshul du gnas nas ni //
translated: Dwelling in the householder’s way of life,

original: gsang sngags rgyal po rnam par sgrub //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po rnam par sgrub //
translated: one should accomplish the king of secret mantra.

original: gal te de ni rab byung na //
analyzed: gal te de ni rab byung na //
translated: If one is a renunciate,

original: sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya //
analyzed: sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya //
translated: one should maintain the three vows.

original: so sor thar dang byang chub sems //🔽rig 'dzin rang gi sdom pa'o //
analyzed: so sor thar dang byang chub sems // rig 'dzin rang gi sdom pa'o //
translated: The vows of individual liberation, the bodhisattva vow,

original: zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'o //
translated: and the awareness-holder’s vow.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / khyim pa'am rab tu byung yang rung //
analyzed: gzhan yang / khyim pa'am rab tu byung yang rung //
translated: Whether a householder or ordained,

original: brtan pa ma thob bar du ni //
analyzed: brtan pa ma thob bar du ni //
translated: until stability is attained,

original: khan ma tho rdul med par //
analyzed: khan ma tho rdul med par //
translated: without the dust of regret,

original: bdud rtsi lnga la rtag tu spyad //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga la rtag tu spyad //
translated: always enjoy the five nectars.

original: khrus dang sdom pa sngar spyad med //
analyzed: khrus dang sdom pa sngar spyad med //
translated: Without having previously practiced ablution and vows,

original: dka' thub kyis kyang mi gdung bar //
analyzed: dka' thub kyis kyang mi gdung bar //
translated: without being tormented by austerities,

original: 'dod pa thams cad spyad par bya //
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad spyad par bya //
translated: enjoy all desires.

original: ci bde bar ni gnas nas bsgrub //
analyzed: ci bde bar ni gnas nas bsgrub //
translated: Practice while living comfortably.

original: 'jig rten ma dang smod gyur nas //
analyzed: 'jig rten ma dang smod gyur nas //
translated: If you are reviled by the world,

original: de nyid kyis ni nyams 'gyur bas //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni nyams 'gyur bas //
translated: you will degenerate by that,

original: bskal pa brgyar yang mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: bskal pa brgyar yang mi 'grub bo //
translated: and will not succeed even in a hundred eons.

original: rang gi spyod pa ma yin pa //
analyzed: rang gi spyod pa ma yin pa //
translated: Do not transgress

original: bslab pa kun dang grong khyer skad //
analyzed: bslab pa kun dang grong khyer skad //
translated: all the trainings and the language of the town.

original: de las nyams par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de las nyams par mi bya'o //
translated: Do not transgress them.

original: zhes bshad pa'i phyir las dang po pas rang gi spyod pa'i tshul las ma nyams par sdom pa thams cad la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa'i phyir las dang po pas rang gi spyod pa'i tshul las ma nyams par sdom pa thams cad la gnas par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, beginners should maintain all vows without transgressing the way of their conduct.

original: de'i phyir sdom pa gsum la gnas pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i don la 'jug pa thams cad kyis gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir sdom pa gsum la gnas pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i don la 'jug pa thams cad kyis gnas par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, all who enter the meaning of the great yoga should abide in the three vows.

original: khyim pa la sogs pas kyang rang dang mthun pa'i sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o//🔽de dag las dri ma las ldang ba yang bye brag tu ldang ba'am /
analyzed: khyim pa la sogs pas kyang rang dang mthun pa'i sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya'o// de dag las dri ma las ldang ba yang bye brag tu ldang ba'am /
translated: Even householders and so forth should abide in the three vows that are suitable for them.

original: tshul gcig la ldang ba la mkhas pas tshul gcig pa'i tshul du ldang bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshul gcig la ldang ba la mkhas pas tshul gcig pa'i tshul du ldang bar bya'o //
translated: With regard to rising from stains in those vows, one should rise by means of the specific methods or by means of the single method.

original: de dag las phan tshul 'gal ba yang dus dang gang zag gi nus pa dang bsam pas mi 'gal bar shes par bya ste //
analyzed: de dag las phan tshul 'gal ba yang dus dang gang zag gi nus pa dang bsam pas mi 'gal bar shes par bya ste //
translated: With regard to the mutual contradiction of those vows, one should understand that they are not contradictory by means of the capacity and intention of the time and person.

original: yul dang rkyen dang gdul bya dag shes @223a * //
analyzed: yul dang rkyen dang gdul bya dag shes @223a * //
translated: One should understand the object, the condition, and the disciple.

original: par bya'o // de'i phyir /
analyzed: par bya'o // de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore,🔽the wise one who has attachment should transcend the jewel,

original: chags bcas nor bu 'das pa dang // rin thang tshang ba thob blo ldan //
analyzed: chags bcas nor bu 'das pa dang // rin thang tshang ba thob blo ldan //
translated: and should obtain the complete value.🔽One should be aware of killing another person,

original: shes bzhin mi gzhan bsad pa dang // mi chos bla ma nga rgyal byed //
analyzed: shes bzhin mi gzhan bsad pa dang // mi chos bla ma nga rgyal byed //
translated: and one should be proud of the higher human qualities.

original: khu ba 'byin la sogs pa rnams //
analyzed: khu ba 'byin la sogs pa rnams //
translated: One should emit semen and so forth.

original: chos 'dul 'dir ni rtsa ba chad //🔽bdag bstod gzhan la smad sogs kyi //
analyzed: chos 'dul 'dir ni rtsa ba chad // bdag bstod gzhan la smad sogs kyi //
translated: In this Dharma-Vinaya, the root is cut.🔽Having committed faults like praising oneself, disparaging others, and so forth,

original: pha ma 'dra'i nyes pa byas pa rnams //
analyzed: pha ma 'dra'i nyes pa byas pa rnams //
translated: like a father and mother,

original: tshul bzhin gnas pas rab tu bsten //
analyzed: tshul bzhin gnas pas rab tu bsten //
translated: one should rely on a proper abode.

original: bla ma la sogs gnod byed bsad //
analyzed: bla ma la sogs gnod byed bsad //
translated: One should kill those who harm gurus and so forth.

original: dge mthong dbang sogs brtul zhugs dus //
analyzed: dge mthong dbang sogs brtul zhugs dus //
